2299  elem = new CPrimalGrid*[nElem] ();
2300 
2301  /*--- Store the elements of each type in the proper containers. ---*/
2302 
2303  for (it = Tria_List.begin(); it != Tria_List.end(); it++) {
2304 
2305  kElem = it->first;
2306  iElem = it->second;
2307 
2308  /*--- Transform the stored connectivity for this element from global
2309  to local values on this rank. ---*/
2310 
2311  NODES_PER_ELEMENT = N_POINTS_TRIANGLE;
2312  for (iNode = 0; iNode < NODES_PER_ELEMENT; iNode++) {
2313  iGlobal_Index = Conn_Tria[iElem*NODES_PER_ELEMENT+iNode];
2314  Local_Nodes[iNode] = Global_to_Local_Point[iGlobal_Index];
2315  }
2316 
2317  /*--- Create the element object. ---*/
2318 
2319  elem[jElem] = new CTriangle(Local_Nodes[0],
2320  Local_Nodes[1],
2321  Local_Nodes[2]);
2322 
2323  elem[jElem]->SetGlobalIndex(kElem);
2324 
2325  /*--- Increment our local counters. ---*/
2326 
2327  jElem++; iElemTria++;
2328 
2329  }
2330 
2331  /*--- Free memory as we go. ---*/
2332 
2333  Tria_List.clear();
2334 
2335  for (it = Quad_List.begin(); it != Quad_List.end(); it++) {
2336 
2337  kElem = it->first;
2338  iElem = it->second;
2339 
2340  /*--- Transform the stored connectivity for this element from global
2341  to local values on this rank. ---*/
2342 
2343  NODES_PER_ELEMENT = N_POINTS_QUADRILATERAL;
2344  for (iNode = 0; iNode < NODES_PER_ELEMENT; iNode++) {
2345  iGlobal_Index = Conn_Quad[iElem*NODES_PER_ELEMENT+iNode];
2346  Local_Nodes[iNode] = Global_to_Local_Point[iGlobal_Index];
2347  }
2348 
2349  /*--- Create the element object. ---*/
2350 
2351  elem[jElem] = new CQuadrilateral(Local_Nodes[0],
2352  Local_Nodes[1],
2353  Local_Nodes[2],
2354  Local_Nodes[3]);
2355 
2356  elem[jElem]->SetGlobalIndex(kElem);
2357 
2358  /*--- Increment our local counters. ---*/
2359 
2360  jElem++; iElemQuad++;
2361 
2362  }
2363 
2364  /*--- Free memory as we go. ---*/
2365 
2366  Quad_List.clear();
2367 
2368  for (it = Tetr_List.begin(); it != Tetr_List.end(); it++) {
2369 
2370  kElem = it->first;
2371  iElem = it->second;
2372 
2373  /*--- Transform the stored connectivity for this element from global
2374  to local values on this rank. ---*/
2375 
2376  NODES_PER_ELEMENT = N_POINTS_TETRAHEDRON;
2377  for (iNode = 0; iNode < NODES_PER_ELEMENT; iNode++) {
2378  iGlobal_Index = Conn_Tetr[iElem*NODES_PER_ELEMENT+iNode];
2379  Local_Nodes[iNode] = Global_to_Local_Point[iGlobal_Index];
2380  }
2381 
2382  /*--- Create the element object. ---*/
2383 
2384  elem[jElem] = new CTetrahedron(Local_Nodes[0],
2385  Local_Nodes[1],
2386  Local_Nodes[2],
2387  Local_Nodes[3]);
2388 
2389  elem[jElem]->SetGlobalIndex(kElem);
2390 
2391  /*--- Increment our local counters. ---*/
2392 
2393  jElem++; iElemTetr++;
2394 
2395  }
2396 
2397  /*--- Free memory as we go. ---*/
2398 
2399  Tetr_List.clear();
2400 
2401  for (it = Hexa_List.begin(); it != Hexa_List.end(); it++) {
2402 
2403  kElem = it->first;
2404  iElem = it->second;
2405 
2406  /*--- Transform the stored connectivity for this element from global
2407  to local values on this rank. ---*/
2408 
2409  NODES_PER_ELEMENT = N_POINTS_HEXAHEDRON;
2410  for (iNode = 0; iNode < NODES_PER_ELEMENT; iNode++) {
2411  iGlobal_Index = Conn_Hexa[iElem*NODES_PER_ELEMENT+iNode];
2412  Local_Nodes[iNode] = Global_to_Local_Point[iGlobal_Index];
2413  }
2414 
2415  /*--- Create the element object. ---*/
2416 
2417  elem[jElem] = new CHexahedron(Local_Nodes[0],
2418  Local_Nodes[1],
2419  Local_Nodes[2],
2420  Local_Nodes[3],
2421  Local_Nodes[4],
2422  Local_Nodes[5],
2423  Local_Nodes[6],
2424  Local_Nodes[7]);
2425 
2426  elem[jElem]->SetGlobalIndex(kElem);
2427 
2428  /*--- Increment our local counters. ---*/
2429 
2430  jElem++; iElemHexa++;
2431 
2432  }
2433 
2434  /*--- Free memory as we go. ---*/
2435 
2436  Hexa_List.clear();
2437 
2438  for (it = Pris_List.begin(); it != Pris_List.end(); it++) {
2439 
2440  kElem = it->first;
2441  iElem = it->second;
2442 
2443  /*--- Transform the stored connectivity for this element from global
2444  to local values on this rank. ---*/
2445 
2446  NODES_PER_ELEMENT = N_POINTS_PRISM;
2447  for (iNode = 0; iNode < NODES_PER_ELEMENT; iNode++) {
2448  iGlobal_Index = Conn_Pris[iElem*NODES_PER_ELEMENT+iNode];
2449  Local_Nodes[iNode] = Global_to_Local_Point[iGlobal_Index];
2450  }
2451 
2452  /*--- Create the element object. ---*/
2453 
2454  elem[jElem] = new CPrism(Local_Nodes[0],
2455  Local_Nodes[1],
2456  Local_Nodes[2],
2457  Local_Nodes[3],
2458  Local_Nodes[4],
2459  Local_Nodes[5]);
2460 
2461  elem[jElem]->SetGlobalIndex(kElem);
2462 
2463  /*--- Increment our local counters. ---*/
2464 
2465  jElem++; iElemPris++;
2466 
2467  }
2468 
2469  /*--- Free memory as we go. ---*/
2470 
2471  Pris_List.clear();
2472 
2473  for (it = Pyra_List.begin(); it != Pyra_List.end(); it++) {
2474 
2475  kElem = it->first;
2476  iElem = it->second;
2477 
2478  /*--- Transform the stored connectivity for this element from global
2479  to local values on this rank. ---*/
2480 
2481  NODES_PER_ELEMENT = N_POINTS_PYRAMID;
2482  for (iNode = 0; iNode < NODES_PER_ELEMENT; iNode++) {
2483  iGlobal_Index = Conn_Pyra[iElem*NODES_PER_ELEMENT+iNode];
2484  Local_Nodes[iNode] = Global_to_Local_Point[iGlobal_Index];
2485  }
2486 
2487  /*--- Create the element object. ---*/
2488 
2489  elem[jElem] = new CPyramid(Local_Nodes[0],
2490  Local_Nodes[1],
2491  Local_Nodes[2],
2492  Local_Nodes[3],
2493  Local_Nodes[4]);
2494 
2495  elem[jElem]->SetGlobalIndex(kElem);
2496 
2497  /*--- Increment our local counters. ---*/
2498 
2499  jElem++; iElemPyra++;
2500 
2501  }
2502 
2503  /*--- Free memory as we go. ---*/
2504 
2505  Pyra_List.clear();
2506 
2507  /*--- Communicate the number of each element type to all processors. These
2508  values are important for merging and writing output later. ---*/
2509 
2510  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Local_Elem, &Global_nElem, 1,
2511  MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
2512 
2513  if ((rank == MASTER_NODE) && (size > SINGLE_NODE))
2514  cout << Global_nElem << " interior elements including halo cells. " << endl;
2515 
2516  /*--- Set the value of Global_nElemDomain (stored in the geometry
2517  container that is passed in). ---*/
2518 
2519  Global_nElemDomain = geometry->GetGlobal_nElemDomain();
2520 
2521  /*--- Store total number of each element type after incrementing the
2522  counters in the recv loop above (to make sure there aren't repeats). ---*/
2523 
2524  nelem_triangle = iElemTria;
2525  nelem_quad = iElemQuad;
2526  nelem_tetra = iElemTetr;
2527  nelem_hexa = iElemHexa;
2528  nelem_prism = iElemPris;
2529  nelem_pyramid = iElemPyra;
2530 
2531 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
2532  unsigned long Local_nElemTri = nelem_triangle;
2533  unsigned long Local_nElemQuad = nelem_quad;
2534  unsigned long Local_nElemTet = nelem_tetra;
2535  unsigned long Local_nElemHex = nelem_hexa;
2536  unsigned long Local_nElemPrism = nelem_prism;
2537  unsigned long Local_nElemPyramid = nelem_pyramid;
2538 
2539  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Local_nElemTri, &Global_nelem_triangle, 1,
2540  MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
2541  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Local_nElemQuad, &Global_nelem_quad, 1,
2542  MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
2543  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Local_nElemTet, &Global_nelem_tetra, 1,
2544  MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
2545  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Local_nElemHex, &Global_nelem_hexa, 1,
2546  MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
2547  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Local_nElemPrism, &Global_nelem_prism, 1,
2548  MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
2549  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Local_nElemPyramid, &Global_nelem_pyramid, 1,
2550  MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
2551 #else
2552  Global_nelem_triangle = nelem_triangle;
2553  Global_nelem_quad = nelem_quad;
2554  Global_nelem_tetra = nelem_tetra;
2555  Global_nelem_hexa = nelem_hexa;
2556  Global_nelem_prism = nelem_prism;
2557  Global_nelem_pyramid = nelem_pyramid;
2558 #endif
2559 
2560  /*--- Print information about the elements to the console ---*/
2561 
2562  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
2563  if (Global_nelem_triangle > 0)
2564  cout << Global_nelem_triangle << " triangles." << endl;
2565  if (Global_nelem_quad > 0)
2566  cout << Global_nelem_quad << " quadrilaterals." << endl;
2567  if (Global_nelem_tetra > 0)
2568  cout << Global_nelem_tetra << " tetrahedra." << endl;
2569  if (Global_nelem_hexa > 0)
2570  cout << Global_nelem_hexa << " hexahedra." << endl;
2571  if (Global_nelem_prism > 0)
2572  cout << Global_nelem_prism << " prisms." << endl;
2573  if (Global_nelem_pyramid > 0)
2574  cout << Global_nelem_pyramid << " pyramids." << endl;
2575  }
2576 
2577 }
2578 
2579 void CPhysicalGeometry::LoadSurfaceElements(CConfig *config, CGeometry *geometry) {
2580 
2581  unsigned short NODES_PER_ELEMENT;
2582  unsigned short iNode, nMarker_Max = config->GetnMarker_Max();
2583 
2584  unsigned long iElem, iMarker, Global_Marker, iGlobal_Index;
2585 
2586  unsigned long iElem_Line = 0;
2587  unsigned long iElem_Tria = 0;
2588  unsigned long iElem_Quad = 0;
2589 
2590  unsigned long Local_Nodes[N_POINTS_HEXAHEDRON];
2591 
2592  vector<vector<unsigned long> > Line_List;
2593  vector<vector<unsigned long> > BoundTria_List;
2594  vector<vector<unsigned long> > BoundQuad_List;
2595 
2596  vector<unsigned long> Marker_Local;
2597 
2598  /*--- Compute how many markers we have local to this rank by looping
2599  through the global marker numbers of each local surface element and
2600  counting the unique set. ---*/
2601 
2602  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nLocal_Line; iElem++) {
2603  if (find(Marker_Local.begin(), Marker_Local.end(),
2604  ID_Line[iElem]) == Marker_Local.end()) {
2605  Marker_Local.push_back(ID_Line[iElem]);
2606  }
2607  }
2608 
2609  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nLocal_BoundTria; iElem++) {
2610  if (find(Marker_Local.begin(), Marker_Local.end(),
2611  ID_BoundTria[iElem]) == Marker_Local.end()) {
2612  Marker_Local.push_back(ID_BoundTria[iElem]);
2613  }
2614  }
2615 
2616  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nLocal_BoundQuad; iElem++) {
2617  if (find(Marker_Local.begin(), Marker_Local.end(),
2618  ID_BoundQuad[iElem]) == Marker_Local.end()) {
2619  Marker_Local.push_back(ID_BoundQuad[iElem]);
2620  }
2621  }
2622 
2623  /*--- Create a mapping from global to local marker ID and v.v.
2624  * (the latter being just an alias). ---*/
2625 
2626  unordered_map<unsigned long, unsigned long> Marker_Global_to_Local;
2627  const vector<unsigned long>& Marker_Local_to_Global = Marker_Local;
2628 
2629  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < Marker_Local.size(); iMarker++) {
2630  Marker_Global_to_Local[Marker_Local[iMarker]] = iMarker;
2631  }
2632 
2633  /*--- Set up our element counters on each marker so that we can avoid
2634  duplicating any elements from the previous communications. ---*/
2635 
2636  Line_List.resize(Marker_Local.size());
2637  BoundTria_List.resize(Marker_Local.size());
2638  BoundQuad_List.resize(Marker_Local.size());
2639 
2640  /*--- Count the number of elements on each marker and store in a
2641  vector by marker. ---*/
2642 
2643  vector<unsigned long> nElemBound_Local;
2644  nElemBound_Local.resize(Marker_Local.size());
2645  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < Marker_Local.size(); iMarker++)
2646  nElemBound_Local[iMarker] = 0;
2647 
2648  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nLocal_Line; iElem++) {
2649  iMarker = Marker_Global_to_Local[ID_Line[iElem]];
2650  if (find(Line_List[iMarker].begin(), Line_List[iMarker].end(),
2651  Elem_ID_Line[iElem]) == Line_List[iMarker].end()) {
2652  nElemBound_Local[iMarker]++;
2653  Line_List[iMarker].push_back(Elem_ID_Line[iElem]);
2654  }
2655  }
2656 
2657  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nLocal_BoundTria; iElem++) {
2658  iMarker = Marker_Global_to_Local[ID_BoundTria[iElem]];
2659  if (find(BoundTria_List[iMarker].begin(), BoundTria_List[iMarker].end(),
2660  Elem_ID_BoundTria[iElem]) == BoundTria_List[iMarker].end()) {
2661  nElemBound_Local[iMarker]++;
2662  BoundTria_List[iMarker].push_back(Elem_ID_BoundTria[iElem]);
2663  }
2664  }
2665 
2666  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nLocal_BoundQuad; iElem++) {
2667  iMarker = Marker_Global_to_Local[ID_BoundQuad[iElem]];
2668  if (find(BoundQuad_List[iMarker].begin(), BoundQuad_List[iMarker].end(),
2669  Elem_ID_BoundQuad[iElem]) == BoundQuad_List[iMarker].end()) {
2670  nElemBound_Local[iMarker]++;
2671  BoundQuad_List[iMarker].push_back(Elem_ID_BoundQuad[iElem]);
2672  }
2673  }
2674 
2675  /*--- Create the domain structures for the boundaries. Initially, stick
2676  with nMarkerMax here, but come back and compute size we need. Same for
2677  OVERHEAD - this can precomputed. ---*/
2678 
2679  nMarker = Marker_Local.size();
2680  nElem_Bound = new unsigned long[nMarker_Max];
2681  Tag_to_Marker = new string[nMarker_Max];
2682  Marker_All_SendRecv = new short[nMarker_Max];
2683 
2684  /*--- Allocate space for the elements on each marker ---*/
2685 
2686  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++)
2687  nElem_Bound[iMarker] = nElemBound_Local[iMarker];
2688 
2689  bound = new CPrimalGrid**[nMarker+(OVERHEAD*size)];
2690  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker+(OVERHEAD*size); iMarker++)
2691  bound[iMarker] = nullptr;
2692 
2693  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++)
2694  bound[iMarker] = new CPrimalGrid*[nElem_Bound[iMarker]];
2695 
2696  /*--- Initialize boundary element counters ---*/
2697 
2698  iElem_Line = 0;
2699  iElem_Tria = 0;
2700  iElem_Quad = 0;
2701 
2702  Line_List.clear(); Line_List.resize(Marker_Local.size());
2703  BoundTria_List.clear(); BoundTria_List.resize(Marker_Local.size());
2704  BoundQuad_List.clear(); BoundQuad_List.resize(Marker_Local.size());
2705 
2706  /*--- Reset our element counter on a marker-basis. ---*/
2707 
2708  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++)
2709  nElemBound_Local[iMarker] = 0;
2710 
2711  /*--- Store the boundary element connectivity. Note here that we have
2712  communicated the global index values for the elements, so we need to
2713  convert this to the local index when instantiating the element. ---*/
2714 
2715  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nLocal_Line; iElem++) {
2716 
2717  iMarker = Marker_Global_to_Local[ID_Line[iElem]];
2718 
2719  /*--- Avoid duplicates on this marker. ---*/
2720 
2721  if (find(Line_List[iMarker].begin(), Line_List[iMarker].end(),
2722  Elem_ID_Line[iElem]) == Line_List[iMarker].end()) {
2723 
2724  /*--- Transform the stored connectivity for this element from global
2725  to local values on this rank. ---*/
2726 
2727  NODES_PER_ELEMENT = N_POINTS_LINE;
2728  for (iNode = 0; iNode < NODES_PER_ELEMENT; iNode++) {
2729  iGlobal_Index = Conn_Line[iElem*NODES_PER_ELEMENT+iNode];
2730  Local_Nodes[iNode] = Global_to_Local_Point[iGlobal_Index];
2731  }
2732 
2733  /*--- Create the geometry object for this element. ---*/
2734 
2735  bound[iMarker][nElemBound_Local[iMarker]] = new CLine(Local_Nodes[0],
2736  Local_Nodes[1]);
2737 
2738  /*--- Increment our counters for this marker and element type. ---*/
2739 
2740  nElemBound_Local[iMarker]++; iElem_Line++;
2741 
2742  Line_List[iMarker].push_back(Elem_ID_Line[iElem]);
2743 
2744  }
2745  }
2746 
2747  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nLocal_BoundTria; iElem++) {
2748 
2749  iMarker = Marker_Global_to_Local[ID_BoundTria[iElem]];
2750 
2751  /*--- Avoid duplicates on this marker. ---*/
2752 
2753  if (find(BoundTria_List[iMarker].begin(), BoundTria_List[iMarker].end(),
2754  Elem_ID_BoundTria[iElem]) == BoundTria_List[iMarker].end()) {
2755 
2756  /*--- Transform the stored connectivity for this element from global
2757  to local values on this rank. ---*/
2758 
2759  NODES_PER_ELEMENT = N_POINTS_TRIANGLE;
2760  for (iNode = 0; iNode < NODES_PER_ELEMENT; iNode++) {
2761  iGlobal_Index = Conn_BoundTria[iElem*NODES_PER_ELEMENT+iNode];
2762  Local_Nodes[iNode] = Global_to_Local_Point[iGlobal_Index];
2763  }
2764 
2765  /*--- Create the geometry object for this element. ---*/
2766 
2767  bound[iMarker][nElemBound_Local[iMarker]] = new CTriangle(Local_Nodes[0],
2768  Local_Nodes[1],
2769  Local_Nodes[2]);
2770 
2771  /*--- Increment our counters for this marker and element type. ---*/
2772 
2773  nElemBound_Local[iMarker]++; iElem_Tria++;
2774 
2775  BoundTria_List[iMarker].push_back(Elem_ID_BoundTria[iElem]);
2776 
2777  }
2778  }
2779 
2780  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nLocal_BoundQuad; iElem++) {
2781 
2782  iMarker = Marker_Global_to_Local[ID_BoundQuad[iElem]];
2783 
2784  /*--- Avoid duplicates on this marker. ---*/
2785 
2786  if (find(BoundQuad_List[iMarker].begin(), BoundQuad_List[iMarker].end(),
2787  Elem_ID_BoundQuad[iElem]) == BoundQuad_List[iMarker].end()) {
2788 
2789  /*--- Transform the stored connectivity for this element from global
2790  to local values on this rank. ---*/
2791 
2792  NODES_PER_ELEMENT = N_POINTS_QUADRILATERAL;
2793  for (iNode = 0; iNode < NODES_PER_ELEMENT; iNode++) {
2794  iGlobal_Index = Conn_BoundQuad[iElem*NODES_PER_ELEMENT+iNode];
2795  Local_Nodes[iNode] = Global_to_Local_Point[iGlobal_Index];
2796  }
2797 
2798  /*--- Create the geometry object for this element. ---*/
2799 
2800  bound[iMarker][nElemBound_Local[iMarker]] = new CQuadrilateral(Local_Nodes[0],
2801  Local_Nodes[1],
2802  Local_Nodes[2],
2803  Local_Nodes[3]);
2804 
2805  /*--- Increment our counters for this marker and element type. ---*/
2806 
2807  nElemBound_Local[iMarker]++; iElem_Quad++;
2808 
2809  BoundQuad_List[iMarker].push_back(Elem_ID_BoundQuad[iElem]);
2810 
2811  }
2812  }
2813 
2814  /*--- Store total number of each boundary element type ---*/
2815 
2816  nelem_edge_bound = iElem_Line;
2817  nelem_triangle_bound = iElem_Tria;
2818  nelem_quad_bound = iElem_Quad;
2819 
2820  /*--- Set some auxiliary information on a per-marker basis. ---*/
2821 
2822  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
2823 
2824  Global_Marker = Marker_Local_to_Global[iMarker];
2825 
2826  /*--- Now each domain has the right information ---*/
2827 
2828  string Grid_Marker = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(Global_Marker);
2829  short SendRecv = config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(Global_Marker);
2830 
2831  Tag_to_Marker[iMarker] = Marker_Tags[Global_Marker];
2832  Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker] = SendRecv;
2833 
2834  /*--- Set the marker tags correctly to match the values in config. ---*/
2835 
2836  config->SetMarker_All_TagBound(iMarker, Tag_to_Marker[iMarker]);
2837  config->SetMarker_All_SendRecv(iMarker, Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker]);
2838 
2839  }
2840 
2841  /*--- Initialize pointers for turbomachinery computations ---*/
2842 
2843  nSpanWiseSections = new unsigned short[2] ();
2844  SpanWiseValue = new su2double*[2] ();
2845 
2846  nSpanSectionsByMarker = new unsigned short[nMarker] ();
2847  nVertexSpan = new long* [nMarker] ();
2848  nTotVertexSpan = new unsigned long* [nMarker] ();
2849  turbovertex = new CTurboVertex***[nMarker] ();
2850  AverageTurboNormal = new su2double**[nMarker] ();
2851  AverageNormal = new su2double**[nMarker] ();
2852  AverageGridVel = new su2double**[nMarker] ();
2853  AverageTangGridVel = new su2double*[nMarker] ();
2854  SpanArea = new su2double*[nMarker] ();
2855  TurboRadius = new su2double*[nMarker] ();
2856  MaxAngularCoord = new su2double*[nMarker] ();
2857  MinAngularCoord = new su2double*[nMarker] ();
2858  MinRelAngularCoord = new su2double*[nMarker] ();
2859 
2860  /*--- Initialize pointers for turbomachinery performance computation ---*/
2861 
2862  nTurboPerf = config->GetnMarker_TurboPerformance();
2863  TangGridVelIn = new su2double*[nTurboPerf] ();
2864  SpanAreaIn = new su2double*[nTurboPerf] ();
2865  TurboRadiusIn = new su2double*[nTurboPerf] ();
2866  TangGridVelOut = new su2double*[nTurboPerf] ();
2867  SpanAreaOut = new su2double*[nTurboPerf] ();
2868  TurboRadiusOut = new su2double*[nTurboPerf] ();
2869 
2870 }
2871 
2872 void CPhysicalGeometry::InitiateCommsAll(void *bufSend,
2873  const int *nElemSend,
2874  SU2_MPI::Request *sendReq,
2875  void *bufRecv,
2876  const int *nElemRecv,
2877  SU2_MPI::Request *recvReq,
2878  unsigned short countPerElem,
2879  unsigned short commType) {
2880 
2881  /*--- Local variables ---*/
2882 
2883  int iMessage, iProc, offset, nElem, count, source, dest, tag;
2884 
2885  /*--- Launch the non-blocking recv's first. ---*/
2886 
2887  iMessage = 0;
2888  for (iProc = 0; iProc < size; iProc++) {
2889 
2890  /*--- Post recv's only if another proc is sending us data. We do
2891  not communicate with ourselves or post recv's for zero length
2892  messages to keep overhead down. ---*/
2893 
2894  if ((nElemRecv[iProc+1] > nElemRecv[iProc]) && (iProc != rank)) {
2895 
2896  /*--- Compute our location in the recv buffer. ---*/
2897 
2898  offset = countPerElem*nElemRecv[iProc];
2899 
2900  /*--- Take advantage of cumulative storage format to get the number
2901  of elems that we need to recv. ---*/
2902 
2903  nElem = nElemRecv[iProc+1] - nElemRecv[iProc];
2904 
2905  /*--- Total count can include multiple pieces of data per element. ---*/
2906 
2907  count = countPerElem*nElem;
2908 
2909  /*--- Post non-blocking recv for this proc. ---*/
2910 
2911  source = iProc; tag = iProc + 1;
2912 
2913  switch (commType) {
2914  case COMM_TYPE_DOUBLE:
2915  SU2_MPI::Irecv(&(static_cast<su2double*>(bufRecv)[offset]),
2916  count, MPI_DOUBLE, source, tag, SU2_MPI::GetComm(),
2917  &(recvReq[iMessage]));
2918  break;
2919  case COMM_TYPE_UNSIGNED_LONG:
2920  SU2_MPI::Irecv(&(static_cast<unsigned long*>(bufRecv)[offset]),
2921  count, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, source, tag, SU2_MPI::GetComm(),
2922  &(recvReq[iMessage]));
2923  break;
2924  case COMM_TYPE_LONG:
2925  SU2_MPI::Irecv(&(static_cast<long*>(bufRecv)[offset]),
2926  count, MPI_LONG, source, tag, SU2_MPI::GetComm(),
2927  &(recvReq[iMessage]));
2928  break;
2929  case COMM_TYPE_UNSIGNED_SHORT:
2930  SU2_MPI::Irecv(&(static_cast<unsigned short*>(bufRecv)[offset]),
2931  count, MPI_UNSIGNED_SHORT, source, tag, SU2_MPI::GetComm(),
2932  &(recvReq[iMessage]));
2933  break;
2934  case COMM_TYPE_CHAR:
2935  SU2_MPI::Irecv(&(static_cast<char*>(bufRecv)[offset]),
2936  count, MPI_CHAR, source, tag, SU2_MPI::GetComm(),
2937  &(recvReq[iMessage]));
2938  break;
2939  case COMM_TYPE_SHORT:
2940  SU2_MPI::Irecv(&(static_cast<short*>(bufRecv)[offset]),
2941  count, MPI_SHORT, source, tag, SU2_MPI::GetComm(),
2942  &(recvReq[iMessage]));
2943  break;
2944  case COMM_TYPE_INT:
2945  SU2_MPI::Irecv(&(static_cast<int*>(bufRecv)[offset]),
2946  count, MPI_INT, source, tag, SU2_MPI::GetComm(),
2947  &(recvReq[iMessage]));
2948  break;
2949  default:
2950  break;
2951  }
2952 
2953  /*--- Increment message counter. ---*/
2954 
2955  iMessage++;
2956 
2957  }
2958  }
2959 
2960  /*--- Launch the non-blocking sends next. ---*/
2961 
2962  iMessage = 0;
2963  for (iProc = 0; iProc < size; iProc++) {
2964 
2965  /*--- Post sends only if we are sending another proc data. We do
2966  not communicate with ourselves or post sends for zero length
2967  messages to keep overhead down. ---*/
2968 
2969  if ((nElemSend[iProc+1] > nElemSend[iProc]) && (iProc != rank)) {
2970 
2971  /*--- Compute our location in the send buffer. ---*/
2972 
2973  offset = countPerElem*nElemSend[iProc];
2974 
2975  /*--- Take advantage of cumulative storage format to get the number
2976  of elems that we need to send. ---*/
2977 
2978  nElem = nElemSend[iProc+1] - nElemSend[iProc];
2979 
2980  /*--- Total count can include multiple pieces of data per element. ---*/
2981 
2982  count = countPerElem*nElem;
2983 
2984  /*--- Post non-blocking send for this proc. ---*/
2985 
2986  dest = iProc; tag = rank + 1;
2987 
2988  switch (commType) {
2989  case COMM_TYPE_DOUBLE:
2990  SU2_MPI::Isend(&(static_cast<su2double*>(bufSend)[offset]),
2991  count, MPI_DOUBLE, dest, tag, SU2_MPI::GetComm(),
2992  &(sendReq[iMessage]));
2993  break;
2994  case COMM_TYPE_UNSIGNED_LONG:
2995  SU2_MPI::Isend(&(static_cast<unsigned long*>(bufSend)[offset]),
2996  count, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, dest, tag, SU2_MPI::GetComm(),
2997  &(sendReq[iMessage]));
2998  break;
2999  case COMM_TYPE_LONG:
3000  SU2_MPI::Isend(&(static_cast<long*>(bufSend)[offset]),
3001  count, MPI_LONG, dest, tag, SU2_MPI::GetComm(),
3002  &(sendReq[iMessage]));
3003  break;
3004  case COMM_TYPE_UNSIGNED_SHORT:
3005  SU2_MPI::Isend(&(static_cast<unsigned short*>(bufSend)[offset]),
3006  count, MPI_UNSIGNED_SHORT, dest, tag, SU2_MPI::GetComm(),
3007  &(sendReq[iMessage]));
3008  break;
3009  case COMM_TYPE_CHAR:
3010  SU2_MPI::Isend(&(static_cast<char*>(bufSend)[offset]),
3011  count, MPI_CHAR, dest, tag, SU2_MPI::GetComm(),
3012  &(sendReq[iMessage]));
3013  break;
3014  case COMM_TYPE_SHORT:
3015  SU2_MPI::Isend(&(static_cast<short*>(bufSend)[offset]),
3016  count, MPI_SHORT, dest, tag, SU2_MPI::GetComm(),
3017  &(sendReq[iMessage]));
3018  break;
3019  case COMM_TYPE_INT:
3020  SU2_MPI::Isend(&(static_cast<int*>(bufSend)[offset]),
3021  count, MPI_INT, dest, tag, SU2_MPI::GetComm(),
3022  &(sendReq[iMessage]));
3023  break;
3024  default:
3025  break;
3026  }
3027 
3028  /*--- Increment message counter. ---*/
3029 
3030  iMessage++;
3031 
3032  }
3033  }
3034 
3035 }
3036 
3037 void CPhysicalGeometry::CompleteCommsAll(int nSends,
3038  SU2_MPI::Request *sendReq,
3039  int nRecvs,
3040  SU2_MPI::Request *recvReq) {
3041 
3042  /*--- Local variables ---*/
3043 
3044  int ind, iSend, iRecv;
3045  SU2_MPI::Status status;
3046 
3047  /*--- Wait for the non-blocking sends to complete. ---*/
3048 
3049  for (iSend = 0; iSend < nSends; iSend++)
3050  SU2_MPI::Waitany(nSends, sendReq, &ind, &status);
3051 
3052  /*--- Wait for the non-blocking recvs to complete. ---*/
3053 
3054  for (iRecv = 0; iRecv < nRecvs; iRecv++)
3055  SU2_MPI::Waitany(nRecvs, recvReq, &ind, &status);
3056 
3057 }
3058 
3059 void CPhysicalGeometry::PrepareOffsets(unsigned long val_npoint_global) {
3060 
3061  /*--- Compute the number of points that will be on each processor.
3062  This is a linear partitioning with the addition of a simple load
3063  balancing for any remainder points. ---*/
3064 
3065  if (beg_node == nullptr) beg_node = new unsigned long[size];
3066  if (end_node == nullptr) end_node = new unsigned long[size];
3067 
3068  if (nPointLinear == nullptr) nPointLinear = new unsigned long[size];
3069  if (nPointCumulative == nullptr) nPointCumulative = new unsigned long[size+1];
3070 
3071  unsigned long quotient = val_npoint_global/size;
3072  int remainder = int(val_npoint_global%size);
3073  for (int ii = 0; ii < size; ii++) {
3074  nPointLinear[ii] = quotient + int(ii < remainder);
3075  }
3076 
3077  /*--- Store the local number of nodes on each proc in the linear
3078  partitioning, the beginning/end index, and the linear partitioning
3079  within an array in cumulative storage format. ---*/
3080 
3081  beg_node[0] = 0;
3082  end_node[0] = beg_node[0] + nPointLinear[0];
3083  nPointCumulative[0] = 0;
3084  for (int iProc = 1; iProc < size; iProc++) {
3085  beg_node[iProc] = end_node[iProc-1];
3086  end_node[iProc] = beg_node[iProc] + nPointLinear[iProc];
3087  nPointCumulative[iProc] = nPointCumulative[iProc-1] + nPointLinear[iProc-1];
3088  }
3089  nPointCumulative[size] = val_npoint_global;
3090 
3091 }
3092 
3093 unsigned long CPhysicalGeometry::GetLinearPartition(unsigned long val_global_index) {
3094 
3095  unsigned long iProcessor = 0;
3096 
3097  /*--- Initial guess ---*/
3098 
3099  iProcessor = val_global_index/nPointLinear[0];
3100 
3101  /*--- Guard against going over size. ---*/
3102 
3103  if (iProcessor >= (unsigned long)size)
3104  iProcessor = (unsigned long)size-1;
3105 
3106  /*--- Move up or down until we find the processor. ---*/
3107 
3108  if (val_global_index >= nPointCumulative[iProcessor])
3109  while(val_global_index >= nPointCumulative[iProcessor+1])
3110  iProcessor++;
3111  else
3112  while(val_global_index < nPointCumulative[iProcessor])
3113  iProcessor--;
3114 
3115  return iProcessor;
3116 
3117 }
3118 
3119 void CPhysicalGeometry::SortAdjacency(const CConfig *config) {
3120 
3121 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
3122 #ifdef HAVE_PARMETIS
3123 
3124  if ((rank == MASTER_NODE) && (size > SINGLE_NODE))
3125  cout << "Executing the partitioning functions." << endl;
3126 
3127  /*--- Post process the adjacency information in order to get it into the
3128  CSR format before sending the data to ParMETIS. We need to remove
3129  repeats and adjust the size of the array for each local node. ---*/
3130 
3131  if ((rank == MASTER_NODE) && (size > SINGLE_NODE))
3132  cout << "Building the graph adjacency structure." << endl;
3133 
3134  /*--- Create a partitioner object so we can transform the global
3135  index values stored in the elements to a local index. ---*/
3136 
3137  CLinearPartitioner pointPartitioner(Global_nPointDomain,0);
3138 
3139  /*--- We can already create the array that indexes the adjacency. ---*/
3140 
3141  xadj.resize(pointPartitioner.GetSizeOnRank(rank)+1);
3142  xadj[0] = 0;
3143 
3144  /*--- Here, we transfer the adjacency information from a multi-dim vector
3145  on a node-by-node basis into a single vector container. First, we sort
3146  the entries and remove the duplicates we find for each node, then we
3147  copy it into the single vect and clear memory from the multi-dim vec. ---*/
3148 
3149  unsigned long total_adj_size = 0;
3150  for (auto& neighbors : adj_nodes) {
3151  /*--- For each point, sort the adjacency in ascending order
3152  so that we can remove duplicates and complete the size for
3153  unique set of adjacent nodes for that point. ---*/
3154 
3155  sort(neighbors.begin(), neighbors.end());
3156  auto it = unique(neighbors.begin(), neighbors.end());
3157  const auto local_size = it - neighbors.begin();
3158  neighbors.resize(local_size);
3159  total_adj_size += local_size;
3160  }
3161 
3162  /*--- Now that we know the size, create the final adjacency array. This
3163  is the array that we will feed to ParMETIS for partitioning. ---*/
3164 
3165  adjacency.resize(0);
3166  adjacency.reserve(total_adj_size);
3167 
3168  unsigned long iPoint = 0;
3169  for (const auto& neighbors : adj_nodes) {
3170  /*--- Move the sorted adjacency into a 1-D vector for all
3171  points for loading into ParMETIS for partitioning next. ---*/
3172  for (auto jPoint : neighbors) adjacency.push_back(jPoint);
3173 
3174  /*--- Increment the starting index for the next point (CSR). ---*/
3175  xadj[iPoint+1] = xadj[iPoint] + neighbors.size();
3176  ++iPoint;
3177  }
3178 
3179  /*--- Force free the entire old multi-dim. adjacency vector. ---*/
3180 
3181  decltype(adj_nodes)().swap(adj_nodes);
3182 
3183 #endif
3184 #endif
3185 
3186 }
3187 
3188 void CPhysicalGeometry::SetSendReceive(const CConfig *config) {
3189 
3190  unsigned short Counter_Send, Counter_Receive, iMarkerSend, iMarkerReceive;
3191  unsigned long iVertex, LocalNode;
3192  unsigned short nMarker_Max = config->GetnMarker_Max();
3193  unsigned long iPoint, jPoint, iElem, nDomain, iDomain, jDomain;
3194  unsigned long *nVertexDomain = new unsigned long[nMarker_Max];
3195  unsigned short iNode, jNode;
3196  vector<unsigned long>::iterator it;
3197 
3198  vector<vector<unsigned long> > SendTransfLocal; /*!< \brief Vector to store the type of transformation for this send point. */
3199  vector<vector<unsigned long> > ReceivedTransfLocal; /*!< \brief Vector to store the type of transformation for this received point. */
3200  vector<vector<unsigned long> > SendDomainLocal; /*!< \brief SendDomain[from domain][to domain] and return the point index of the node that must me sended. */
3201  vector<vector<unsigned long> > ReceivedDomainLocal; /*!< \brief SendDomain[from domain][to domain] and return the point index of the node that must me sended. */
3202 
3203  unordered_map<unsigned long, unsigned long>::const_iterator MI;
3204 
3205  if (rank == MASTER_NODE && size > SINGLE_NODE)
3206  cout << "Establishing MPI communication patterns." << endl;
3207 
3208  nDomain = size;
3209 
3210  SendTransfLocal.resize(nDomain);
3211  ReceivedTransfLocal.resize(nDomain);
3212  SendDomainLocal.resize(nDomain);
3213  ReceivedDomainLocal.resize(nDomain);
3214 
3215  /*--- Loop over the all the points of the elements on this rank in order
3216  to find the points with different colors. Create the send/received lists
3217  from this information. ---*/
3218 
3219  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nElem; iElem++) {
3220  for (iNode = 0; iNode < elem[iElem]->GetnNodes(); iNode++) {
3221 
3222  iPoint = elem[iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
3223  iDomain = nodes->GetColor(iPoint);
3224 
3225  if (iDomain == (unsigned long) rank) {
3226  for (jNode = 0; jNode < elem[iElem]->GetnNodes(); jNode++) {
3227 
3228  jPoint = elem[iElem]->GetNode(jNode);
3229  jDomain = nodes->GetColor(jPoint);
3230 
3231  /*--- If one of the neighbors is a different color and connected
3232  by an edge, then we add them to the list. ---*/
3233 
3234  if (iDomain != jDomain) {
3235 
3236  /*--- We send from iDomain to jDomain the value of iPoint,
3237  we save the global value becuase we need to sort the lists. ---*/
3238 
3239  SendDomainLocal[jDomain].push_back(Local_to_Global_Point[iPoint]);
3240 
3241  /*--- We send from jDomain to iDomain the value of jPoint,
3242  we save the global value becuase we need to sort the lists. ---*/
3243 
3244  ReceivedDomainLocal[jDomain].push_back(Local_to_Global_Point[jPoint]);
3245 
3246  }
3247  }
3248  }
3249  }
3250  }
3251 
3252  /*--- Sort the points that must be sent and delete repeated points, note
3253  that the sorting should be done with the global index (not the local). ---*/
3254 
3255  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++) {
3256  sort(SendDomainLocal[iDomain].begin(), SendDomainLocal[iDomain].end());
3257  it = unique(SendDomainLocal[iDomain].begin(), SendDomainLocal[iDomain].end());
3258  SendDomainLocal[iDomain].resize(it - SendDomainLocal[iDomain].begin());
3259  }
3260 
3261  /*--- Sort the points that must be received and delete repeated points, note
3262  that the sorting should be done with the global point (not the local). ---*/
3263 
3264  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++) {
3265  sort(ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain].begin(), ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain].end());
3266  it = unique( ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain].begin(), ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain].end());
3267  ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain].resize(it - ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain].begin());
3268  }
3269 
3270  /*--- Create Global to Local Point array, note that the array is smaller (Max_GlobalPoint) than the total
3271  number of points in the simulation ---*/
3272  Max_GlobalPoint = 0;
3273  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
3274  if (Local_to_Global_Point[iPoint] > (long)Max_GlobalPoint)
3275  Max_GlobalPoint = Local_to_Global_Point[iPoint];
3276  }
3277 
3278  /*--- Set the value of some of the points ---*/
3279  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++)
3280  Global_to_Local_Point[Local_to_Global_Point[iPoint]] = iPoint;
3281 
3282  /*--- Add the new MPI send boundaries, reset the transformation,
3283  and save the local value. ---*/
3284 
3285  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++) {
3286  if (SendDomainLocal[iDomain].size() != 0) {
3287  nVertexDomain[nMarker] = SendDomainLocal[iDomain].size();
3288  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexDomain[nMarker]; iVertex++) {
3289 
3290  MI = Global_to_Local_Point.find(SendDomainLocal[iDomain][iVertex]);
3291  if (MI != Global_to_Local_Point.end())
3292  iPoint = Global_to_Local_Point[SendDomainLocal[iDomain][iVertex]];
3293  else iPoint = std::numeric_limits<unsigned long>::max();
3294 
3295  SendDomainLocal[iDomain][iVertex] = iPoint;
3296  SendTransfLocal[iDomain].push_back(0);
3297  }
3298  nElem_Bound[nMarker] = nVertexDomain[nMarker];
3299  bound[nMarker] = new CPrimalGrid*[nElem_Bound[nMarker]];
3300  nMarker++;
3301  }
3302  }
3303 
3304  /*--- Add the new MPI receive boundaries, reset the transformation, and save the local value ---*/
3305  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++) {
3306  if (ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain].size() != 0) {
3307  nVertexDomain[nMarker] = ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain].size();
3308  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexDomain[nMarker]; iVertex++) {
3309 
3310  MI = Global_to_Local_Point.find(ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain][iVertex]);
3311  if (MI != Global_to_Local_Point.end())
3312  iPoint = Global_to_Local_Point[ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain][iVertex]];
3313  else iPoint = std::numeric_limits<unsigned long>::max();
3314 
3315  ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain][iVertex] = iPoint;
3316  ReceivedTransfLocal[iDomain].push_back(0);
3317  }
3318  nElem_Bound[nMarker] = nVertexDomain[nMarker];
3319  bound[nMarker] = new CPrimalGrid*[nElem_Bound[nMarker]];
3320  nMarker++;
3321  }
3322  }
3323 
3324  /*--- First compute the Send/Receive boundaries ---*/
3325  Counter_Send = 0; Counter_Receive = 0;
3326  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++)
3327  if (SendDomainLocal[iDomain].size() != 0) Counter_Send++;
3328 
3329  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++)
3330  if (ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain].size() != 0) Counter_Receive++;
3331 
3332  iMarkerSend = nMarker - Counter_Send - Counter_Receive;
3333  iMarkerReceive = nMarker - Counter_Receive;
3334 
3335  /*--- First we do the send ---*/
3336  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++) {
3337  if (SendDomainLocal[iDomain].size() != 0) {
3338  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < GetnElem_Bound(iMarkerSend); iVertex++) {
3339  LocalNode = SendDomainLocal[iDomain][iVertex];
3340  bound[iMarkerSend][iVertex] = new CVertexMPI(LocalNode);
3341  bound[iMarkerSend][iVertex]->SetRotation_Type(SendTransfLocal[iDomain][iVertex]);
3342  }
3343  Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarkerSend] = iDomain+1;
3344  iMarkerSend++;
3345  }
3346  }
3347 
3348  /*--- Second we do the receive ---*/
3349  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++) {
3350  if (ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain].size() != 0) {
3351  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < GetnElem_Bound(iMarkerReceive); iVertex++) {
3352  LocalNode = ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain][iVertex];
3353  bound[iMarkerReceive][iVertex] = new CVertexMPI(LocalNode);
3354  bound[iMarkerReceive][iVertex]->SetRotation_Type(ReceivedTransfLocal[iDomain][iVertex]);
3355  }
3356  Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarkerReceive] = -(iDomain+1);
3357  iMarkerReceive++;
3358  }
3359  }
3360 
3361  /*--- Free memory ---*/
3362 
3363  delete [] nVertexDomain;
3364 
3365 }
3366 
3367 void CPhysicalGeometry::SetBoundaries(CConfig *config) {
3368 
3369  unsigned long iElem_Bound, TotalElem, *nElem_Bound_Copy, iVertex_;
3370  string Grid_Marker;
3371  unsigned short iDomain, nDomain, iMarkersDomain, iLoop, *DomainCount, nMarker_Physical, Duplicate_SendReceive, *DomainSendCount,
3372  **DomainSendMarkers, *DomainReceiveCount, **DomainReceiveMarkers, nMarker_SendRecv, iMarker, iMarker_;
3373  CPrimalGrid*** bound_Copy;
3374  short *Marker_All_SendRecv_Copy;
3375  bool CheckStart;
3376 
3377  nDomain = size+1;
3378 
3379  /*--- Count the number of physical markers
3380  in the boundaries ---*/
3381 
3382  nMarker_Physical = 0;
3383  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
3384  if (bound[iMarker][0]->GetVTK_Type() != VERTEX) {
3385  nMarker_Physical++;
3386  }
3387  }
3388 
3389  /*--- Identify if there are markers that send/received with the same domain,
3390  they should be together---*/
3391 
3392  Duplicate_SendReceive = 0;
3393  for (iLoop = 0; iLoop < 2; iLoop++) {
3394 
3395  DomainCount = new unsigned short [nDomain];
3396 
3397  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++)
3398  DomainCount[iDomain] = 0;
3399 
3400  if (iLoop == 0) {
3401  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++)
3402  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++)
3403  if (bound[iMarker][0]->GetVTK_Type() == VERTEX)
3404  if (Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker] == iDomain) DomainCount[iDomain]++;
3405  }
3406  else {
3407  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++)
3408  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++)
3409  if (bound[iMarker][0]->GetVTK_Type() == VERTEX)
3410  if (Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker] == -iDomain) DomainCount[iDomain]++;
3411  }
3412 
3413  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++)
3414  if (DomainCount[iDomain] > 1) Duplicate_SendReceive++;
3415 
3416  delete [] DomainCount;
3417 
3418  }
3419 
3420  DomainSendCount = new unsigned short [nDomain];
3421  DomainSendMarkers = new unsigned short *[nDomain];
3422  DomainReceiveCount = new unsigned short [nDomain];
3423  DomainReceiveMarkers = new unsigned short *[nDomain];
3424 
3425  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++) {
3426  DomainSendCount[iDomain] = 0;
3427  DomainSendMarkers[iDomain] = new unsigned short [nMarker];
3428 
3429  DomainReceiveCount[iDomain] = 0;
3430  DomainReceiveMarkers[iDomain] = new unsigned short [nMarker];
3431  }
3432 
3433  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++) {
3434  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
3435  if (bound[iMarker][0]->GetVTK_Type() == VERTEX) {
3436  if (Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker] == iDomain) {
3437  DomainSendMarkers[iDomain][DomainSendCount[iDomain]] = iMarker;
3438  DomainSendCount[iDomain]++;
3439  }
3440  if (Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker] == -iDomain) {
3441  DomainReceiveMarkers[iDomain][DomainReceiveCount[iDomain]] = iMarker;
3442  DomainReceiveCount[iDomain]++;
3443  }
3444  }
3445  }
3446  }
3447 
3448  /*--- Create an structure to store the Send/Receive
3449  boundaries, because they require some reorganization ---*/
3450 
3451  nMarker_SendRecv = nMarker - nMarker_Physical - Duplicate_SendReceive;
3452  bound_Copy = new CPrimalGrid**[nMarker_Physical + nMarker_SendRecv];
3453  nElem_Bound_Copy = new unsigned long [nMarker_Physical + nMarker_SendRecv];
3454  Marker_All_SendRecv_Copy = new short [nMarker_Physical + nMarker_SendRecv];
3455  iMarker_ = nMarker_Physical;
3456  iVertex_ = 0;
3457  CheckStart = false;
3458 
3459  /*--- Copy and allocate the physical markers in the data structure ---*/
3460 
3461  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
3462  if (bound[iMarker][0]->GetVTK_Type() != VERTEX) {
3463 
3464  nElem_Bound_Copy[iMarker] = nElem_Bound[iMarker];
3465  bound_Copy[iMarker] = new CPrimalGrid* [nElem_Bound[iMarker]];
3466 
3467  for (iElem_Bound = 0; iElem_Bound < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem_Bound++) {
3468  if (bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetVTK_Type() == LINE)
3469  bound_Copy[iMarker][iElem_Bound] = new CLine(bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(0),
3470  bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(1));
3471  if (bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetVTK_Type() == TRIANGLE)
3472 
3473  bound_Copy[iMarker][iElem_Bound] = new CTriangle(bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(0),
3474  bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(1),
3475  bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(2));
3476  if (bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetVTK_Type() == QUADRILATERAL)
3477  bound_Copy[iMarker][iElem_Bound] = new CQuadrilateral(bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(0),
3478  bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(1),
3479  bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(2),
3480  bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(3));
3481  }
3482  }
3483  }
3484 
3485 
3486  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++) {
3487 
3488  /*--- Compute the total number of elements (adding all the
3489  boundaries with the same Send/Receive ---*/
3490 
3491  if (DomainSendCount[iDomain] != 0) {
3492  TotalElem = 0;
3493  for (iMarkersDomain = 0; iMarkersDomain < DomainSendCount[iDomain]; iMarkersDomain++) {
3494  iMarker = DomainSendMarkers[iDomain][iMarkersDomain];
3495  TotalElem += nElem_Bound[iMarker];
3496  }
3497  if (CheckStart) iMarker_++;
3498  CheckStart = true;
3499  iVertex_ = 0;
3500  nElem_Bound_Copy[iMarker_] = TotalElem;
3501  bound_Copy[iMarker_] = new CPrimalGrid*[TotalElem];
3502  }
3503 
3504  for (iMarkersDomain = 0; iMarkersDomain < DomainSendCount[iDomain]; iMarkersDomain++) {
3505  iMarker = DomainSendMarkers[iDomain][iMarkersDomain];
3506  Marker_All_SendRecv_Copy[iMarker_] = Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker];
3507 
3508  for (iElem_Bound = 0; iElem_Bound < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem_Bound++) {
3509  bound_Copy[iMarker_][iVertex_] = new CVertexMPI(bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(0));
3510  bound_Copy[iMarker_][iVertex_]->SetRotation_Type(bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetRotation_Type());
3511  iVertex_++;
3512  }
3513 
3514  }
3515 
3516  /*--- Compute the total number of elements (adding all the
3517  boundaries with the same Send/Receive ---*/
3518 
3519  if (DomainReceiveCount[iDomain] != 0) {
3520  TotalElem = 0;
3521  for (iMarkersDomain = 0; iMarkersDomain < DomainReceiveCount[iDomain]; iMarkersDomain++) {
3522  iMarker = DomainReceiveMarkers[iDomain][iMarkersDomain];
3523  TotalElem += nElem_Bound[iMarker];
3524  }
3525  if (CheckStart) iMarker_++;
3526  CheckStart = true;
3527  iVertex_ = 0;
3528  nElem_Bound_Copy[iMarker_] = TotalElem;
3529  bound_Copy[iMarker_] = new CPrimalGrid*[TotalElem];
3530 
3531  }
3532 
3533  for (iMarkersDomain = 0; iMarkersDomain < DomainReceiveCount[iDomain]; iMarkersDomain++) {
3534  iMarker = DomainReceiveMarkers[iDomain][iMarkersDomain];
3535  Marker_All_SendRecv_Copy[iMarker_] = Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker];
3536 
3537  for (iElem_Bound = 0; iElem_Bound < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem_Bound++) {
3538  bound_Copy[iMarker_][iVertex_] = new CVertexMPI(bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(0));
3539  bound_Copy[iMarker_][iVertex_]->SetRotation_Type(bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetRotation_Type());
3540  iVertex_++;
3541  }
3542 
3543  }
3544 
3545  }
3546 
3547  delete [] DomainSendCount;
3548  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++)
3549  delete [] DomainSendMarkers[iDomain];
3550  delete[] DomainSendMarkers;
3551 
3552  delete [] DomainReceiveCount;
3553  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++)
3554  delete [] DomainReceiveMarkers[iDomain];
3555  delete[] DomainReceiveMarkers;
3556 
3557  /*--- Deallocate the bound variables ---*/
3558 
3559  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
3560  for (iElem_Bound = 0; iElem_Bound < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem_Bound++)
3561  if (bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound] != nullptr) delete bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound];
3562  if (bound[iMarker] != nullptr) delete [] bound[iMarker];
3563  }
3564  delete [] bound;
3565 
3566  /*--- Allocate the new bound variables, and set the number of markers ---*/
3567 
3568  bound = bound_Copy;
3569  nMarker = nMarker_Physical + nMarker_SendRecv;
3570 
3571  config->SetnMarker_All(nMarker);
3572 
3573  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
3574  nElem_Bound[iMarker] = nElem_Bound_Copy[iMarker];
3575  }
3576 
3577  for (iMarker = nMarker_Physical; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
3578  Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker] = Marker_All_SendRecv_Copy[iMarker];
3579  config->SetMarker_All_SendRecv(iMarker, Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker]);
3580  config->SetMarker_All_TagBound(iMarker, "SEND_RECEIVE");
3581  }
3582 
3583  /*--- Update config information storing the boundary information in the right place ---*/
3584 
3585  for (iMarker = 0 ; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
3586 
3587  string Marker_Tag = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(iMarker);
3588 
3589  if (Marker_Tag != "SEND_RECEIVE") {
3590 
3591  /*--- Update config information storing the boundary information in the right place ---*/
3592 
3593  Tag_to_Marker[config->GetMarker_CfgFile_TagBound(Marker_Tag)] = Marker_Tag;
3594  config->SetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_KindBC(Marker_Tag));
3595  config->SetMarker_All_Monitoring(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Monitoring(Marker_Tag));
3596  config->SetMarker_All_GeoEval(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_GeoEval(Marker_Tag));
3597  config->SetMarker_All_Designing(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Designing(Marker_Tag));
3598  config->SetMarker_All_Plotting(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Plotting(Marker_Tag));
3599  config->SetMarker_All_Analyze(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Analyze(Marker_Tag));
3600  config->SetMarker_All_ZoneInterface(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_ZoneInterface(Marker_Tag));
3601  config->SetMarker_All_DV(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_DV(Marker_Tag));
3602  config->SetMarker_All_Moving(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Moving(Marker_Tag));
3603  config->SetMarker_All_Deform_Mesh(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Deform_Mesh(Marker_Tag));
3604  config->SetMarker_All_Deform_Mesh_Sym_Plane(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Deform_Mesh_Sym_Plane(Marker_Tag));
3605  config->SetMarker_All_Fluid_Load(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Fluid_Load(Marker_Tag));
3606  config->SetMarker_All_PyCustom(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_PyCustom(Marker_Tag));
3607  config->SetMarker_All_PerBound(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_PerBound(Marker_Tag));
3608  config->SetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Turbomachinery(Marker_Tag));
3609  config->SetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_TurbomachineryFlag(Marker_Tag));
3610  config->SetMarker_All_MixingPlaneInterface(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_MixingPlaneInterface(Marker_Tag));
3611  config->SetMarker_All_SobolevBC(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_SobolevBC(Marker_Tag));
3612 
3613  }
3614 
3615  /*--- Send-Receive boundaries definition ---*/
3616 
3617  else {
3618 
3619  config->SetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker, SEND_RECEIVE);
3620  config->SetMarker_All_Monitoring(iMarker, NO);
3621  config->SetMarker_All_GeoEval(iMarker, NO);
3622  config->SetMarker_All_Designing(iMarker, NO);
3623  config->SetMarker_All_Plotting(iMarker, NO);
3624  config->SetMarker_All_Analyze(iMarker, NO);
3625  config->SetMarker_All_ZoneInterface(iMarker, NO);
3626  config->SetMarker_All_DV(iMarker, NO);
3627  config->SetMarker_All_Moving(iMarker, NO);
3628  config->SetMarker_All_Deform_Mesh(iMarker, NO);
3629  config->SetMarker_All_Deform_Mesh_Sym_Plane(iMarker, NO);
3630  config->SetMarker_All_Fluid_Load(iMarker, NO);
3631  config->SetMarker_All_PyCustom(iMarker, NO);
3632  config->SetMarker_All_PerBound(iMarker, NO);
3633  config->SetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker, NO);
3634  config->SetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker, NO);
3635  config->SetMarker_All_MixingPlaneInterface(iMarker, NO);
3636  config->SetMarker_All_SobolevBC(iMarker, NO);
3637 
3638  for (iElem_Bound = 0; iElem_Bound < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem_Bound++) {
3639  if (config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(iMarker) < 0)
3640  nodes->SetDomain(bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(0), false);
3641  }
3642 
3643  }
3644 
3645  /*--- Loop over the surface element to set the boundaries ---*/
3646 
3647  unsigned long Point_Surface, iElem_Surface;
3648  unsigned short iNode_Surface;
3649 
3650  for (iElem_Surface = 0; iElem_Surface < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem_Surface++) {
3651  for (iNode_Surface = 0; iNode_Surface < bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetnNodes(); iNode_Surface++) {
3652  Point_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(iNode_Surface);
3653  nodes->SetBoundary(Point_Surface, nMarker);
3654  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != SEND_RECEIVE &&
3655  config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != INTERNAL_BOUNDARY &&
3656  config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != NEARFIELD_BOUNDARY &&
3657  config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != PERIODIC_BOUNDARY)
3658  nodes->SetPhysicalBoundary(Point_Surface, true);
3659 
3660  if (config->GetSolid_Wall(iMarker))
3661  nodes->SetSolidBoundary(Point_Surface, true);
3662 
3663  if (config->GetViscous_Wall(iMarker))
3664  nodes->SetViscousBoundary(Point_Surface, true);
3665 
3666  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == PERIODIC_BOUNDARY)
3667  nodes->SetPeriodicBoundary(Point_Surface, true);
3668  }
3669  }
3670 
3671  }
3672 
3673  delete [] Marker_All_SendRecv_Copy;
3674  delete [] nElem_Bound_Copy;
3675 }
3676 
3677 void CPhysicalGeometry::Read_Mesh_FVM(CConfig *config,
3678  string val_mesh_filename,
3679  unsigned short val_iZone,
3680  unsigned short val_nZone) {
3681 
3682  /*--- Initialize counters for local/global points & elements ---*/
3683 
3684  Global_nPoint = 0; Global_nPointDomain = 0;
3685  Global_nElem = 0; Global_nElemDomain = 0;
3686  nelem_edge = 0; Global_nelem_edge = 0;
3687  nelem_triangle = 0; Global_nelem_triangle = 0;
3688  nelem_quad = 0; Global_nelem_quad = 0;
3689  nelem_tetra = 0; Global_nelem_tetra = 0;
3690  nelem_hexa = 0; Global_nelem_hexa = 0;
3691  nelem_prism = 0; Global_nelem_prism = 0;
3692  nelem_pyramid = 0; Global_nelem_pyramid = 0;
3693 
3694  /*--- Set the zone number from the input value. ---*/
3695 
3696  nZone = val_nZone;
3697 
3698  /*--- Create a mesh reader to read a CGNS grid into linear partitions. ---*/
3699 
3700  unsigned short val_format = config->GetMesh_FileFormat();
3701 
3702  CMeshReaderFVM *MeshFVM = nullptr;
3703  switch (val_format) {
3704  case SU2:
3705  MeshFVM = new CSU2ASCIIMeshReaderFVM(config, val_iZone, val_nZone);
3706  break;
3707  case CGNS_GRID:
3708  MeshFVM = new CCGNSMeshReaderFVM(config, val_iZone, val_nZone);
3709  break;
3710  case RECTANGLE:
3711  MeshFVM = new CRectangularMeshReaderFVM(config, val_iZone, val_nZone);
3712  break;
3713  case BOX:
3714  MeshFVM = new CBoxMeshReaderFVM(config, val_iZone, val_nZone);
3715  break;
3716  default:
3717  SU2_MPI::Error("Unrecognized mesh format specified!", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
3718  break;
3719  }
3720 
3721  /*--- Store the dimension of the problem ---*/
3722 
3723  nDim = MeshFVM->GetDimension();
3724  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
3725  if (nDim == 2) cout << "Two dimensional problem." << endl;
3726  if (nDim == 3) cout << "Three dimensional problem." << endl;
3727  }
3728 
3729  /*--- Store the local and global number of nodes for this rank. ---*/
3730 
3731  nPoint = MeshFVM->GetNumberOfLocalPoints();
3732  nPointDomain = MeshFVM->GetNumberOfLocalPoints();
3733  Global_nPoint = MeshFVM->GetNumberOfGlobalPoints();
3734  Global_nPointDomain = MeshFVM->GetNumberOfGlobalPoints();
3735 
3736  if ((rank == MASTER_NODE) && (size > SINGLE_NODE)) {
3737  cout << Global_nPoint << " grid points before partitioning." << endl;
3738  } else if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
3739  cout << Global_nPoint << " grid points." << endl;
3740  }
3741 
3742  /*--- Store the local and global number of interior elements. ---*/
3743 
3744  nElem = MeshFVM->GetNumberOfLocalElements();
3745  Global_nElem = MeshFVM->GetNumberOfGlobalElements();
3746  Global_nElemDomain = MeshFVM->GetNumberOfGlobalElements();
3747 
3748  if ((rank == MASTER_NODE) && (size > SINGLE_NODE)) {
3749  cout << Global_nElem << " volume elements before partitioning." << endl;
3750  } else if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
3751  cout << Global_nElem << " volume elements." << endl;
3752  }
3753 
3754  /*--- Load the grid points, volume elements, and surface elements
3755  from the mesh object into the proper SU2 data structures. ---*/
3756 
3757  LoadLinearlyPartitionedPoints(config, MeshFVM);
3758  LoadLinearlyPartitionedVolumeElements(config, MeshFVM);
3759  LoadUnpartitionedSurfaceElements(config, MeshFVM);
3760 
3761  /*--- Prepare the nodal adjacency structures for ParMETIS. ---*/
3762 
3763  PrepareAdjacency(config);
3764 
3765  /*--- Now that we have loaded all information from the mesh,
3766  delete the mesh reader object. ---*/
3767 
3768  delete MeshFVM;
3769 
3770 }
3771 
3772 void CPhysicalGeometry::LoadLinearlyPartitionedPoints(CConfig *config,
3773  CMeshReaderFVM *mesh) {
3774 
3775  /*--- Get the linearly partitioned coordinates from the mesh object. ---*/
3776 
3777  const auto& gridCoords = mesh->GetLocalPointCoordinates();
3778 
3779  /*--- Initialize point counts and the grid node data structure. ---*/
3780 
3781  nodes = new CPoint(nPoint, nDim);
3782 
3783  /*--- Loop over the CGNS grid nodes and load into the SU2 data
3784  structure. Note that since we have performed a linear partitioning
3785  of the grid nodes, we can simply initialize the global index to
3786  the first node that lies on our rank and increment. ---*/
3787 
3788  CLinearPartitioner pointPartitioner(Global_nPointDomain,0);
3789  unsigned long GlobalIndex = pointPartitioner.GetFirstIndexOnRank(rank);
3790  for (unsigned long iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
3791  for (unsigned short iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; ++iDim)
3792  nodes->SetCoord(iPoint, iDim, gridCoords[iDim][iPoint]);
3793  nodes->SetGlobalIndex(iPoint, GlobalIndex);
3794  ++GlobalIndex;
3795  }
3796 
3797 }
3798 
3799 void CPhysicalGeometry::LoadLinearlyPartitionedVolumeElements(CConfig *config,
3800  CMeshReaderFVM *mesh) {
3801 
3802  /*--- Reset the global to local element mapping. ---*/
3803 
3804  Global_to_Local_Elem.clear();
3805 
3806  /*--- Get the volume connectivity from the mesh object. ---*/
3807 
3808  auto& connElems = mesh->GetLocalVolumeElementConnectivity();
3809 
3810  /*--- Allocate space for the CGNS interior elements in our SU2 data
3811  structure. Note that we only instantiate our rank's local set. ---*/
3812 
3813  elem = new CPrimalGrid*[nElem] ();
3814 
3815  /*--- Loop over all of the internal, local volumetric elements. ---*/
3816 
3817  for (unsigned long iElem = 0; iElem < nElem; iElem++) {
3818 
3819  /*--- Get the global ID for this element. This is stored in
3820  the first entry of our connectivity stucture. ---*/
3821 
3822  const auto Global_Index_Elem = connElems[iElem*SU2_CONN_SIZE + 0];
3823  Global_to_Local_Elem[Global_Index_Elem] = iElem;
3824 
3825  /*--- Get the VTK type for this element. This is stored in the
3826  second entry of the connectivity structure. ---*/
3827 
3828  const auto vtk_type = static_cast<int>(connElems[iElem*SU2_CONN_SIZE + 1]);
3829 
3830  /*--- Instantiate this element in the proper SU2 data structure.
3831  During this loop, we also set the global to local element map
3832  for later use and increment the element counts for all types. ---*/
3833 
3834  auto connectivity = &connElems[iElem*SU2_CONN_SIZE + SU2_CONN_SKIP];
3835 
3836  switch(vtk_type) {
3837 
3838  case TRIANGLE:
3839  elem[iElem] = new CTriangle(connectivity[0],
3840  connectivity[1],
3841  connectivity[2]);
3842  nelem_triangle++;
3843  break;
3844 
3845  case QUADRILATERAL:
3846  elem[iElem] = new CQuadrilateral(connectivity[0],
3847  connectivity[1],
3848  connectivity[2],
3849  connectivity[3]);
3850  nelem_quad++;
3851  break;
3852 
3853  case TETRAHEDRON:
3854  elem[iElem] = new CTetrahedron(connectivity[0],
3855  connectivity[1],
3856  connectivity[2],
3857  connectivity[3]);
3858  nelem_tetra++;
3859  break;
3860 
3861  case HEXAHEDRON:
3862  elem[iElem] = new CHexahedron(connectivity[0],
3863  connectivity[1],
3864  connectivity[2],
3865  connectivity[3],
3866  connectivity[4],
3867  connectivity[5],
3868  connectivity[6],
3869  connectivity[7]);
3870  nelem_hexa++;
3871  break;
3872 
3873  case PRISM:
3874  elem[iElem] = new CPrism(connectivity[0],
3875  connectivity[1],
3876  connectivity[2],
3877  connectivity[3],
3878  connectivity[4],
3879  connectivity[5]);
3880  nelem_prism++;
3881  break;
3882 
3883  case PYRAMID:
3884  elem[iElem] = new CPyramid(connectivity[0],
3885  connectivity[1],
3886  connectivity[2],
3887  connectivity[3],
3888  connectivity[4]);
3889  nelem_pyramid++;
3890  break;
3891 
3892  default:
3893  SU2_MPI::Error("Element type not supported!", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
3894  break;
3895  }
3896  }
3897 
3898  /*--- Reduce the global counts of all element types found in
3899  the CGNS grid with all ranks. ---*/
3900 
3901  auto reduce = [](unsigned long p, unsigned long& t) {
3902  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&p, &t, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
3903  };
3904  reduce(nelem_triangle, Global_nelem_triangle);
3905  reduce(nelem_quad, Global_nelem_quad);
3906  reduce(nelem_hexa, Global_nelem_hexa);
3907  reduce(nelem_tetra, Global_nelem_tetra);
3908  reduce(nelem_prism, Global_nelem_prism);
3909  reduce(nelem_pyramid, Global_nelem_pyramid);
3910 
3911 }
3912 
3913 void CPhysicalGeometry::LoadUnpartitionedSurfaceElements(CConfig *config,
3914  CMeshReaderFVM *mesh) {
3915 
3916  /*--- The master node takes care of loading all markers and
3917  surface elements from the file. This information is later
3918  put into linear partitions to make its redistribution easier
3919  after we call ParMETIS. ---*/
3920 
3921  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
3922 
3923  const vector<string> &sectionNames = mesh->GetMarkerNames();
3924 
3925  /*--- Store the number of markers and print to the screen. ---*/
3926 
3927  nMarker = mesh->GetNumberOfMarkers();
3928  config->SetnMarker_All(nMarker);
3929  cout << nMarker << " surface markers." << endl;
3930 
3931  /*--- Create the data structure for boundary elements. ---*/
3932 
3933  bound = new CPrimalGrid**[nMarker];
3934  nElem_Bound = new unsigned long [nMarker];
3935  Tag_to_Marker = new string [config->GetnMarker_Max()];
3936 
3937  /*--- Set some temporaries for the loop below. ---*/
3938 
3939  int npe, vtk_type;
3940  unsigned long iElem = 0;
3941  vector<unsigned long> connectivity(N_POINTS_HEXAHEDRON);
3942 
3943  /*--- Loop over all sections that we extracted from the CGNS file
3944  that were identified as boundary element sections so that we can
3945  store those elements into our SU2 data structures. ---*/
3946 
3947  for (int iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
3948 
3949  /*--- Initialize some counter variables ---*/
3950 
3951  nelem_edge_bound = 0; nelem_triangle_bound = 0;
3952  nelem_quad_bound = 0; iElem = 0;
3953 
3954  /*--- Get the string name for this marker. ---*/
3955 
3956  string Marker_Tag = sectionNames[iMarker];
3957 
3958  /* Get the marker info and surface connectivity from the mesh object. */
3959 
3960  const unsigned long surfElems =
3961  mesh->GetNumberOfSurfaceElementsForMarker(iMarker);
3962 
3963  const vector<unsigned long> &connElems =
3964  mesh->GetSurfaceElementConnectivityForMarker(iMarker);
3965 
3966  /*--- Set the number of boundary elements in this marker. ---*/
3967 
3968  nElem_Bound[iMarker] = surfElems;
3969 
3970  /*--- Report the number and name of the marker to the console. ---*/
3971 
3972  cout << nElem_Bound[iMarker] << " boundary elements in index ";
3973  cout << iMarker <<" (Marker = " <<Marker_Tag<< ")." << endl;
3974 
3975  /*--- Instantiate the list of elements in the data structure. ---*/
3976 
3977  bound[iMarker] = new CPrimalGrid*[nElem_Bound[iMarker]];
3978 
3979  for (unsigned long jElem = 0; jElem < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; jElem++ ) {
3980 
3981  /*--- Not a mixed section. We already know the element type,
3982  which is stored ---*/
3983 
3984  vtk_type = (int)connElems[jElem*SU2_CONN_SIZE + 1];
3985 
3986  /*--- Store the loop size more easily. ---*/
3987 
3988  npe = (int)(SU2_CONN_SIZE-SU2_CONN_SKIP);
3989 
3990  /*--- Store the nodes for this element more clearly. ---*/
3991 
3992  for (int j = 0; j < npe; j++) {
3993  unsigned long nn = jElem*SU2_CONN_SIZE + SU2_CONN_SKIP + j;
3994  connectivity[j] = connElems[nn];
3995  }
3996 
3997  /*--- Instantiate the boundary element object. ---*/
3998 
3999  switch(vtk_type) {
4000  case LINE:
4001  bound[iMarker][iElem] = new CLine(connectivity[0],
4002  connectivity[1]);
4003  iElem++; nelem_edge_bound++; break;
4004  case TRIANGLE:
4005  bound[iMarker][iElem] = new CTriangle(connectivity[0],
4006  connectivity[1],
4007  connectivity[2]);
4008  iElem++; nelem_triangle_bound++; break;
4009  case QUADRILATERAL:
4010  bound[iMarker][iElem] = new CQuadrilateral(connectivity[0],
4011  connectivity[1],
4012  connectivity[2],
4013  connectivity[3]);
4014  iElem++; nelem_quad_bound++; break;
4015  }
4016 
4017  }
4018 
4019  /*--- Update config file lists in order to store the boundary
4020  information for this marker in the correct place. ---*/
4021 
4022  Tag_to_Marker[config->GetMarker_CfgFile_TagBound(Marker_Tag)] = Marker_Tag;
4023  config->SetMarker_All_TagBound(iMarker, Marker_Tag);
4024  config->SetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_KindBC(Marker_Tag));
4025  config->SetMarker_All_Monitoring(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Monitoring(Marker_Tag));
4026  config->SetMarker_All_GeoEval(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_GeoEval(Marker_Tag));
4027  config->SetMarker_All_Designing(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Designing(Marker_Tag));
4028  config->SetMarker_All_Plotting(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Plotting(Marker_Tag));
4029  config->SetMarker_All_Analyze(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Analyze(Marker_Tag));
4030  config->SetMarker_All_ZoneInterface(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_ZoneInterface(Marker_Tag));
4031  config->SetMarker_All_DV(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_DV(Marker_Tag));
4032  config->SetMarker_All_Moving(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Moving(Marker_Tag));
4033  config->SetMarker_All_Deform_Mesh(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Deform_Mesh(Marker_Tag));
4034  config->SetMarker_All_Deform_Mesh_Sym_Plane(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Deform_Mesh_Sym_Plane(Marker_Tag));
4035  config->SetMarker_All_Fluid_Load(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Fluid_Load(Marker_Tag));
4036  config->SetMarker_All_PyCustom(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_PyCustom(Marker_Tag));
4037  config->SetMarker_All_PerBound(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_PerBound(Marker_Tag));
4038  config->SetMarker_All_SendRecv(iMarker, NONE);
4039  config->SetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Turbomachinery(Marker_Tag));
4040  config->SetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_TurbomachineryFlag(Marker_Tag));
4041  config->SetMarker_All_MixingPlaneInterface(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_MixingPlaneInterface(Marker_Tag));
4042  config->SetMarker_All_SobolevBC(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_SobolevBC(Marker_Tag));
4043 
4044  }
4045  }
4046 
4047 }
4048 
4049 void CPhysicalGeometry::PrepareAdjacency(const CConfig *config) {
4050 
4051 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
4052 #ifdef HAVE_PARMETIS
4053 
4054  /*--- Resize the vector for the adjacency information (ParMETIS). ---*/
4055 
4056  adj_nodes.clear();
4057  adj_nodes.resize(nPoint);
4058 
4059  /*--- Create a partitioner object so we can transform the global
4060  index values stored in the elements to a local index. ---*/
4061 
4062  CLinearPartitioner pointPartitioner(Global_nPointDomain,0);
4063  const unsigned long firstIndex = pointPartitioner.GetFirstIndexOnRank(rank);
4064 
4065  /*--- Loop over all elements that are now loaded and store adjacency. ---*/
4066 
4067  for (unsigned long iElem = 0; iElem < nElem; iElem++) {
4068 
4069  /*--- Store the connectivity for this element more easily. ---*/
4070  unsigned long connectivity[8] = {0};
4071  for (unsigned long iNode = 0; iNode < elem[iElem]->GetnNodes(); iNode++) {
4072  connectivity[iNode] = elem[iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
4073  }
4074 
4075  /*--- Instantiate this element and build adjacency structure. ---*/
4076 
4077  switch(elem[iElem]->GetVTK_Type()) {
4078 
4079  case TRIANGLE:
4080 
4081  /*--- Decide whether we need to store the adjacency for any nodes
4082  in the current element, i.e., check if any of the nodes have a
4083  global index value within the range of our linear partitioning. ---*/
4084 
4085  for (unsigned long iNode = 0; iNode < N_POINTS_TRIANGLE; iNode++) {
4086 
4087  const long local_index = connectivity[iNode]-firstIndex;
4088 
4089  if ((local_index >= 0) && (local_index < (long)nPoint)) {
4090 
4091  /*--- This node is within our linear partition.
4092  Add the neighboring nodes to this nodes' adjacency list. ---*/
4093 
4094  for (unsigned long jNode = 0; jNode < N_POINTS_TRIANGLE; jNode++) {
4095 
4096  /*--- Build adjacency assuming the VTK connectivity ---*/
4097 
4098  if (iNode != jNode)
4099  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[jNode]);
4100  }
4101  }
4102  }
4103 
4104  break;
4105 
4106  case QUADRILATERAL:
4107 
4108  /*--- Decide whether we need to store the adjacency for any nodes
4109  in the current element, i.e., check if any of the nodes have a
4110  global index value within the range of our linear partitioning. ---*/
4111 
4112  for (unsigned long iNode = 0; iNode < N_POINTS_QUADRILATERAL; iNode++) {
4113 
4114  const long local_index = connectivity[iNode]-firstIndex;
4115 
4116  if ((local_index >= 0) && (local_index < (long)nPoint)) {
4117 
4118  /*--- This node is within our linear partition.
4119  Add the neighboring nodes to this nodes' adjacency list. ---*/
4120 
4121  /*--- Build adjacency assuming the VTK connectivity ---*/
4122 
4123  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode+1)%4]);
4124  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode+3)%4]);
4125  }
4126  }
4127 
4128  break;
4129 
4130  case TETRAHEDRON:
4131 
4132  /*--- Decide whether we need to store the adjacency for any nodes
4133  in the current element, i.e., check if any of the nodes have a
4134  global index value within the range of our linear partitioning. ---*/
4135 
4136  for (unsigned long iNode = 0; iNode < N_POINTS_TETRAHEDRON; iNode++) {
4137 
4138  const long local_index = connectivity[iNode]-firstIndex;
4139 
4140  if ((local_index >= 0) && (local_index < (long)nPoint)) {
4141 
4142  /*--- This node is within our linear partition.
4143  Add the neighboring nodes to this nodes' adjacency list. ---*/
4144 
4145  for (unsigned long jNode = 0; jNode < N_POINTS_TETRAHEDRON; jNode++) {
4146 
4147  /*--- Build adjacency assuming the VTK connectivity ---*/
4148 
4149  if (iNode != jNode)
4150  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[jNode]);
4151  }
4152  }
4153  }
4154 
4155  break;
4156 
4157  case HEXAHEDRON:
4158 
4159  /*--- Decide whether we need to store the adjacency for any nodes
4160  in the current element, i.e., check if any of the nodes have a
4161  global index value within the range of our linear partitioning. ---*/
4162 
4163  for (unsigned long iNode = 0; iNode < N_POINTS_HEXAHEDRON; iNode++) {
4164 
4165  const long local_index = connectivity[iNode]-firstIndex;
4166 
4167  if ((local_index >= 0) && (local_index < (long)nPoint)) {
4168 
4169  /*--- This node is within our linear partition.
4170  Add the neighboring nodes to this nodes' adjacency list. ---*/
4171 
4172  /*--- Build adjacency assuming the VTK connectivity ---*/
4173 
4174  if (iNode < 4) {
4175  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode+1)%4]);
4176  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode+3)%4]);
4177  } else {
4178  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode-3)%4+4]);
4179  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode-1)%4+4]);
4180  }
4181  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode+4)%8]);
4182  }
4183  }
4184 
4185  break;
4186 
4187  case PRISM:
4188 
4189  /*--- Decide whether we need to store the adjacency for any nodes
4190  in the current element, i.e., check if any of the nodes have a
4191  global index value within the range of our linear partitioning. ---*/
4192 
4193  for (unsigned long iNode = 0; iNode < N_POINTS_PRISM; iNode++) {
4194 
4195  const long local_index = connectivity[iNode]-firstIndex;
4196 
4197  if ((local_index >= 0) && (local_index < (long)nPoint)) {
4198 
4199  /*--- This node is within our linear partition.
4200  Add the neighboring nodes to this nodes' adjacency list. ---*/
4201 
4202  /*--- Build adjacency assuming the VTK connectivity ---*/
4203 
4204  if (iNode < 3) {
4205  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode+1)%3]);
4206  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode+2)%3]);
4207  } else {
4208  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode-2)%3+3]);
4209  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode-1)%3+3]);
4210  }
4211  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode+3)%6]);
4212  }
4213  }
4214 
4215  break;
4216 
4217  case PYRAMID:
4218 
4219  /*--- Decide whether we need to store the adjacency for any nodes
4220  in the current element, i.e., check if any of the nodes have a
4221  global index value within the range of our linear partitioning. ---*/
4222 
4223  for (unsigned long iNode = 0; iNode < N_POINTS_PYRAMID; iNode++) {
4224 
4225  const long local_index = connectivity[iNode]-firstIndex;
4226 
4227  if ((local_index >= 0) && (local_index < (long)nPoint)) {
4228 
4229  /*--- This node is within our linear partition.
4230  Add the neighboring nodes to this nodes' adjacency list. ---*/
4231 
4232  /*--- Build adjacency assuming the VTK connectivity ---*/
4233 
4234  if (iNode < 4) {
4235  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode+1)%4]);
4236  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode+3)%4]);
4237  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[4]);
4238  } else {
4239  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[0]);
4240  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[1]);
4241  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[2]);
4242  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[3]);
4243  }
4244  }
4245  }
4246 
4247  break;
4248 
4249  default:
4250  SU2_MPI::Error("Element type not supported!", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
4251  break;
4252  }
4253  }
4254 
4255  /*--- Prepare the adjacency information that ParMETIS will need for
4256  completing the graph partitioning in parallel. ---*/
4257 
4258  SortAdjacency(config);
4259 
4260 #endif
4261 #endif
4262 
4263 }
4264 
4265 void CPhysicalGeometry::Check_IntElem_Orientation(const CConfig *config) {
4266 
4267  unsigned long tria_flip=0, quad_flip=0, tet_flip=0, prism_flip=0, hexa_flip=0, pyram_flip=0;
4268  unsigned long quad_error=0, prism_error=0, hexa_error=0, pyram_error=0;
4269 
4270  SU2_OMP_PARALLEL_(reduction(+:tria_flip,quad_flip,tet_flip,prism_flip,hexa_flip,pyram_flip)) {
4271 
4272  /*--- Lambda to test triangles. Normal should be positive in the z direction (right hand rule). ---*/
4273  auto checkTria = [this](unsigned long iElem, int Node_1, int Node_2, int Node_3) {
4274  const auto Coord_1 = nodes->GetCoord(elem[iElem]->GetNode(Node_1));
4275  const auto Coord_2 = nodes->GetCoord(elem[iElem]->GetNode(Node_2));
4276  const auto Coord_3 = nodes->GetCoord(elem[iElem]->GetNode(Node_3));
4277  constexpr int nDim = 2;
4278  su2double a[nDim]={0.0}, b[nDim]={0.0};
4279  GeometryToolbox::Distance(nDim, Coord_2, Coord_1, a);
4280  GeometryToolbox::Distance(nDim, Coord_3, Coord_1, b);
4281  return a[0]*b[1]-a[1]*b[0] < 0.0;
4282  };
4283 
4284  /*--- Lambda to test tetrahedrons, volume must be positive,
4285  * the normal of any face must point towards the other point. ---*/
4286  auto checkTetra = [this](unsigned long iElem, int Node_1, int Node_2, int Node_3, int Node_4) {
4287  const auto Coord_1 = nodes->GetCoord(elem[iElem]->GetNode(Node_1));
4288  const auto Coord_2 = nodes->GetCoord(elem[iElem]->GetNode(Node_2));
4289  const auto Coord_3 = nodes->GetCoord(elem[iElem]->GetNode(Node_3));
4290  const auto Coord_4 = nodes->GetCoord(elem[iElem]->GetNode(Node_4));
4291  constexpr int nDim = 3;
4292  su2double a[nDim]={0.0}, b[nDim]={0.0}, c[nDim]={0.0}, n[nDim]={0.0};
4293  GeometryToolbox::Distance(nDim, Coord_2, Coord_1, a);
4294  GeometryToolbox::Distance(nDim, Coord_3, Coord_1, b);
4295  GeometryToolbox::Distance(nDim, Coord_4, Coord_1, c);
4296  GeometryToolbox::CrossProduct(a,b,n);
4297  return GeometryToolbox::DotProduct(nDim,n,c) < 0.0;
4298  };
4299 
4300  /*--- Loop over all the elements. ---*/
4301 
4302  SU2_OMP_FOR_DYN(roundUpDiv(nElem, 2*omp_get_max_threads()))
4303  for (auto iElem = 0ul; iElem < nElem; iElem++) {
4304 
4305  /*--- 2D grid. ---*/
4306 
4307  if (elem[iElem]->GetVTK_Type() == TRIANGLE) {
4308 
4309  if (checkTria(iElem,0,1,2)) {
4310  elem[iElem]->Change_Orientation();
4311  tria_flip++;
4312  }
4313  }
4314 
4315  if (elem[iElem]->GetVTK_Type() == QUADRILATERAL) {
4316 
4317  /*--- Two triangles. ---*/
4318  bool test_1 = checkTria(iElem,0,1,2);
4319  bool test_2 = checkTria(iElem,0,2,3);
4320 
4321  if (test_1 && test_2) {
4322  elem[iElem]->Change_Orientation();
4323  quad_flip++;
4324  }
4325  else if (test_1 || test_2) {
4326  /*--- If one test fails and the other passes the
4327  * element probably has serious problems. ---*/
4328  SU2_OMP_ATOMIC
4329  quad_error++;
4330  }
4331  }
4332 
4333  /*--- 3D grid. ---*/
4334 
4335  if (elem[iElem]->GetVTK_Type() == TETRAHEDRON) {
4336 
4337  if (checkTetra(iElem,0,1,2,3)) {
4338  elem[iElem]->Change_Orientation();
4339  tet_flip++;
4340  }
4341  }
4342 
4343  if (elem[iElem]->GetVTK_Type() == PYRAMID) {
4344 
4345  /*--- Slice across top vertex into 2 tets. ---*/
4346  bool test_1 = checkTetra(iElem,0,1,2,4);
4347  bool test_2 = checkTetra(iElem,2,3,0,4);
4348 
4349  if (test_1 && test_2) {
4350  elem[iElem]->Change_Orientation();
4351  pyram_flip++;
4352  }
4353  else if (test_1 || test_2) {
4354  SU2_OMP_ATOMIC
4355  pyram_error++;
4356  }
4357  }
4358 
4359  if (elem[iElem]->GetVTK_Type() == PRISM) {
4360 
4361  /*--- The triangular faces should point at each other. ---*/
4362  bool test_1 = checkTetra(iElem,0,2,1,3);
4363  bool test_2 = checkTetra(iElem,3,4,5,2);
4364 
4365  if (test_1 && test_2) {
4366  elem[iElem]->Change_Orientation();
4367  prism_flip++;
4368  }
4369  else if (test_1 || test_2) {
4370  SU2_OMP_ATOMIC
4371  prism_error++;
4372  }
4373  }
4374 
4375  if (elem[iElem]->GetVTK_Type() == HEXAHEDRON) {
4376 
4377  /*--- The base points at the top. ---*/
4378  bool test_1 = checkTetra(iElem,0,1,2,5);
4379  bool test_2 = checkTetra(iElem,0,2,3,7);
4380  /*--- The top points at the base. ---*/
4381  bool test_3 = checkTetra(iElem,4,6,5,1);
4382  bool test_4 = checkTetra(iElem,4,7,6,3);
4383 
4384  if (test_1 && test_2 && test_3 && test_4) {
4385  elem[iElem]->Change_Orientation();
4386  hexa_flip++;
4387  }
4388  else if (test_1 || test_2 || test_3 || test_4) {
4389  SU2_OMP_ATOMIC
4390  hexa_error++;
4391  }
4392  }
4393 
4394  }
4395  END_SU2_OMP_FOR
4396  }
4397  END_SU2_OMP_PARALLEL
4398 
4399  auto reduce = [](unsigned long& val) {
4400  unsigned long tmp = val;
4401  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&tmp, &val, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4402  };
4403  reduce(tria_flip); reduce(quad_flip);
4404  reduce(tet_flip); reduce(pyram_flip);
4405  reduce(prism_flip); reduce(hexa_flip);
4406  reduce(quad_error); reduce(pyram_error);
4407  reduce(prism_error); reduce(hexa_error);
4408 
4409  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
4410  string start("There has been a re-orientation of ");
4411  if (tria_flip) cout << start << tria_flip << " TRIANGLE volume elements." << endl;
4412  if (quad_flip) cout << start << quad_flip << " QUADRILATERAL volume elements." << endl;
4413  if (tet_flip) cout << start << tet_flip << " TETRAHEDRON volume elements." << endl;
4414  if (hexa_flip) cout << start << hexa_flip << " HEXAHEDRON volume elements." << endl;
4415  if (pyram_flip) cout << start << pyram_flip << " PYRAMID volume elements." << endl;
4416  if (prism_flip) cout << start << prism_flip << " PRISM volume elements." << endl;
4417 
4418  if (quad_error+pyram_error+prism_error+hexa_error) {
4419  cout << ">>> WARNING: ";
4420  if (quad_error) cout << quad_error << " QUADRILATERAL, ";
4421  if (pyram_error) cout << pyram_error << " PYRAMID, ";
4422  if (prism_error) cout << prism_error << " PRISM, ";
4423  if (hexa_error) cout << hexa_error << " HEXAHEDRON, ";
4424  cout << "volume elements are distorted.\n It was not possible "
4425  "to determine if their orientation is correct." << endl;
4426  }
4427 
4428  if (tria_flip+quad_flip+tet_flip+hexa_flip+pyram_flip+prism_flip+
4429  quad_error+pyram_error+prism_error+hexa_error == 0) {
4430  cout << "All volume elements are correctly orientend." << endl;
4431  }
4432  }
4433 
4434 }
4435 
4436 void CPhysicalGeometry::Check_BoundElem_Orientation(const CConfig *config) {
4437 
4438  unsigned long line_flip = 0, tria_flip = 0, quad_flip = 0, quad_error = 0;
4439 
4440  SU2_OMP_PARALLEL_(reduction(+:line_flip,tria_flip,quad_flip,quad_error)) {
4441 
4442  /*--- Lambda to test tetrahedrons. ---*/
4443  auto checkTetra = [this](unsigned long Point_1, unsigned long Point_2,
4444  unsigned long Point_3, unsigned long Point_4) {
4445  const auto Coord_1 = nodes->GetCoord(Point_1);
4446  const auto Coord_2 = nodes->GetCoord(Point_2);
4447  const auto Coord_3 = nodes->GetCoord(Point_3);
4448  const auto Coord_4 = nodes->GetCoord(Point_4);
