4449  constexpr int nDim = 3;
4450  su2double a[nDim]={0.0}, b[nDim]={0.0}, c[nDim]={0.0}, n[nDim]={0.0};
4451  GeometryToolbox::Distance(nDim, Coord_2, Coord_1, a);
4452  GeometryToolbox::Distance(nDim, Coord_3, Coord_1, b);
4453  GeometryToolbox::Distance(nDim, Coord_4, Coord_1, c);
4454  GeometryToolbox::CrossProduct(a,b,n);
4455  return GeometryToolbox::DotProduct(nDim,n,c) < 0.0;
4456  };
4457 
4458  for (auto iMarker = 0u; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
4459 
4460  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == INTERNAL_BOUNDARY) continue;
4461 
4462  SU2_OMP_FOR_DYN(OMP_MIN_SIZE)
4463  for (auto iElem_Surface = 0ul; iElem_Surface < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem_Surface++) {
4464 
4465  /*--- Pick a reference point inside the domain that is not part of the surface element. ---*/
4466  const auto iElem_Domain = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetDomainElement();
4467  unsigned long Point_Domain = 0;
4468 
4469  for (auto iNode_Domain = 0u; iNode_Domain < elem[iElem_Domain]->GetnNodes(); iNode_Domain++) {
4470  Point_Domain = elem[iElem_Domain]->GetNode(iNode_Domain);
4471  bool find = false;
4472  for (auto iNode_Surface = 0u; iNode_Surface < bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetnNodes(); iNode_Surface++) {
4473  auto Point_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(iNode_Surface);
4474  if (Point_Surface == Point_Domain) {find = true; break;}
4475  }
4476  if (!find) break;
4477  }
4478 
4479  /*--- 2D grid. ---*/
4480 
4481  if (bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetVTK_Type() == LINE) {
4482 
4483  auto Point_1_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(0);
4484  auto Point_2_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(1);
4485  const auto Coord_1 = nodes->GetCoord(Point_1_Surface);
4486  const auto Coord_2 = nodes->GetCoord(Point_2_Surface);
4487  const auto Coord_3 = nodes->GetCoord(Point_Domain);
4488 
4489  /*--- The normal of the triangle formed by the line and domain
4490  * point should point in the positive z direction. ---*/
4491  constexpr int nDim = 2;
4492  su2double a[nDim]={0.0}, b[nDim]={0.0};
4493  GeometryToolbox::Distance(nDim, Coord_2, Coord_1, a);
4494  GeometryToolbox::Distance(nDim, Coord_3, Coord_1, b);
4495  bool test = a[0]*b[1]-a[1]*b[0] < 0.0;
4496 
4497  if (test) {
4498  bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->Change_Orientation();
4499  line_flip++;
4500  }
4501  }
4502 
4503  /*--- 3D grid. ---*/
4504 
4505  if (bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetVTK_Type() == TRIANGLE) {
4506 
4507  auto Point_1_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(0);
4508  auto Point_2_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(1);
4509  auto Point_3_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(2);
4510 
4511  /*--- The normal of the triangle should point into the domain,
4512  * resulting in a tetrahedron with positive volume. ---*/
4513  if (checkTetra(Point_1_Surface, Point_2_Surface, Point_3_Surface, Point_Domain)) {
4514  bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->Change_Orientation();
4515  tria_flip++;
4516  }
4517  }
4518 
4519  if (bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetVTK_Type() == QUADRILATERAL) {
4520 
4521  auto Point_1_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(0);
4522  auto Point_2_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(1);
4523  auto Point_3_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(2);
4524  auto Point_4_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(3);
4525 
4526  /*--- Divide quadrilateral/pyramid into triangles/tetrahedrons. ---*/
4527  int test_1 = checkTetra(Point_1_Surface, Point_2_Surface, Point_3_Surface, Point_Domain);
4528  int test_2 = checkTetra(Point_2_Surface, Point_3_Surface, Point_4_Surface, Point_Domain);
4529  int test_3 = checkTetra(Point_3_Surface, Point_4_Surface, Point_1_Surface, Point_Domain);
4530  int test_4 = checkTetra(Point_4_Surface, Point_1_Surface, Point_2_Surface, Point_Domain);
4531 
4532  if (test_1+test_2+test_3+test_4 >= 3) {
4533  /*--- If 3 or 4 tests fail there is > 75% chance flipping is the right choice. ---*/
4534  bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->Change_Orientation();
4535  quad_flip++;
4536  }
4537  else if (test_1+test_2+test_3+test_4 == 2) {
4538  /*--- If 50/50 we cannot be sure of what to do -> report to user.
4539  * If only one test fails it is probably (75%) due to skewness or warping. ---*/
4540  quad_error++;
4541  }
4542  }
4543  }
4544  END_SU2_OMP_FOR
4545  }
4546  }
4547  END_SU2_OMP_PARALLEL
4548 
4549  auto reduce = [](unsigned long& val) {
4550  unsigned long tmp = val;
4551  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&tmp, &val, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4552  };
4553  reduce(line_flip); reduce(tria_flip);
4554  reduce(quad_flip); reduce(quad_error);
4555 
4556  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
4557  string start("There has been a re-orientation of ");
4558  if (line_flip) cout << start << line_flip << " LINE surface elements." << endl;
4559  if (tria_flip) cout << start << tria_flip << " TRIANGLE surface elements." << endl;
4560  if (quad_flip) cout << start << quad_flip << " QUADRILATERAL surface elements." << endl;
4561 
4562  if (quad_error) {
4563  cout << ">>> WARNING: " << quad_error << " QUADRILATERAL surface elements are distorted.\n"
4564  " It was not possible to determine if their orientation is correct." << endl;
4565  }
4566 
4567  if (line_flip+tria_flip+quad_flip+quad_error == 0) {
4568  cout << "All surface elements are correctly orientend." << endl;
4569  }
4570  }
4571 
4572 }
4573 
4574 void CPhysicalGeometry::SetPositive_ZArea(CConfig *config) {
4575  unsigned short iMarker, Boundary, Monitoring;
4576  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint;
4577  su2double *Normal, PositiveXArea, PositiveYArea, PositiveZArea, WettedArea, CoordX = 0.0, CoordY = 0.0, CoordZ = 0.0, MinCoordX = 1E10, MinCoordY = 1E10,
4578  MinCoordZ = 1E10, MaxCoordX = -1E10, MaxCoordY = -1E10, MaxCoordZ = -1E10, TotalMinCoordX = 1E10, TotalMinCoordY = 1E10,
4579  TotalMinCoordZ = 1E10, TotalMaxCoordX = -1E10, TotalMaxCoordY = -1E10, TotalMaxCoordZ = -1E10;
4580  su2double TotalPositiveXArea = 0.0, TotalPositiveYArea = 0.0, TotalPositiveZArea = 0.0, TotalWettedArea = 0.0, AxiFactor;
4581 
4582  const bool axisymmetric = config->GetAxisymmetric();
4583  const bool fea = config->GetStructuralProblem();
4584 
4585  PositiveXArea = 0.0;
4586  PositiveYArea = 0.0;
4587  PositiveZArea = 0.0;
4588  WettedArea = 0.0;
4589 
4590  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
4591  Boundary = config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker);
4592  Monitoring = config->GetMarker_All_Monitoring(iMarker);
4593 
4594  if (((config->GetSolid_Wall(iMarker) || Boundary == LOAD_BOUNDARY ||
4595  Boundary == DISPLACEMENT_BOUNDARY) && Monitoring == YES) || fea) {
4596 
4597  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
4598  iPoint = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
4599 
4600  if (nodes->GetDomain(iPoint)) {
4601  Normal = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal();
4602  CoordX = nodes->GetCoord(iPoint, 0);
4603  CoordY = nodes->GetCoord(iPoint, 1);
4604  if (nDim == 3) CoordZ = nodes->GetCoord(iPoint, 2);
4605 
4606  if (axisymmetric) AxiFactor = 2.0*PI_NUMBER*nodes->GetCoord(iPoint, 1);
4607  else AxiFactor = 1.0;
4608 
4609  WettedArea += AxiFactor * GeometryToolbox::Norm(nDim, Normal);
4610 
4611  if (Normal[0] < 0) PositiveXArea -= Normal[0];
4612  if (Normal[1] < 0) PositiveYArea -= Normal[1];
4613  if ((nDim == 3) && (Normal[2] < 0)) PositiveZArea -= Normal[2];
4614 
4615  if (CoordX < MinCoordX) MinCoordX = CoordX;
4616  if (CoordX > MaxCoordX) MaxCoordX = CoordX;
4617 
4618  if (CoordY < MinCoordY) MinCoordY = CoordY;
4619  if (CoordY > MaxCoordY) MaxCoordY = CoordY;
4620 
4621  if (nDim == 3) {
4622  if (CoordZ < MinCoordZ) MinCoordZ = CoordZ;
4623  if (CoordZ > MaxCoordZ) MaxCoordZ = CoordZ;
4624  }
4625  }
4626  }
4627  }
4628  }
4629 
4630  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&PositiveXArea, &TotalPositiveXArea, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4631  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&PositiveYArea, &TotalPositiveYArea, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4632  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&PositiveZArea, &TotalPositiveZArea, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4633 
4634  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MinCoordX, &TotalMinCoordX, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MIN, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4635  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MinCoordY, &TotalMinCoordY, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MIN, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4636  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MinCoordZ, &TotalMinCoordZ, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MIN, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4637 
4638  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MaxCoordX, &TotalMaxCoordX, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MAX, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4639  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MaxCoordY, &TotalMaxCoordY, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MAX, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4640  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MaxCoordZ, &TotalMaxCoordZ, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MAX, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4641 
4642  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&WettedArea, &TotalWettedArea, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
4643 
4644  /*--- Set a reference area if no value is provided ---*/
4645 
4646  const string L = (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI)? " m" : " ft";
4647  const string A = (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI)? " m^2" : " ft^2";
4648  const bool D3 = (nDim == 3);
4649 
4650  if (config->GetRefArea() == 0.0) {
4651 
4652  if (D3) config->SetRefArea(TotalPositiveZArea);
4653  else config->SetRefArea(TotalPositiveYArea);
4654 
4655  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
4656  if (D3) cout << "Reference area = "<< TotalPositiveZArea << A << ".\n";
4657  else cout << "Reference length = "<< TotalPositiveYArea << L << ".\n";
4658  }
4659  }
4660 
4661  /*--- Set a semi-span value if no value is provided ---*/
4662 
4663  if (config->GetSemiSpan() == 0.0) {
4664 
4665  if (D3) config->SetSemiSpan(fabs(TotalMaxCoordY));
4666  else config->SetSemiSpan(1.0);
4667 
4668  if (D3 && (rank == MASTER_NODE)) {
4669  cout << "Semi-span length = "<< TotalMaxCoordY << L << ".\n";
4670  }
4671  }
4672 
4673  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
4674 
4675  if (fea) cout << "Surface area = "<< TotalWettedArea;
4676  else cout << "Wetted area = "<< TotalWettedArea;
4677  if (D3 || axisymmetric) cout << A << ".\n";
4678  else cout << L << ".\n";
4679 
4680  cout << "Area projection in the x-plane = "<< TotalPositiveXArea << (D3? A : L);
4681  cout << ", y-plane = "<< TotalPositiveYArea << (D3? A : L);
4682  if (D3) cout << ", z-plane = "<< TotalPositiveZArea << A;
4683  cout << ".\n";
4684 
4685  cout << "Max. coordinate in the x-direction = "<< TotalMaxCoordX << L;
4686  cout << ", y-direction = "<< TotalMaxCoordY << L;
4687  if (D3) cout << ", z-direction = "<< TotalMaxCoordZ << L;
4688  cout << ".\n";
4689 
4690  cout << "Min. coordinate in the x-direction = "<< TotalMinCoordX << L;
4691  cout << ", y-direction = "<< TotalMinCoordY << L;
4692  if (D3) cout << ", z-direction = "<< TotalMinCoordZ << L;
4693  cout << "." << endl;
4694 
4695  }
4696 
4697 }
4698 
4699 void CPhysicalGeometry::SetPoint_Connectivity() {
4700 
4701  vector<vector<unsigned long> > points(nPoint);
4702 
4703  SU2_OMP_PARALLEL
4704  {
4705  unsigned short Node_Neighbor, iNode, iNeighbor;
4706  unsigned long jElem, Point_Neighbor, iPoint, iElem;
4707 
4708  /*--- Loop over all the elements ---*/
4709  BEGIN_SU2_OMP_SAFE_GLOBAL_ACCESS
4710  {
4711  vector<vector<long> > elems(nPoint);
4712 
4713  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nElem; iElem++) {
4714 
4715  /*--- Loop over all the nodes of an element ---*/
4716  for (iNode = 0; iNode < elem[iElem]->GetnNodes(); iNode++) {
4717  iPoint = elem[iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
4718  elems[iPoint].push_back(iElem);
4719  }
4720  }
4721  nodes->SetElems(elems);
4722  }
4723  END_SU2_OMP_SAFE_GLOBAL_ACCESS
4724 
4725  /*--- Loop over all the points ---*/
4726 
4727  SU2_OMP_FOR_DYN(roundUpDiv(nPoint,2*omp_get_max_threads()))
4728  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
4729 
4730  /*--- Loop over all elements shared by the point ---*/
4731 
4732  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nodes->GetnElem(iPoint); iElem++) {
4733 
4734  jElem = nodes->GetElem(iPoint, iElem);
4735 
4736  /*--- If we find the point iPoint in the surrounding element ---*/
4737 
4738  for (iNode = 0; iNode < elem[jElem]->GetnNodes(); iNode++) {
4739 
4740  if (elem[jElem]->GetNode(iNode) != iPoint) continue;
4741 
4742  /*--- Localize the local index of the neighbor of iPoint in the element ---*/
4743 
4744  for (iNeighbor = 0; iNeighbor < elem[jElem]->GetnNeighbor_Nodes(iNode); iNeighbor++) {
4745  Node_Neighbor = elem[jElem]->GetNeighbor_Nodes(iNode, iNeighbor);
4746  Point_Neighbor = elem[jElem]->GetNode(Node_Neighbor);
4747 
4748  /*--- Store the point into the point, if it is new ---*/
4749  auto End = points[iPoint].end();
4750  if (find(points[iPoint].begin(), End, Point_Neighbor) == End)
4751  points[iPoint].push_back(Point_Neighbor);
4752  }
4753  }
4754  }
4755 
4756  /*--- Set the number of neighbors variable, this is important for JST and multigrid in parallel. ---*/
4757  nodes->SetnNeighbor(iPoint, points[iPoint].size());
4758  }
4759  END_SU2_OMP_FOR
4760 
4761  SU2_OMP_MASTER
4762  nodes->SetPoints(points);
4763  END_SU2_OMP_MASTER
4764 
4765  }
4766  END_SU2_OMP_PARALLEL
4767 }
4768 
4769 void CPhysicalGeometry::SetRCM_Ordering(CConfig *config) {
4770 
4771  /*--- The result is the RCM ordering, during the process it is also used as
4772  * the queue of new points considered by the algorithm. This is possible
4773  * because points move from the front of the queue to the back of the result,
4774  * which is equivalent to incrementing an integer marking the end of the
4775  * result and the start of the queue. ---*/
4776  vector<char> InQueue(nPoint, false);
4777  vector<unsigned long> AuxQueue, Result;
4778  Result.reserve(nPoint);
4779  unsigned long QueueStart = 0;
4780 
4781  /*--- Exclude halo nodes from the ordering process. ---*/
4782  for (auto iPoint = nPointDomain; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
4783  InQueue[iPoint] = true;
4784  }
4785 
4786  /*--- Repeat as many times as necessary to handle disconnected graphs. ---*/
4787  while (Result.size() < nPointDomain) {
4788 
4789  /*--- Select the node with the lowest degree in the grid. ---*/
4790  auto AddPoint = nPoint;
4791  auto MinDegree = std::numeric_limits<unsigned short>::max();
4792  for (auto iPoint = 0ul; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++) {
4793  auto Degree = nodes->GetnPoint(iPoint);
4794  if (!InQueue[iPoint] && Degree < MinDegree) {
4795  MinDegree = Degree;
4796  AddPoint = iPoint;
4797  }
4798  }
4799  if (AddPoint == nPoint) {
4800  SU2_MPI::Error("RCM ordering failed", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
4801  }
4802 
4803  /*--- Seed the queue with the minimum degree node. ---*/
4804  Result.push_back(AddPoint);
4805  InQueue[AddPoint] = true;
4806 
4807  /*--- Loop until reorganizing all nodes connected to AddPoint. This will
4808  * also terminate early once the ordering + queue include all points. ---*/
4809  while (QueueStart < Result.size() && Result.size() < nPointDomain) {
4810 
4811  /*--- Move the start of the queue, equivalent to taking from the front of
4812  * the queue and inserting at the end of the result. ---*/
4813  AddPoint = Result[QueueStart];
4814  ++QueueStart;
4815 
4816  /*--- Add all adjacent nodes to the queue in increasing order of their
4817  degree, checking if the element is already in the queue. ---*/
4818  AuxQueue.clear();
4819  for (auto iNode = 0u; iNode < nodes->GetnPoint(AddPoint); iNode++) {
4820  const auto AdjPoint = nodes->GetPoint(AddPoint, iNode);
4821  if (!InQueue[AdjPoint]) {
4822  AuxQueue.push_back(AdjPoint);
4823  InQueue[AdjPoint] = true;
4824  }
4825  }
4826  if (AuxQueue.empty()) continue;
4827 
4828  /*--- Sort the auxiliar queue based on the number of neighbors (degree). ---*/
4829  stable_sort(AuxQueue.begin(), AuxQueue.end(),
4830  [&](unsigned long iPoint, unsigned long jPoint) {
4831  return nodes->GetnPoint(iPoint) < nodes->GetnPoint(jPoint);
4832  }
4833  );
4834  Result.insert(Result.end(), AuxQueue.begin(), AuxQueue.end());
4835  }
4836  }
4837  reverse(Result.begin(), Result.end());
4838 
4839  /*--- Check that all the points have been added ---*/
4840  for (const auto status : InQueue) {
4841  if (!status) SU2_MPI::Error("RCM ordering failed", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
4842  }
4843 
4844  /*--- Add the MPI points ---*/
4845  for (auto iPoint = nPointDomain; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
4846  Result.push_back(iPoint);
4847  }
4848 
4849  /*--- Reset old data structures ---*/
4850 
4851  nodes->ResetElems();
4852  nodes->ResetPoints();
4853 
4854  for (auto iPoint = 0ul; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
4855  nodes->ResetBoundary(iPoint);
4856  nodes->SetPhysicalBoundary(iPoint, false);
4857  nodes->SetSolidBoundary(iPoint, false);
4858  nodes->SetViscousBoundary(iPoint, false);
4859  nodes->SetPeriodicBoundary(iPoint, false);
4860  nodes->SetDomain(iPoint, true);
4861  }
4862 
4863  /*--- Set the new coordinates ---*/
4864 
4865  su2activematrix AuxCoord(nPoint, nDim);
4866  vector<unsigned long> AuxGlobalIndex(nPoint);
4867 
4868  for (auto iPoint = 0ul; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
4869  AuxGlobalIndex[iPoint] = nodes->GetGlobalIndex(iPoint);
4870  for (auto iDim = 0u; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
4871  AuxCoord(iPoint,iDim) = nodes->GetCoord(iPoint, iDim);
4872  }
4873  }
4874 
4875  for (auto iPoint = 0ul; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
4876  nodes->SetGlobalIndex(iPoint, AuxGlobalIndex[Result[iPoint]]);
4877  nodes->SetCoord(iPoint, AuxCoord[Result[iPoint]]);
4878  }
4879 
4880  /*--- Set the new conectivities ---*/
4881 
4882  auto& InvResult = AuxGlobalIndex; // alias to re-use storage
4883  for (auto iPoint = 0ul; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
4884  InvResult[Result[iPoint]] = iPoint;
4885  }
4886 
4887  for (auto iElem = 0ul; iElem < nElem; iElem++) {
4888  for (auto iNode = 0u; iNode < elem[iElem]->GetnNodes(); iNode++) {
4889  auto iPoint = elem[iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
4890  elem[iElem]->SetNode(iNode, InvResult[iPoint]);
4891  }
4892  }
4893 
4894  for (auto iMarker = 0u; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
4895  for (auto iElem = 0ul; iElem < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem++) {
4896 
4897  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == SEND_RECEIVE &&
4898  config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(iMarker) < 0) {
4899  nodes->SetDomain(bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetNode(0), false);
4900  }
4901 
4902  for (auto iNode = 0u; iNode < bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetnNodes(); iNode++) {
4903  auto iPoint = bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
4904  bound[iMarker][iElem]->SetNode(iNode, InvResult[iPoint]);
4905  nodes->SetBoundary(InvResult[iPoint], nMarker);
4906  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != SEND_RECEIVE &&
4907  config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != INTERNAL_BOUNDARY &&
4908  config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != NEARFIELD_BOUNDARY &&
4909  config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != PERIODIC_BOUNDARY)
4910  nodes->SetPhysicalBoundary(InvResult[iPoint], true);
4911 
4912  if (config->GetSolid_Wall(iMarker))
4913  nodes->SetSolidBoundary(InvResult[iPoint], true);
4914 
4915  if (config->GetViscous_Wall(iMarker) )
4916  nodes->SetViscousBoundary(InvResult[iPoint], true);
4917 
4918  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == PERIODIC_BOUNDARY)
4919  nodes->SetPeriodicBoundary(InvResult[iPoint], true);
4920  }
4921  }
4922  }
4923 
4924 }
4925 
4926 void CPhysicalGeometry::SetElement_Connectivity(void) {
4927  unsigned short first_elem_face, second_elem_face, iFace, iNode, jElem;
4928  unsigned long face_point, Test_Elem, iElem;
4929 
4930  /*--- Loop over all the elements, faces and nodes ---*/
4931 
4932  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nElem; iElem++)
4933  for (iFace = 0; iFace < elem[iElem]->GetnFaces(); iFace++)
4934  for (iNode = 0; iNode < elem[iElem]->GetnNodesFace(iFace); iNode++) {
4935  face_point = elem[iElem]->GetNode(elem[iElem]->GetFaces(iFace, iNode));
4936 
4937  /*--- Loop over all elements sharing the face point ---*/
4938 
4939  for (jElem = 0; jElem < nodes->GetnElem(face_point); jElem++) {
4940  Test_Elem = nodes->GetElem(face_point, jElem);
4941 
4942  /*--- If it is a new element in this face ---*/
4943 
4944  if ((elem[iElem]->GetNeighbor_Elements(iFace) == -1) && (iElem < Test_Elem) &&
4945  FindFace(iElem, Test_Elem, first_elem_face, second_elem_face)) {
4946 
4947  /*--- Localice which faces are sharing both elements ---*/
4948 
4949  elem[iElem]->SetNeighbor_Elements(Test_Elem, first_elem_face);
4950 
4951  /*--- Store the element for both elements ---*/
4952 
4953  elem[Test_Elem]->SetNeighbor_Elements(iElem, second_elem_face);
4954 
4955  }
4956  }
4957  }
4958 }
4959 
4960 void CPhysicalGeometry::SetBoundVolume(void) {
4961  unsigned short cont, iMarker, iElem, iNode_Domain, iNode_Surface;
4962  unsigned long Point_Domain, Point_Surface, Point, iElem_Surface, iElem_Domain;
4963  bool CheckVol;
4964 
4965  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++)
4966  for (iElem_Surface = 0; iElem_Surface < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem_Surface++) {
4967 
4968  /*--- Choose and arbitrary point from the surface --*/
4969  Point = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(0);
4970  CheckVol = false;
4971 
4972  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nodes->GetnElem(Point); iElem++) {
4973  /*--- Look for elements surronding that point --*/
4974  cont = 0; iElem_Domain = nodes->GetElem(Point, iElem);
4975  for (iNode_Domain = 0; iNode_Domain < elem[iElem_Domain]->GetnNodes(); iNode_Domain++) {
4976  Point_Domain = elem[iElem_Domain]->GetNode(iNode_Domain);
4977  for (iNode_Surface = 0; iNode_Surface < bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetnNodes(); iNode_Surface++) {
4978  Point_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(iNode_Surface);
4979  if (Point_Surface == Point_Domain) cont++;
4980  if (cont == bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetnNodes()) break;
4981  }
4982  if (cont == bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetnNodes()) break;
4983  }
4984 
4985  if (cont == bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetnNodes()) {
4986  bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->SetDomainElement(iElem_Domain);
4987  CheckVol = true;
4988  break;
4989  }
4990  }
4991  if (!CheckVol) {
4992  char buf[100];
4993  SPRINTF(buf,"The surface element (%u, %lu) doesn't have an associated volume element", iMarker, iElem_Surface );
4994  SU2_MPI::Error(buf, CURRENT_FUNCTION);
4995  }
4996  }
4997 }
4998 
4999 void CPhysicalGeometry::SetVertex(const CConfig *config) {
5000  unsigned long iPoint, iVertex, iElem;
5001  unsigned short iMarker, iNode;
5002 
5003  /*--- Initialize the Vertex vector for each node of the grid ---*/
5004 
5005  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++)
5006  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++)
5007  nodes->SetVertex(iPoint, -1, iMarker);
5008 
5009  /*--- Create and compute the vector with the number of vertex per marker ---*/
5010 
5011  nVertex = new unsigned long [nMarker];
5012  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
5013 
5014  /*--- Initialize the number of Bound Vertex for each Marker ---*/
5015 
5016  nVertex[iMarker] = 0;
5017  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem++)
5018  for (iNode = 0; iNode < bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetnNodes(); iNode++) {
5019  iPoint = bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
5020 
5021  /*--- Set the vertex in the node information ---*/
5022 
5023  if ((nodes->GetVertex(iPoint, iMarker) == -1) || (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == SEND_RECEIVE)) {
5024  nodes->SetVertex(iPoint, nVertex[iMarker], iMarker);
5025  nVertex[iMarker]++;
5026  }
5027  }
5028  }
5029 
5030  /*--- Initialize the Vertex vector for each node, the previous result is deleted ---*/
5031 
5032  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++)
5033  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++)
5034  nodes->SetVertex(iPoint, -1, iMarker);
5035 
5036  /*--- Create the bound vertex structure, note that the order
5037  is the same as in the input file, this is important for Send/Receive part ---*/
5038 
5039  vertex = new CVertex**[nMarker];
5040  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
5041  vertex[iMarker] = new CVertex* [nVertex[iMarker]];
5042  nVertex[iMarker] = 0;
5043 
5044  /*--- Initialize the number of Bound Vertex for each Marker ---*/
5045 
5046  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem++)
5047  for (iNode = 0; iNode < bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetnNodes(); iNode++) {
5048  iPoint = bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
5049 
5050  /*--- Set the vertex in the node information ---*/
5051 
5052  if ((nodes->GetVertex(iPoint, iMarker) == -1) || (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == SEND_RECEIVE)) {
5053  iVertex = nVertex[iMarker];
5054  vertex[iMarker][iVertex] = new CVertex(iPoint, nDim);
5055 
5056  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == SEND_RECEIVE) {
5057  vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->SetRotation_Type(bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetRotation_Type());
5058  }
5059  nodes->SetVertex(iPoint, nVertex[iMarker], iMarker);
5060  nVertex[iMarker]++;
5061  }
5062  }
5063  }
5064 }
5065 
5066 void CPhysicalGeometry::ComputeNSpan(CConfig *config, unsigned short val_iZone, unsigned short marker_flag, bool allocate) {
5067  unsigned short iMarker, jMarker, iMarkerTP, iSpan, jSpan;
5068  unsigned long iPoint, iVertex;
5069  long jVertex;
5070  int nSpan, nSpan_loc;
5071  su2double *coord, *valueSpan, min, max, radius, delta;
5072  short PeriodicBoundary;
5073  unsigned short SpanWise_Kind = config->GetKind_SpanWise();
5074 
5075  unsigned short iSize;
5076  int nSpan_max;
5077  su2double MyMin, MyMax;
5078 
5079  nSpan = 0;
5080  nSpan_loc = 0;
5081  if (nDim == 2){
5082  nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1] = 1;
5083  //TODO (turbo) make it more genral
5084  if(marker_flag == OUTFLOW) config->SetnSpanWiseSections(1);
5085 
5086  /*---Initilize the vector of span-wise values that will be ordered ---*/
5087  SpanWiseValue[marker_flag -1] = new su2double[1];
5088  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < 1; iSpan++){
5089  SpanWiseValue[marker_flag -1][iSpan] = 0;
5090  }
5091  }
5092  else{
5093  if(SpanWise_Kind == AUTOMATIC){
5094  /*--- loop to find inflow of outflow marker---*/
5095  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++){
5096  for (iMarkerTP=1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery()+1; iMarkerTP++){
5097 
5098  if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) != iMarkerTP) continue;
5099  if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) != marker_flag) continue;
5100 
5101  /*--- loop to find the vertex that ar both of inflow or outflow marker and on the periodic
5102  * in order to caount the number of Span ---*/
5103  for (jMarker = 0; jMarker < nMarker; jMarker++){
5104  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(jMarker) != PERIODIC_BOUNDARY) continue;
5105 
5106  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
5107 
5108  iPoint = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
5109  if (!nodes->GetDomain(iPoint)) continue;
5110 
5111  PeriodicBoundary = config->GetMarker_All_PerBound(jMarker);
5112  jVertex = nodes->GetVertex(iPoint, jMarker);
5113 
5114  if ((jVertex != -1) && (PeriodicBoundary == (val_iZone + 1))){
5115  nSpan++;
5116  }
5117  }
5118  }
5119  }
5120  }
5121 
5122  /*--- storing the local number of span---*/
5123  nSpan_loc = nSpan;
5124  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&nSpan_loc, &nSpan, 1, MPI_INT, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
5125  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&nSpan_loc, &nSpan_max, 1, MPI_INT, MPI_MAX, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
5126 
5127  /*--- initialize the vector that will contain the disordered values span-wise ---*/
5128  nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag -1] = nSpan;
5129  valueSpan = new su2double[nSpan];
5130 
5131  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpan; iSpan ++ ){
5132  valueSpan[iSpan] = -1001.0;
5133  }
5134 
5135  /*--- store the local span-wise value for each processor ---*/
5136  nSpan_loc = 0;
5137  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++){
5138  for (iMarkerTP=1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery()+1; iMarkerTP++){
5139 
5140  if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) != iMarkerTP) continue;
5141  if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) != marker_flag) continue;
5142 
5143  for (jMarker = 0; jMarker < nMarker; jMarker++){
5144  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(jMarker) != PERIODIC_BOUNDARY) continue;
5145 
5146  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
5147 
5148  iPoint = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
5149  if (!nodes->GetDomain(iPoint)) continue;
5150 
5151  PeriodicBoundary = config->GetMarker_All_PerBound(jMarker);
5152  jVertex = nodes->GetVertex(iPoint, jMarker);
5153 
5154  if ((jVertex != -1) && (PeriodicBoundary == (val_iZone + 1))){
5155  coord = nodes->GetCoord(iPoint);
5156  radius = sqrt(coord[0]*coord[0]+coord[1]*coord[1]);
5157  switch (config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone)){
5158  case CENTRIFUGAL:
5159  valueSpan[nSpan_loc] = coord[2];
5160  break;
5161  case CENTRIPETAL:
5162  valueSpan[nSpan_loc] = coord[2];
5163  break;
5164  case AXIAL:
5165  valueSpan[nSpan_loc] = radius;
5166  break;
5167  case CENTRIPETAL_AXIAL:
5168  if (marker_flag == OUTFLOW){
5169  valueSpan[nSpan_loc] = radius;
5170  }
5171  else{
5172  valueSpan[nSpan_loc] = coord[2];
5173  }
5174  break;
5175  case AXIAL_CENTRIFUGAL:
5176  if (marker_flag == INFLOW){
5177  valueSpan[nSpan_loc] = radius;
5178  }
5179  else{
5180  valueSpan[nSpan_loc] = coord[2];
5181  }
5182  break;
5183  }
5184  nSpan_loc++;
5185  }
5186  }
5187  }
5188  }
5189  }
5190 
5191  /*--- Gather the span-wise values on all the processor ---*/
5192 
5193  vector<su2double> MyTotValueSpan(nSpan_max*size, -1001.0);
5194  vector<su2double> MyValueSpan(nSpan_max, -1001.0);
5195  vector<int> My_nSpan_loc(size);
5196 
5197  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan<nSpan_loc; iSpan++){
5198  MyValueSpan[iSpan] = valueSpan[iSpan];
5199  }
5200 
5201  SU2_MPI::Allgather(MyValueSpan.data(), nSpan_max , MPI_DOUBLE, MyTotValueSpan.data(), nSpan_max, MPI_DOUBLE, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
5202  SU2_MPI::Allgather(&nSpan_loc, 1 , MPI_INT, My_nSpan_loc.data(), 1, MPI_INT, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
5203 
5204  jSpan = 0;
5205  for (iSize = 0; iSize< size; iSize++){
5206  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < My_nSpan_loc[iSize]; iSpan++){
5207  valueSpan[jSpan] = MyTotValueSpan[iSize*nSpan_max + iSpan];
5208  jSpan++;
5209  }
5210  }
5211  if (jSpan != nSpan) SU2_MPI::Error("Panic!",CURRENT_FUNCTION);
5212 
5213  /*--- Terrible stuff to do but so is this entire bloody function goodness me... ---*/
5214  SpanWiseValue[marker_flag -1] = valueSpan;
5215 
5216  sort(SpanWiseValue[marker_flag -1], SpanWiseValue[marker_flag -1]+nSpan);
5217 
5218  /*--- Find the minimum value among the span-wise values ---*/
5219  min = SpanWiseValue[marker_flag -1][0];
5220  }
5221  /*--- Compute equispaced Span-wise sections using number of section specified by the User---*/
5222  else{
5223  /*--- Initialize number of span---*/
5224  nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1] = config->Get_nSpanWiseSections_User();
5225  SpanWiseValue[marker_flag -1] = new su2double[config->Get_nSpanWiseSections_User()];
5226  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < config->Get_nSpanWiseSections_User(); iSpan++){
5227  SpanWiseValue[marker_flag -1][iSpan] = 0;
5228  }
5229  /*--- Compute maximum and minimum value span-wise---*/
5230  min = 1E+07;
5231  max =-1E+07;
5232  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++){
5233  for (iMarkerTP=1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery()+1; iMarkerTP++){
5234 
5235  if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) != iMarkerTP) continue;
5236  if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) != marker_flag) continue;
5237 
5238  for (jMarker = 0; jMarker < nMarker; jMarker++){
5239  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(jMarker) != PERIODIC_BOUNDARY) continue;
5240 
5241  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
5242 
5243  iPoint = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
5244  if (!nodes->GetDomain(iPoint)) continue;
5245 
5246  PeriodicBoundary = config->GetMarker_All_PerBound(jMarker);
5247  jVertex = nodes->GetVertex(iPoint, jMarker);
5248 
5249  if ((jVertex != -1) && (PeriodicBoundary == (val_iZone + 1))){
5250 
5251  coord = nodes->GetCoord(iPoint);
5252  radius = sqrt(coord[0]*coord[0]+coord[1]*coord[1]);
5253  switch (config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone)){
5254  case CENTRIFUGAL:
5255  case CENTRIPETAL:
5256  if (coord[2] < min) min = coord[2];
5257  if (coord[2] > max) max = coord[2];
5258  break;
5259  case AXIAL:
5260  if (radius < min) min = radius;
5261  if (radius > max) max = radius;
5262  break;
5263  case CENTRIPETAL_AXIAL:
5264  if (marker_flag == OUTFLOW){
5265  if (radius < min) min = radius;
5266  if (radius > max) max = radius;
5267  }
5268  else{
5269  if (coord[2] < min) min = coord[2];
5270  if (coord[2] > max) max = coord[2];
5271  }
5272  break;
5273  case AXIAL_CENTRIFUGAL:
5274  if (marker_flag == INFLOW){
5275  if (radius < min) min = radius;
5276  if (radius > max) max = radius;
5277  }
5278  else{
5279  if (coord[2] < min) min = coord[2];
5280  if (coord[2] > max) max = coord[2];
5281  }
5282  break;
5283  }
5284  }
5285  }
5286  }
5287  }
5288  }
5289  /*--- compute global minimum and maximum value on span-wise ---*/
5290  MyMin= min; min = 0;
5291  MyMax= max; max = 0;
5292  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyMin, &min, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MIN, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
5293  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyMax, &max, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MAX, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
5294 
5295  /*--- compute height value for each spanwise section---*/
5296  delta = (max - min)/(nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1] -1);
5297  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
5298  SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]= min + delta*iSpan;
5299  }
5300  }
5301 
5302  if(marker_flag == OUTFLOW){
5303  if(nSpanWiseSections[INFLOW -1] != nSpanWiseSections[OUTFLOW - 1]){
5304  char buf[100];
5305  SPRINTF(buf, "nSpan inflow %u, nSpan outflow %u", nSpanWiseSections[INFLOW-1], nSpanWiseSections[OUTFLOW-1]);
5306  SU2_MPI::Error(string(" At the moment only turbomachinery with the same amount of span-wise section can be simulated\n") + buf, CURRENT_FUNCTION);
5307  }
5308  else{
5309  config->SetnSpanWiseSections(nSpanWiseSections[OUTFLOW -1]);
5310  }
5311  }
5312 
5313  }
5314 
5315 }
5316 
5317 void CPhysicalGeometry::SetTurboVertex(CConfig *config, unsigned short val_iZone, unsigned short marker_flag, bool allocate) {
5318  unsigned long iPoint, **ordered, **disordered, **oldVertex3D, iInternalVertex;
5319  unsigned long nVert, nVertMax;
5320  unsigned short iMarker, iMarkerTP, iSpan, jSpan, iDim;
5321  su2double min, minInt, max, *coord, dist, Normal2, *TurboNormal, *NormalArea, target = 0.0, **area, ***unitnormal, Area = 0.0;
5322  bool **checkAssign;
5323  min = 10.0E+06;
5324  minInt = 10.0E+06;
5325  max = -10.0E+06;
5326 
5327  su2double radius;
5328  long iVertex, iSpanVertex, jSpanVertex, kSpanVertex = 0;
5329  int *nTotVertex_gb, *nVertexSpanHalo;
5330  su2double **x_loc, **y_loc, **z_loc, **angCoord_loc, **deltaAngCoord_loc, **angPitch, **deltaAngPitch, *minIntAngPitch,
5331  *minAngPitch, *maxAngPitch;
5332  int **rank_loc;
5333 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
5334  unsigned short iSize, kSize = 0, jSize;
5335  su2double MyMin,MyIntMin, MyMax;
5336  su2double *x_gb = NULL, *y_gb = NULL, *z_gb = NULL, *angCoord_gb = NULL, *deltaAngCoord_gb = NULL;
5337  bool *checkAssign_gb =NULL;
5338  unsigned long My_nVert;
5339 
5340 #endif
5341  string multizone_filename;
5342 
5343  x_loc = new su2double*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
5344  y_loc = new su2double*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
5345  z_loc = new su2double*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
5346  angCoord_loc = new su2double*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
5347  deltaAngCoord_loc = new su2double*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
5348  angPitch = new su2double*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
5349  deltaAngPitch = new su2double*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
5350  rank_loc = new int*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
5351  minAngPitch = new su2double[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
5352  minIntAngPitch = new su2double[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
5353  maxAngPitch = new su2double[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
5354 
5355  nTotVertex_gb = new int[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
5356  nVertexSpanHalo = new int[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
5357  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
5358  nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] = -1;
5359  nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan] = 0;
5360  minAngPitch[iSpan] = 10.0E+06;
5361  minIntAngPitch[iSpan] = 10.0E+06;
5362  maxAngPitch[iSpan] = -10.0E+06;
5363  }
5364 
5365  /*--- Initialize auxiliary pointers ---*/
5366  TurboNormal = new su2double[3];
5367  NormalArea = new su2double[3];
5368  ordered = new unsigned long* [nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
5369  disordered = new unsigned long* [nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
5370  oldVertex3D = new unsigned long* [nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
5371  area = new su2double* [nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
5372  unitnormal = new su2double** [nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
5373  checkAssign = new bool* [nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
5374 
5375  /*--- Initialize the new Vertex structure. The if statement ensures that these vectors are initialized
5376  * only once even if the routine is called more than once.---*/
5377 
5378  if (allocate){
5379  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++){
5380  for (iMarkerTP=1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery()+1; iMarkerTP++){
5381  if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP){
5382  if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag){
5383  nSpanSectionsByMarker[iMarker] = nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1];
5384  nVertexSpan[iMarker] = new long[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
5385  turbovertex[iMarker] = new CTurboVertex** [nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
5386  nTotVertexSpan[iMarker] = new unsigned long [nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1] +1];
5387  MaxAngularCoord[iMarker] = new su2double [nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
5388  MinAngularCoord[iMarker] = new su2double [nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
5389  MinRelAngularCoord[iMarker] = new su2double [nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
5390  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
5391  nVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan] = 0;
5392  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan] = nullptr;
5393  MinAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = 10.0E+06;
5394  MaxAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = -10.0E+06;
5395  MinRelAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = 10.0E+06;
5396  }
5397  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1] +1; iSpan++){
5398  nTotVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan] = 0;
5399  }
5400  }
5401  }
5402  }
5403  }
5404  }
5405 
5406  //this works only for turbomachinery rotating around the Z-Axes.
5407  // the reordering algorithm pitch-wise assumes that X-coordinate of each boundary vertex is positive so that reordering can be based on the Y-coordinate.
5408  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++){
5409  for (iMarkerTP=1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery()+1; iMarkerTP++){
5410  if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP){
5411  if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag){
5412 
5413  /*--- compute the amount of vertexes for each span-wise section to initialize the CTurboVertex pointers and auxiliary pointers ---*/
5414  for (iVertex = 0; (unsigned long)iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
5415  iPoint = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
5416  if (nDim == 3){
5417  dist = 10E+06;
5418  jSpan = std::numeric_limits<unsigned short>::max();
5419  coord = nodes->GetCoord(iPoint);
5420 
5421  switch (config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone)){
5422  case CENTRIFUGAL: case CENTRIPETAL:
5423  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
5424  if (dist > (abs(coord[2]-SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]))){
5425  dist= abs(coord[2]-SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]);
5426  jSpan=iSpan;
5427  }
5428  }
5429  break;
5430  case AXIAL:
5431  radius = sqrt(coord[0]*coord[0]+coord[1]*coord[1]);
5432  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
5433  if (dist > (abs(radius - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]))){
5434  dist= abs(radius-SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]);
5435  jSpan=iSpan;
5436  }
5437  }
5438  break;
5439  case CENTRIPETAL_AXIAL:
5440  if (marker_flag == OUTFLOW){
5441  radius = sqrt(coord[0]*coord[0]+coord[1]*coord[1]);
5442  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
5443  if (dist > (abs(radius - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]))){
5444  dist= abs(radius-SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]);
5445  jSpan=iSpan;
5446  }
5447  }
5448  }
5449  else{
5450  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
5451  if (dist > (abs(coord[2]-SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]))){
5452  dist= abs(coord[2]-SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]);
5453  jSpan=iSpan;
5454  }
5455  }
5456  }
5457  break;
5458 
5459  case AXIAL_CENTRIFUGAL:
5460  if (marker_flag == INFLOW){
5461  radius = sqrt(coord[0]*coord[0]+coord[1]*coord[1]);
5462  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
5463  if (dist > (abs(radius - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]))){
5464  dist= abs(radius-SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]);
5465  jSpan=iSpan;
5466  }
5467  }
5468  }
5469  else{
5470  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
5471  if (dist > (abs(coord[2]-SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]))){
5472  dist= abs(coord[2]-SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]);
5473  jSpan=iSpan;
5474  }
5475  }
5476  }
5477  break;
5478  }
5479  }
5480 
5481  /*--- 2D problem do not need span-wise separation---*/
5482  else{
5483  jSpan = 0;
5484  }
5485 
5486  if(nodes->GetDomain(iPoint)){
5487  nVertexSpan[iMarker][jSpan]++;
5488  }
5489  nVertexSpanHalo[jSpan]++;
5490  }
5491 
5492  /*--- initialize the CTurboVertex pointers and auxiliary pointers ---*/
5493  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
5494  if (allocate){
5495  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan] = new CTurboVertex* [nVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan]];
5496  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan]; iVertex++){
5497  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iVertex] = nullptr;
5498  }
5499  }
5500  ordered[iSpan] = new unsigned long [nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]];
5501  disordered[iSpan] = new unsigned long [nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]];
5502  oldVertex3D[iSpan] = new unsigned long [nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]];
5503  checkAssign[iSpan] = new bool [nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]];
5504  area[iSpan] = new su2double [nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]];
5505  unitnormal[iSpan] = new su2double* [nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]];
5506  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]; iVertex++){
5507  unitnormal[iSpan][iVertex] = new su2double [nDim];
5508  }
5509  angPitch[iSpan] = new su2double [nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]];
5510  deltaAngPitch[iSpan] = new su2double [nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]];
5511  nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan] = 0;
5512  }
5513 
5514  /*--- store the vertexes in a ordered manner in span-wise directions but not yet ordered pitch-wise ---*/
5515  for (iVertex = 0; (unsigned long)iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
5516  iPoint = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
5517  if(nDim == 3){
5518  dist = 10E+06;
5519  jSpan = std::numeric_limits<unsigned short>::max();
5520 
5521  coord = nodes->GetCoord(iPoint);
5522  switch (config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone)){
5523  case CENTRIFUGAL: case CENTRIPETAL:
5524  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
5525  if (dist > (abs(coord[2]-SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]))){
5526  dist= abs(coord[2]-SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]);
5527  jSpan=iSpan;
5528  }
5529  }
5530  break;
5531  case AXIAL:
5532  radius = sqrt(coord[0]*coord[0]+coord[1]*coord[1]);
5533  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
5534  if (dist > (abs(radius - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]))){
5535  dist= abs(radius-SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]);
5536  jSpan=iSpan;
5537  }
5538  }
5539  break;
5540  case CENTRIPETAL_AXIAL:
5541  if(marker_flag == OUTFLOW){
5542  radius = sqrt(coord[0]*coord[0]+coord[1]*coord[1]);
5543  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
5544  if (dist > (abs(radius - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]))){
5545  dist= abs(radius-SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]);
5546  jSpan=iSpan;
5547  }
5548  }
5549  }else{
5550  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
5551  if (dist > (abs(coord[2]-SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]))){
5552  dist= abs(coord[2]-SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]);
5553  jSpan=iSpan;
5554  }
5555  }
5556  }
5557  break;
5558 
5559  case AXIAL_CENTRIFUGAL:
5560  if(marker_flag == INFLOW){
5561  radius = sqrt(coord[0]*coord[0]+coord[1]*coord[1]);
5562  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
5563  if (dist > (abs(radius - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]))){
5564  dist= abs(radius-SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]);
5565  jSpan=iSpan;
5566  }
5567  }
5568  }else{
5569  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
5570  if (dist > (abs(coord[2]-SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]))){
5571  dist= abs(coord[2]-SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]);
5572  jSpan=iSpan;
5573  }
5574  }
5575  }
5576  break;
5577  }
5578  }
5579  /*--- 2D problem do not need span-wise separation---*/
5580  else{
5581  jSpan = 0;
5582  }
5583  /*--- compute the face area associated with the vertex ---*/
5584  vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal(NormalArea);
5585  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) NormalArea[iDim] = -NormalArea[iDim];
5586  Area = GeometryToolbox::Norm(nDim, NormalArea);
5587 
5588  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) NormalArea[iDim] /= Area;
5589  /*--- store all the all the info into the auxiliary containers ---*/
5590  disordered[jSpan][nVertexSpanHalo[jSpan]] = iPoint;
5591  oldVertex3D[jSpan][nVertexSpanHalo[jSpan]] = iVertex;
5592  area[jSpan][nVertexSpanHalo[jSpan]] = Area;
5593  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++){
5594  unitnormal[jSpan][nVertexSpanHalo[jSpan]][iDim] = NormalArea[iDim];
5595  }
5596  checkAssign[jSpan][nVertexSpanHalo[jSpan]] = false;
5597  nVertexSpanHalo[jSpan]++;
5598  }
5599 
5600  /*--- using the auxiliary container reordered the vertexes pitch-wise direction at each span ---*/
5601  // the reordering algorithm can be based on the Y-coordinate.
5602  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
5603 
5604  /*--- find the local minimum and maximum pitch-wise for each processor---*/
5605  min = 10E+06;
5606  minInt = 10E+06;
5607  max = -10E+06;
5608  for(iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex < nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]; iSpanVertex++){
5609  iPoint = disordered[iSpan][iSpanVertex];
5610  coord = nodes->GetCoord(iPoint);
5611  /*--- find nodes at minimum pitch among all nodes---*/
5612  if (coord[1]<min){
5613  min = coord[1];
5614  if (nDim == 2 && config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone) == AXIAL){
5615  MinAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = coord[1];
5616  }
5617  else{
5618  MinAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = atan(coord[1]/coord[0]);
5619  }
5620  minAngPitch[iSpan]= MinAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan];
5621  kSpanVertex =iSpanVertex;
5622  }
5623 
5624  /*--- find nodes at minimum pitch among the internal nodes---*/
5625  if (coord[1]<minInt){
5626  if(nodes->GetDomain(iPoint)){
5627  minInt = coord[1];
5628  if (nDim == 2 && config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone) == AXIAL){
5629  minIntAngPitch[iSpan] = coord[1];
5630  }
5631  else{
5632  minIntAngPitch[iSpan] = atan(coord[1]/coord[0]);
5633  }
5634  }
5635  }
5636 
5637  /*--- find nodes at maximum pitch among the internal nodes---*/
5638  if (coord[1]>max){
5639  if(nodes->GetDomain(iPoint)){
5640  max =coord[1];
5641  if (nDim == 2 && config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone) == AXIAL){
5642  MaxAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = coord[1];
5643  }
5644  else{
5645  MaxAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = atan(coord[1]/coord[0]);
5646  }
5647  maxAngPitch[iSpan]= MaxAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan];
5648  }
5649  }
5650  }
5651 
5652  iInternalVertex = 0;
5653 
5654  /*--- reordering the vertex pitch-wise, store the ordered vertexes span-wise and pitch-wise---*/
5655  for(iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex<nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]; iSpanVertex++){
5656  dist = 10E+06;
5657  ordered[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = disordered[iSpan][kSpanVertex];
5658  checkAssign[iSpan][kSpanVertex] = true;
5659  coord = nodes->GetCoord(ordered[iSpan][iSpanVertex]);
5660  target = coord[1];
5661  if (nDim == 2 && config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone) == AXIAL){
5662  angPitch[iSpan][iSpanVertex]=coord[1];
5663  }
5664  else{
5665  angPitch[iSpan][iSpanVertex]=atan(coord[1]/coord[0]);
5666  }
5667  if(iSpanVertex == 0){
5668  deltaAngPitch[iSpan][iSpanVertex]=0.0;
5669  }
5670  else{
5671  deltaAngPitch[iSpan][iSpanVertex]= angPitch[iSpan][iSpanVertex] - angPitch[iSpan][iSpanVertex - 1];
5672  }
5673  /*---create turbovertex structure only for the internal nodes---*/
5674  if(nodes->GetDomain(ordered[iSpan][iSpanVertex])){
5675  if (allocate){
5676  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iInternalVertex] = new CTurboVertex(ordered[iSpan][iSpanVertex], nDim);
5677  }
5678  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iInternalVertex]->SetArea(area[iSpan][kSpanVertex]);
5679  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iInternalVertex]->SetNormal(unitnormal[iSpan][kSpanVertex]);
5680  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iInternalVertex]->SetOldVertex(oldVertex3D[iSpan][kSpanVertex]);
5681  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iInternalVertex]->SetAngularCoord(angPitch[iSpan][iSpanVertex]);
5682  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iInternalVertex]->SetDeltaAngularCoord(deltaAngPitch[iSpan][iSpanVertex]);
5683  switch (config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone)){
5684  case CENTRIFUGAL:
5685  Normal2 = 0.0;
5686  for(iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 +=coord[iDim]*coord[iDim];
5687  if (marker_flag == INFLOW){
5688  TurboNormal[0] = -coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
5689  TurboNormal[1] = -coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
5690  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5691  }else{
5692  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
5693  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
5694  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5695  }
5696  break;
5697  case CENTRIPETAL:
5698  Normal2 = 0.0;
5699  for(iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 +=coord[iDim]*coord[iDim];
5700  if (marker_flag == OUTFLOW){
5701  TurboNormal[0] = -coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
5702  TurboNormal[1] = -coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
5703  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5704  }else{
5705  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
5706  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
5707  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5708  }
5709  break;
5710  case AXIAL:
5711  Normal2 = 0.0;
5712  for(iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 +=coord[iDim]*coord[iDim];
5713  if(nDim == 3){
5714  if (marker_flag == INFLOW){
5715  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
5716  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
5717  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5718  }else{
5719  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
5720  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
5721  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5722  }
5723  }
5724  else{
5725  if (marker_flag == INFLOW){
5726  TurboNormal[0] = -1.0;
5727  TurboNormal[1] = 0.0;
5728  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5729  }else{
5730  TurboNormal[0] = 1.0;
5731  TurboNormal[1] = 0.0;
5732  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5733  }
5734  }
5735 
5736  break;
5737  case CENTRIPETAL_AXIAL:
5738  Normal2 = 0.0;
5739  for(iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 +=coord[iDim]*coord[iDim];
5740  if (marker_flag == INFLOW){
5741  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
5742  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
5743  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5744  }else{
5745  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
5746  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
5747  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5748  }
5749  break;
5750 
5751  case AXIAL_CENTRIFUGAL:
5752  Normal2 = 0.0;
5753  for(iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 +=coord[iDim]*coord[iDim];
5754  if (marker_flag == INFLOW){
5755  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
5756  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
5757  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5758  }else{
5759  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
5760  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
5761  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
5762  }
5763  break;
5764 
5765  }
5766  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iInternalVertex]->SetTurboNormal(TurboNormal);
5767  iInternalVertex++;
5768  }
5769 
5770 
5771  for(jSpanVertex = 0; jSpanVertex<nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]; jSpanVertex++){
5772  coord = nodes->GetCoord(disordered[iSpan][jSpanVertex]);
5773  if(dist >= (coord[1] - target) && !checkAssign[iSpan][jSpanVertex] && (coord[1] - target) >= 0.0){
5774  dist= coord[1] - target;
5775  kSpanVertex =jSpanVertex;
5776  }
5777  }
5778  }
5779  }
5780 
5781  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
5782 
5783  delete [] ordered[iSpan];
5784  delete [] disordered[iSpan];
5785  delete [] oldVertex3D[iSpan];
5786  delete [] checkAssign[iSpan];
5787  delete [] area[iSpan];
5788  delete [] angPitch[iSpan];
5789  delete [] deltaAngPitch[iSpan];
5790 
5791  for(iVertex=0; iVertex < nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]; iVertex++){
5792  delete [] unitnormal[iSpan][iVertex];
5793  }
5794  delete [] unitnormal[iSpan];
5795  }
5796  }
5797  }
5798  }
5799  }
5800 
5801  /*--- to be set for all the processor to initialize an appropriate number of frequency for the NR BC ---*/
5802  nVertMax = 0;
5803 
5804  /*--- compute global max and min pitch per span ---*/
5805  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
5806  nVert = 0;
5807 
5808 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
5809  MyMin = minAngPitch[iSpan]; minAngPitch[iSpan] = 10.0E+6;
5810  MyIntMin = minIntAngPitch[iSpan]; minIntAngPitch[iSpan] = 10.0E+6;
5811  MyMax = maxAngPitch[iSpan]; maxAngPitch[iSpan] = -10.0E+6;
5812 
5813  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyMin, &minAngPitch[iSpan], 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MIN, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
5814  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyIntMin, &minIntAngPitch[iSpan], 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MIN, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
5815  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyMax, &maxAngPitch[iSpan], 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MAX, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
5816 #endif
5817 
5818 
5819  /*--- compute the relative angular pitch with respect to the minimum value ---*/
5820 
5821  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++){
5822  for (iMarkerTP=1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery()+1; iMarkerTP++){
5823  if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP){
5824  if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag){
5825  nVert = nVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan];
5826  MinAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = minAngPitch[iSpan];
5827  MaxAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = maxAngPitch[iSpan];
5828  MinRelAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = minIntAngPitch[iSpan] - minAngPitch[iSpan];
5829  for(iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex< nVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan]; iSpanVertex++){
5830  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iSpanVertex]->SetRelAngularCoord(MinAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan]);
5831  }
5832  }
5833  }
5834  }
5835  }
5836 
5837 
5838 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
5839  My_nVert = nVert;nVert = 0;
5840  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&My_nVert, &nVert, 1, MPI_INT, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
5841 #endif
5842 
5843  /*--- to be set for all the processor to initialize an appropriate number of frequency for the NR BC ---*/
5844  if(nVert > nVertMax){
5845  SetnVertexSpanMax(marker_flag,nVert);
5846  }
5847  /*--- for all the processor should be known the amount of total turbovertex per span ---*/
5848  nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]= (int)nVert;
5849 
5850  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++){
5851  for (iMarkerTP=1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery()+1; iMarkerTP++){
5852  if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP){
5853  if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag){
5854  nTotVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan]= nVert;
5855  nTotVertexSpan[iMarker][nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]]+= nVert;
5856  }
5857  }
5858  }
5859  }
5860  }
5861 
5862 
5863  /*--- Printing Tec file to check the global ordering of the turbovertex pitch-wise ---*/
5864  /*--- Send all the info to the MASTERNODE ---*/
5865 
5866  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
5867  x_loc[iSpan] = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]];
5868  y_loc[iSpan] = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]];
5869  z_loc[iSpan] = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]];
5870  angCoord_loc[iSpan] = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]];
5871  deltaAngCoord_loc[iSpan] = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]];
5872  rank_loc[iSpan] = new int[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]];
5873  for(iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex<nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]; iSpanVertex++){
5874  x_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
5875  y_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
5876  z_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
5877  angCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
5878  deltaAngCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
5879  rank_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1;
5880  }
5881  }
5882 
5883  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++){
5884  for (iMarkerTP=1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery()+1; iMarkerTP++){
5885  if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP){
5886  if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag){
5887  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
5888  for(iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex<nVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan]; iSpanVertex++){
5889  iPoint = turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iSpanVertex]->GetNode();
5890  coord = nodes->GetCoord(iPoint);
5891  x_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = coord[0];
5892  y_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = coord[1];
5893  if (nDim == 3){
5894  z_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = coord[2];
5895  }
5896  else{
5897  z_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = 0.0;
5898  }
5899  angCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iSpanVertex]->GetRelAngularCoord();
5900  deltaAngCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iSpanVertex]->GetDeltaAngularCoord();
5901  }
5902  }
5903  }
5904  }
5905  }
5906  }
5907 
5908 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
5909 
5910  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
5911  if (rank == MASTER_NODE){
5912  x_gb = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]*size];
5913  y_gb = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]*size];
5914  z_gb = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]*size];
5915  angCoord_gb = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]*size];
5916  deltaAngCoord_gb = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]*size];
5917  checkAssign_gb = new bool[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]*size];
5918 
5919  for(iSize= 0; iSize < size; iSize++){
5920  for(iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex < nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]; iSpanVertex++){
5921  checkAssign_gb[iSize*nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + iSpanVertex] = false;
5922  }
5923  }
5924  }
5925  SU2_MPI::Gather(y_loc[iSpan], nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] , MPI_DOUBLE, y_gb, nTotVertex_gb[iSpan], MPI_DOUBLE, MASTER_NODE, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
5926  SU2_MPI::Gather(x_loc[iSpan], nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] , MPI_DOUBLE, x_gb, nTotVertex_gb[iSpan], MPI_DOUBLE, MASTER_NODE, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
5927  SU2_MPI::Gather(z_loc[iSpan], nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] , MPI_DOUBLE, z_gb, nTotVertex_gb[iSpan], MPI_DOUBLE, MASTER_NODE, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
5928  SU2_MPI::Gather(angCoord_loc[iSpan], nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] , MPI_DOUBLE, angCoord_gb, nTotVertex_gb[iSpan], MPI_DOUBLE, MASTER_NODE, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
5929  SU2_MPI::Gather(deltaAngCoord_loc[iSpan], nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] , MPI_DOUBLE, deltaAngCoord_gb, nTotVertex_gb[iSpan], MPI_DOUBLE, MASTER_NODE, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
5930 
5931  if (rank == MASTER_NODE){
5932  for(iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex<nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]; iSpanVertex++){
5933  x_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
5934  y_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
5935  z_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
5936  angCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
5937  deltaAngCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
5938  }
5939 
5940 
5941 
5942  min = 10.0E+06;
5943  for(iSize= 0; iSize < size; iSize++){
5944  if (angCoord_gb[iSize*nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]] < min && angCoord_gb[iSize*nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]] >= 0.0){
5945  kSize = iSize;
5946  min = angCoord_gb[iSize*nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]];
5947  }
5948  }
5949 
5950  kSpanVertex = 0;
5951  for(iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex < nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]; iSpanVertex++){
5952  x_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = x_gb[kSize*nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + kSpanVertex];
5953  y_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = y_gb[kSize*nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + kSpanVertex];
5954  z_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = z_gb[kSize*nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + kSpanVertex];
5955  angCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = angCoord_gb[kSize*nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + kSpanVertex];
5956  deltaAngCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = deltaAngCoord_gb[kSize*nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + kSpanVertex];
5957  rank_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = kSize;
5958  target = angCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex];
5959  checkAssign_gb[kSize*nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + kSpanVertex] = true;
5960  min = 10.0E+06;
5961  for(jSize= 0; jSize < size; jSize++){
5962  for(jSpanVertex = 0; jSpanVertex < nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]; jSpanVertex++){
5963  if ((angCoord_gb[jSize*nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + jSpanVertex] < min) &&
5964  (angCoord_gb[jSize*nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + jSpanVertex] >= target) &&
5965  !checkAssign_gb[jSize*nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + jSpanVertex]) {
5966  kSize = jSize;
5967  kSpanVertex = jSpanVertex;
5968  min = angCoord_gb[jSize*nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + jSpanVertex];
5969  }
5970  }
5971  }
5972  }
5973 
5974  delete [] x_gb; delete [] y_gb; delete [] z_gb; delete [] angCoord_gb; delete [] deltaAngCoord_gb; delete[] checkAssign_gb;
5975 
5976  }
5977  }
5978 
5979 #endif
5980 
5981  if (rank == MASTER_NODE){
5982  if (marker_flag == INFLOW && val_iZone ==0){
5983  std::string sPath = "TURBOMACHINERY";
5984  int nError = 0;
5985 #if defined(_WIN32)
5986 #ifdef __MINGW32__
5987  nError = mkdir(sPath.c_str()); // MINGW on Windows
5988 #else
5989  nError = _mkdir(sPath.c_str()); // can be used on Windows
5990 #endif
5991 #else
5992  mode_t nMode = 0733; // UNIX style permissions
5993  nError = mkdir(sPath.c_str(),nMode); // can be used on non-Windows
5994 #endif
5995  if (nError != 0) {
5996  cout << "TURBOMACHINERY folder creation failed." <<endl;
5997  }
5998  }
5999  if (marker_flag == INFLOW){
6000  multizone_filename = "TURBOMACHINERY/spanwise_division_inflow.dat";
6001  }
6002  else{
6003  multizone_filename = "TURBOMACHINERY/spanwise_division_outflow.dat";
6004  }
6005  char buffer[50];
6006 
6007  if (GetnZone() > 1){
6008  unsigned short lastindex = multizone_filename.find_last_of(".");
6009  multizone_filename = multizone_filename.substr(0, lastindex);
6010  SPRINTF (buffer, "_%d.dat", SU2_TYPE::Int(val_iZone));
6011  multizone_filename.append(string(buffer));
6012  }
6013 
6014  // File to print the vector x_loc, y_loc, z_loc, globIdx_loc to check vertex ordering
6015  ofstream myfile;
6016  myfile.open (multizone_filename.data(), ios::out | ios::trunc);
6017  myfile.setf(ios::uppercase | ios::scientific);
6018  myfile.precision(8);
6019 
6020  myfile << "TITLE = \"Global index visualization file\"" << endl;
6021  myfile << "VARIABLES =" << endl;
6022  myfile.width(10); myfile << "\"iSpan\"";
6023  myfile.width(20); myfile << "\"x_coord\"" ;
6024  myfile.width(20); myfile << "\"y_coord\"" ;
6025  myfile.width(20); myfile << "\"z_coord\"" ;
6026  myfile.width(20); myfile << "\"radius\"" ;
6027  myfile.width(20); myfile << "\"Relative Angular Coord \"" ;
6028  myfile.width(20); myfile << "\"Delta Angular Coord \"" ;
6029  myfile.width(20); myfile << "\"processor\"" <<endl;
6030  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
6031  for(iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex < nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]; iSpanVertex++){
6032  radius = sqrt(x_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex]*x_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] + y_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex]*y_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex]);
6033  myfile.width(10); myfile << iSpan;
6034  myfile.width(20); myfile << x_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex];
6035  myfile.width(20); myfile << y_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex];
6036  myfile.width(20); myfile << z_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex];
6037  myfile.width(20); myfile << radius;
6038  if (nDim ==2 && config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone)){
6039  myfile.width(20); myfile << angCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex];
6040  myfile.width(20); myfile << deltaAngCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex];
6041  }
6042  else{
6043  myfile.width(20); myfile << angCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex]*180.0/PI_NUMBER;
6044  myfile.width(20); myfile << deltaAngCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex]*180.0/PI_NUMBER;
6045  }
6046  myfile.width(20); myfile << rank_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex]<<endl;
6047  }
6048  myfile << endl;
6049  }
6050  }
6051 
6052 
6053  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
6054  delete [] x_loc[iSpan];
6055  delete [] y_loc[iSpan];
6056  delete [] z_loc[iSpan];
6057  delete [] angCoord_loc[iSpan];
6058  delete [] deltaAngCoord_loc[iSpan];
6059  delete [] rank_loc[iSpan];
6060 
6061  }
6062 
6063 
6064  delete [] area;
6065  delete [] ordered;
6066  delete [] disordered;
6067  delete [] oldVertex3D;
6068  delete [] checkAssign;
6069  delete [] TurboNormal;
6070  delete [] unitnormal;
6071  delete [] NormalArea;
6072  delete [] x_loc;
6073  delete [] y_loc;
6074  delete [] z_loc;
6075  delete [] angCoord_loc;
6076  delete [] nTotVertex_gb;
6077  delete [] nVertexSpanHalo;
6078  delete [] angPitch;
6079  delete [] deltaAngPitch;
6080  delete [] deltaAngCoord_loc;
6081  delete [] rank_loc;
6082  delete [] minAngPitch;
6083  delete [] maxAngPitch;
6084  delete [] minIntAngPitch;
6085 
6086 }
6087 
6088 
6089 void CPhysicalGeometry::UpdateTurboVertex(CConfig *config, unsigned short val_iZone, unsigned short marker_flag) {
6090  unsigned short iMarker, iMarkerTP, iSpan, iDim;
6091  long iSpanVertex, iPoint;
6092  su2double *coord, *TurboNormal, Normal2;
6093 
6094  /*--- Initialize auxiliary pointers ---*/
6095  TurboNormal = new su2double[3];
6096 
6097  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++){
6098  for (iMarkerTP=1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery()+1; iMarkerTP++){
6099  if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP){
6100  if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag){
6101  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
6102  for(iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex<nVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan]; iSpanVertex++){
6103  iPoint = turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iSpanVertex]->GetNode();
6104  coord = nodes->GetCoord(iPoint);
6105  /*--- compute appropriate turbo normal ---*/
6106  switch (config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone)){
6107  case CENTRIFUGAL:
6108  Normal2 = 0.0;
6109  for(iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 +=coord[iDim]*coord[iDim];
6110  if (marker_flag == INFLOW){
6111  TurboNormal[0] = -coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
6112  TurboNormal[1] = -coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
6113  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
6114  }else{
6115  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
6116  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
6117  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
6118  }
6119  break;
6120  case CENTRIPETAL:
6121  Normal2 = 0.0;
6122  for(iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 +=coord[iDim]*coord[iDim];
6123  if (marker_flag == OUTFLOW){
6124  TurboNormal[0] = -coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
6125  TurboNormal[1] = -coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
6126  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
6127  }else{
6128  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
6129  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
6130  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
6131  }
6132  break;
6133  case AXIAL:
6134  Normal2 = 0.0;
6135  for(iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 +=coord[iDim]*coord[iDim];
6136  if(nDim == 3){
6137  if (marker_flag == INFLOW){
6138  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
6139  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
6140  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
6141  }else{
6142  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
6143  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
6144  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
6145  }
6146  }
6147  else{
6148  if (marker_flag == INFLOW){
6149  TurboNormal[0] = -1.0;
6150  TurboNormal[1] = 0.0;
6151  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
6152  }else{
6153  TurboNormal[0] = 1.0;
6154  TurboNormal[1] = 0.0;
6155  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
6156  }
6157  }
6158 
6159  break;
6160  case CENTRIPETAL_AXIAL:
6161  Normal2 = 0.0;
6162  for(iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 +=coord[iDim]*coord[iDim];
6163  if (marker_flag == INFLOW){
6164  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
6165  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
6166  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
6167  }else{
6168  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
6169  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
6170  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
6171  }
6172  break;
6173 
6174  case AXIAL_CENTRIFUGAL:
6175  Normal2 = 0.0;
6176  for(iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 +=coord[iDim]*coord[iDim];
6177  if (marker_flag == INFLOW){
6178  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
6179  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
6180  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
6181  }else{
6182  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
6183  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
6184  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
6185  }
6186  break;
6187  }
6188 
6189  /*--- store the new turbo normal ---*/
6190  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iSpanVertex]->SetTurboNormal(TurboNormal);
6191  }
6192  }
6193  }
6194  }
6195  }
6196  }
6197 
6198  delete [] TurboNormal;
6199 }
6200 
6201 void CPhysicalGeometry::SetAvgTurboValue(CConfig *config, unsigned short val_iZone, unsigned short marker_flag, bool allocate) {
6202 
6203  unsigned short iMarker, iMarkerTP, iSpan, iDim;
6204  unsigned long iPoint;
6205  su2double *TurboNormal,*coord, *Normal, turboNormal2, Normal2, *gridVel, TotalArea, TotalRadius, radius;
6206  su2double *TotalTurboNormal,*TotalNormal, *TotalGridVel, Area;
6207  long iVertex;
6208  /*-- Variables declaration and allocation ---*/
6209  TotalTurboNormal = new su2double[nDim];
6210  TotalNormal = new su2double[nDim];
6211  TurboNormal = new su2double[nDim];
6212  TotalGridVel = new su2double[nDim];
6213  Normal = new su2double[nDim];
6214 
6215  bool grid_movement = config->GetGrid_Movement();
6216 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
6217  su2double MyTotalArea, MyTotalRadius, *MyTotalTurboNormal= NULL, *MyTotalNormal= NULL, *MyTotalGridVel= NULL;
6218 #endif
6219 
6220  /*--- Intialization of the vector for the interested boundary ---*/
6221  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++){
6222  for (iMarkerTP=1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery()+1; iMarkerTP++){
6223  if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP){
6224  if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag){
6225  if(allocate){
6226  AverageTurboNormal[iMarker] = new su2double *[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1] + 1];
6227  AverageNormal[iMarker] = new su2double *[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1] + 1];
6228  AverageGridVel[iMarker] = new su2double *[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1] + 1];
6229  AverageTangGridVel[iMarker] = new su2double [nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1] + 1];
6230  SpanArea[iMarker] = new su2double [nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1] + 1];
6231  TurboRadius[iMarker] = new su2double [nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1] + 1];
6232  for (iSpan= 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1] + 1; iSpan++){
6233  AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan] = new su2double [nDim];
6234  AverageNormal[iMarker][iSpan] = new su2double [nDim];
6235  AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan] = new su2double [nDim];
6236  }
6237  }
6238  for (iSpan= 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1] + 1; iSpan++){
6239  AverageTangGridVel[iMarker][iSpan] = 0.0;
6240  SpanArea[iMarker][iSpan] = 0.0;
6241  TurboRadius[iMarker][iSpan] = 0.0;
6242  for(iDim=0; iDim < nDim; iDim++){
6243  AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][iDim] = 0.0;
6244  AverageNormal[iMarker][iSpan][iDim] = 0.0;
6245  AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][iDim] = 0.0;
6246  }
6247  }
6248  }
6249  }
6250  }
6251  }
6252 
6253 
6254 
6255  /*--- start computing the average quantities span wise --- */
6256  for (iSpan= 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
6257 
6258  /*--- Forces initialization for contenitors to zero ---*/
6259  for (iDim=0; iDim<nDim; iDim++) {
6260  TotalTurboNormal[iDim] =0.0;
6261  TotalNormal[iDim] =0.0;
6262  TotalGridVel[iDim] =0.0;
6263  }
6264  TotalArea = 0.0;
6265  TotalRadius = 0.0;
6266  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++){
6267  for (iMarkerTP=1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery()+1; iMarkerTP++){
6268  if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP){
6269  if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag){
6270  for(iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan]; iVertex++){
6271  iPoint = turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iVertex]->GetNode();
6272  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iVertex]->GetTurboNormal(TurboNormal);
6273  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iVertex]->GetNormal(Normal);
6274  coord = nodes->GetCoord(iPoint);
6275 
6276  if (nDim == 3){
6277  radius = sqrt(coord[0]*coord[0] + coord[1]*coord[1]);
6278  }
6279  else{
6280  radius = 0.0;
6281  }
6282  Area = turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iVertex]->GetArea();
6283  TotalArea += Area;
6284  TotalRadius += radius;
6285  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
6286  TotalTurboNormal[iDim] +=TurboNormal[iDim];
6287  TotalNormal[iDim] +=Normal[iDim];
6288  }
6289  if (grid_movement){
6290  gridVel = nodes->GetGridVel(iPoint);
6291  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) TotalGridVel[iDim] +=gridVel[iDim];
6292  }
6293  }
6294  }
6295  }
6296  }
6297  }
6298 
6299 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
6300 
6301  MyTotalArea = TotalArea; TotalArea = 0;
6302  MyTotalRadius = TotalRadius; TotalRadius = 0;
6303  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyTotalArea, &TotalArea, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
6304  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyTotalRadius, &TotalRadius, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
6305 
6306  MyTotalTurboNormal = new su2double[nDim];
6307  MyTotalNormal = new su2double[nDim];
6308  MyTotalGridVel = new su2double[nDim];
6309 
6310  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
6311  MyTotalTurboNormal[iDim] = TotalTurboNormal[iDim];
6312  TotalTurboNormal[iDim] = 0.0;
6313  MyTotalNormal[iDim] = TotalNormal[iDim];
6314  TotalNormal[iDim] = 0.0;
6315  MyTotalGridVel[iDim] = TotalGridVel[iDim];
6316  TotalGridVel[iDim] = 0.0;
6317  }
6318 
6319  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(MyTotalTurboNormal, TotalTurboNormal, nDim, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
6320  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(MyTotalNormal, TotalNormal, nDim, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
6321  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(MyTotalGridVel, TotalGridVel, nDim, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
6322 
6323  delete [] MyTotalTurboNormal;delete [] MyTotalNormal; delete [] MyTotalGridVel;
6324 
6325 #endif
6326 
6327  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++){
6328  for (iMarkerTP=1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery()+1; iMarkerTP++){
6329  if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP){
6330  if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag){
6331 
6332 
6333  SpanArea[iMarker][iSpan] = TotalArea;
6334  TurboRadius[iMarker][iSpan] = TotalRadius/nTotVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan];
6335 
6336  turboNormal2 = 0.0;
6337  Normal2 = 0.0;
6338  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++){
6339  turboNormal2 += TotalTurboNormal[iDim]*TotalTurboNormal[iDim];
6340  Normal2 += TotalNormal[iDim]*TotalNormal[iDim];
6341  }
6342  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++){
6343  AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][iDim] = TotalTurboNormal[iDim]/sqrt(turboNormal2);
6344  AverageNormal[iMarker][iSpan][iDim] = TotalNormal[iDim]/sqrt(Normal2);
6345  }
6346  if (grid_movement){
6347  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++){
6348  AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][iDim] =TotalGridVel[iDim]/nTotVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan];
6349  }
6350  switch (config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone)){
6351  case CENTRIFUGAL:case CENTRIPETAL:
6352  if (marker_flag == INFLOW ){
6353  AverageTangGridVel[iMarker][iSpan]= -(AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][0]*AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][1]-AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][1]*AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][0]);
6354  }
6355  else{
6356  AverageTangGridVel[iMarker][iSpan]= AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][0]*AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][1]-AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][1]*AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][0];
6357  }
6358  break;
6359  case AXIAL:
6360  if (marker_flag == INFLOW && nDim == 2){
6361  AverageTangGridVel[iMarker][iSpan]= -AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][0]*AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][1] + AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][1]*AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][0];
6362  }
6363  else{
6364  AverageTangGridVel[iMarker][iSpan]= AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][0]*AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][1]-AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][1]*AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][0];
6365  }
6366  break;
6367  case CENTRIPETAL_AXIAL:
6368  if (marker_flag == OUTFLOW){
6369  AverageTangGridVel[iMarker][iSpan]= (AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][0]*AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][1]-AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][1]*AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][0]);
6370  }
6371  else{
6372  AverageTangGridVel[iMarker][iSpan]= -(AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][0]*AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][1]-AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][1]*AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][0]);
6373  }
6374  break;
6375  case AXIAL_CENTRIFUGAL:
6376  if (marker_flag == INFLOW)
6377  {
6378  AverageTangGridVel[iMarker][iSpan]= AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][0]*AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][1]-AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][1]*AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][0];
6379  }else
6380  {
6381  AverageTangGridVel[iMarker][iSpan]= AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][0]*AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][1]-AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][1]*AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][0];
6382  }
6383  break;
6384 
6385  default:
6386  SU2_MPI::Error("Tang grid velocity NOT IMPLEMENTED YET for this configuration", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
6387  break;
6388  }
6389  }
6390 
6391  /*--- Compute the 1D average values ---*/
6392  AverageTangGridVel[iMarker][nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]] += AverageTangGridVel[iMarker][iSpan]/nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1];
6393  SpanArea[iMarker][nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]] += SpanArea[iMarker][iSpan];
6394  for(iDim=0; iDim < nDim; iDim++){
6395  AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]][iDim] += AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][iDim];
6396  AverageNormal[iMarker][nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]][iDim] += AverageNormal[iMarker][iSpan][iDim];
6397  AverageGridVel[iMarker][nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]][iDim] += AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][iDim]/nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1];
6398 
6399  }
6400  }
6401  }
6402  }
6403  }
6404  }
6405 
6406  /*--- Normalize 1D normals---*/
6407  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++){
6408  for (iMarkerTP=1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery()+1; iMarkerTP++){
6409  if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP){
6410  if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag){
6411  turboNormal2 = 0.0;
6412  Normal2 = 0.0;
6413 
6414  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++){
6415  turboNormal2 += AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]][iDim]*AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]][iDim];
6416  Normal2 += AverageNormal[iMarker][nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]][iDim]*AverageNormal[iMarker][nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]][iDim];
6417  }
6418  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++){
6419  AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]][iDim] /=sqrt(turboNormal2);
6420  AverageNormal[iMarker][nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]][iDim] /=sqrt(Normal2);
6421  }
6422  }
6423  }
6424  }
6425  }
6426 
6427 
6428  delete [] TotalTurboNormal;
6429  delete [] TotalNormal;
6430  delete [] TotalGridVel;
6431  delete [] TurboNormal;
6432  delete [] Normal;
6433 
6434 }
6435 
6436 
6437 void CPhysicalGeometry::GatherInOutAverageValues(CConfig *config, bool allocate){
6438 
6439  unsigned short iMarker, iMarkerTP;
6440  unsigned short iSpan, iDim;
6441  int markerTP;
6442  su2double nBlades;
6443  unsigned short nSpanWiseSections = config->GetnSpanWiseSections();
6444 
6445  su2double tangGridVelIn, tangGridVelOut;
6446  su2double areaIn, areaOut, pitchIn, Pitch;
6447  su2double radiusIn, radiusOut, *turboNormal;
6448 
6449  turboNormal = new su2double[nDim];
6450  Pitch = 0.0;
6451 
6452  if(allocate){
6453  for (iMarkerTP=0; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_TurboPerformance(); iMarkerTP++){
6454  SpanAreaIn[iMarkerTP] = new su2double[config->GetnSpanMaxAllZones() +1];
6455  TangGridVelIn[iMarkerTP] = new su2double[config->GetnSpanMaxAllZones() +1];
