10346  if ((Xcoord_Airfoil[nPlane-1].size() != 0) && (Xcoord_Airfoil[nPlane-2].size() != 0)) {
10347  Curvature[nPlane-1] = Curvature[nPlane-2];
10348  }
10349  }
10350 
10351  /*--- Plot the geometrical quatities ---*/
10352 
10353  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
10354  if (Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() > 1) {
10355  if (config->GetTabular_FileFormat() == TAB_OUTPUT::TAB_CSV) {
10356  Fuselage_File << -Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane][0] <<", "<< Area[iPlane] <<", "<< Length[iPlane] <<", "<< Width[iPlane] <<", "<< WaterLineWidth[iPlane] <<", "<< Height[iPlane] <<", "<< Curvature[iPlane]
10357  <<", "<< -LeadingEdge[iPlane][1] <<", "<< LeadingEdge[iPlane][0] <<", "<< LeadingEdge[iPlane][2]
10358  <<", "<< -TrailingEdge[iPlane][1] <<", "<< TrailingEdge[iPlane][0] <<", "<< TrailingEdge[iPlane][2] << endl;
10359  }
10360  else {
10361  Fuselage_File << -Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane][0] <<" "<< Area[iPlane] <<" "<< Length[iPlane] <<" "<< Width[iPlane] <<" "<< WaterLineWidth[iPlane] <<" "<< Height[iPlane] <<" "<< Curvature[iPlane]
10362  <<" "<< -LeadingEdge[iPlane][1] <<" "<< LeadingEdge[iPlane][0] <<" "<< LeadingEdge[iPlane][2]
10363  <<" "<< -TrailingEdge[iPlane][1] <<" "<< TrailingEdge[iPlane][0] <<" "<< TrailingEdge[iPlane][2] << endl;
10364  }
10365  }
10366  }
10367 
10368  Fuselage_File.close();
10369 
10370  Section_File.open("fuselage_slices.dat", ios::out);
10371 
10372  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
10373 
10374  if (iPlane == 0) {
10375  Section_File << "TITLE = \"Aircraft Slices\"" << endl;
10376  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US)
10377  Section_File << "VARIABLES = \"x (in)\", \"y (in)\", \"z (in)\"" << endl;
10378  else Section_File << "VARIABLES = \"x (m)\", \"y (m)\", \"z (m)\"" << endl;
10379  }
10380 
10381  if (Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() > 1) {
10382 
10383  Section_File << "ZONE T=\"X = " << -Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane][0] << " \", I= " << Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() << ", F=POINT" << endl;
10384 
10385  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size(); iVertex++) {
10386 
10387  /*--- Write the file ---*/
10388 
10389  Section_File << -Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex] << " " << Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex] << " " << Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex] << endl;
10390  }
10391  }
10392 
10393  }
10394 
10395  Section_File.close();
10396 
10397 
10398  /*--- Compute the fuselage volume using a composite Simpson's rule ---*/
10399 
10400  Fuselage_Volume = 0.0;
10401  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane-2; iPlane+=2) {
10402  if (Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() > 1) {
10403  Fuselage_Volume += (1.0/3.0)*dPlane*(Area[iPlane] + 4.0*Area[iPlane+1] + Area[iPlane+2]);
10404  }
10405  }
10406 
10407  /*--- Compute the fuselage wetted area ---*/
10408 
10409  Fuselage_WettedArea = 0.0;
10410  if (Xcoord_Airfoil[0].size() > 1) Fuselage_WettedArea += (1.0/2.0)*dPlane*Length[0];
10411  for (iPlane = 1; iPlane < nPlane-1; iPlane++) {
10412  if (Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() > 1) {
10413  Fuselage_WettedArea += dPlane*Length[iPlane];
10414  }
10415  }
10416  if (Xcoord_Airfoil[nPlane-1].size() > 1) Fuselage_WettedArea += (1.0/2.0)*dPlane*Length[nPlane-1];
10417 
10418  /*--- Evaluate Max and Min quantities ---*/
10419 
10420  Fuselage_MaxWidth = -1E6; Fuselage_MinWidth = 1E6;
10421  Fuselage_MaxWaterLineWidth = -1E6; Fuselage_MinWaterLineWidth = 1E6;
10422  Fuselage_MaxHeight = -1E6; Fuselage_MinHeight = 1E6;
10423  Fuselage_MaxCurvature = -1E6;
10424 
10425  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
10426  if (Width[iPlane] != 0.0) Fuselage_MinWidth = min(Fuselage_MinWidth, Width[iPlane]);
10427  Fuselage_MaxWidth = max(Fuselage_MaxWidth, Width[iPlane]);
10428  if (WaterLineWidth[iPlane] != 0.0) Fuselage_MinWaterLineWidth = min(Fuselage_MinWaterLineWidth, WaterLineWidth[iPlane]);
10429  Fuselage_MaxWaterLineWidth = max(Fuselage_MaxWaterLineWidth, WaterLineWidth[iPlane]);
10430  if (Height[iPlane] != 0.0) Fuselage_MinHeight = min(Fuselage_MinHeight, Height[iPlane]);
10431  Fuselage_MaxHeight = max(Fuselage_MaxHeight, Height[iPlane]);
10432  Fuselage_MaxCurvature = max(Fuselage_MaxCurvature, Curvature[iPlane]);
10433  }
10434 
10435  }
10436 
10437  /*--- Free memory for the section cuts ---*/
10438 
10439  delete [] Xcoord_Airfoil;
10440  delete [] Ycoord_Airfoil;
10441  delete [] Zcoord_Airfoil;
10442  delete [] Variable_Airfoil;
10443 
10444  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++)
10445  delete [] LeadingEdge[iPlane];
10446  delete [] LeadingEdge;
10447 
10448  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++)
10449  delete [] TrailingEdge[iPlane];
10450  delete [] TrailingEdge;
10451 
10452  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++)
10453  delete [] Plane_P0[iPlane];
10454  delete [] Plane_P0;
10455 
10456  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++)
10457  delete [] Plane_Normal[iPlane];
10458  delete [] Plane_Normal;
10459 
10460  delete [] Area;
10461  delete [] Length;
10462  delete [] Width;
10463  delete [] WaterLineWidth;
10464  delete [] Height;
10465  delete [] Curvature;
10466 
10467 }
10468 
10469 void CPhysicalGeometry::Compute_Nacelle(CConfig *config, bool original_surface,
10470  su2double &Nacelle_Volume, su2double &Nacelle_MinMaxThickness,
10471  su2double &Nacelle_MinChord, su2double &Nacelle_MaxChord,
10472  su2double &Nacelle_MaxMaxThickness, su2double &Nacelle_MinLERadius,
10473  su2double &Nacelle_MaxLERadius, su2double &Nacelle_MinToC, su2double &Nacelle_MaxToC,
10474  su2double &Nacelle_ObjFun_MinToC, su2double &Nacelle_MaxTwist) {
10475 
10476  unsigned short iPlane, iDim, nPlane = 0;
10477  unsigned long iVertex;
10478  su2double Angle, MinAngle, MaxAngle, dAngle, *Area, *MaxThickness, *ToC, *Chord, *LERadius, *Twist;
10479  vector<su2double> *Xcoord_Airfoil, *Ycoord_Airfoil, *Zcoord_Airfoil, *Variable_Airfoil;
10480  ofstream Nacelle_File, Section_File;
10481 
10482 
10483  /*--- Make a large number of section cuts for approximating volume ---*/
10484 
10485  nPlane = config->GetnWingStations();
10486 
10487  /*--- Allocate memory for the section cutting ---*/
10488 
10489  Area = new su2double [nPlane];
10490  MaxThickness = new su2double [nPlane];
10491  Chord = new su2double [nPlane];
10492  LERadius = new su2double [nPlane];
10493  ToC = new su2double [nPlane];
10494  Twist = new su2double [nPlane];
10495 
10496  su2double **LeadingEdge = new su2double*[nPlane];
10497  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++ )
10498  LeadingEdge[iPlane] = new su2double[nDim];
10499 
10500  su2double **TrailingEdge = new su2double*[nPlane];
10501  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++ )
10502  TrailingEdge[iPlane] = new su2double[nDim];
10503 
10504  su2double **Plane_P0 = new su2double*[nPlane];
10505  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++ )
10506  Plane_P0[iPlane] = new su2double[nDim];
10507 
10508  su2double **Plane_Normal = new su2double*[nPlane];
10509  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++ )
10510  Plane_Normal[iPlane] = new su2double[nDim];
10511 
10512  MinAngle = config->GetStations_Bounds(0); MaxAngle = config->GetStations_Bounds(1);
10513  dAngle = fabs((MaxAngle - MinAngle)/su2double(nPlane-1));
10514 
10515  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
10516  Plane_Normal[iPlane][0] = 0.0; Plane_P0[iPlane][0] = 0.0;
10517  Plane_Normal[iPlane][1] = 0.0; Plane_P0[iPlane][1] = 0.0;
10518  Plane_Normal[iPlane][2] = 0.0; Plane_P0[iPlane][2] = 0.0;
10519 
10520  /*--- Apply roll to cut the nacelle ---*/
10521 
10522  Angle = MinAngle + iPlane*dAngle*PI_NUMBER/180.0;
10523 
10524  if (Angle <= 0) Angle = 1E-6;
10525  if (Angle >= 360) Angle = 359.999999;
10526 
10527  Plane_Normal[iPlane][0] = 0.0;
10528  Plane_Normal[iPlane][1] = -sin(Angle);
10529  Plane_Normal[iPlane][2] = cos(Angle);
10530 
10531  /*--- Apply tilt angle to the plane ---*/
10532 
10533  su2double Tilt_Angle = config->GetNacelleLocation(3)*PI_NUMBER/180;
10534  su2double Plane_NormalX_Tilt = Plane_Normal[iPlane][0]*cos(Tilt_Angle) + Plane_Normal[iPlane][2]*sin(Tilt_Angle);
10535  su2double Plane_NormalY_Tilt = Plane_Normal[iPlane][1];
10536  su2double Plane_NormalZ_Tilt = Plane_Normal[iPlane][2]*cos(Tilt_Angle) - Plane_Normal[iPlane][0]*sin(Tilt_Angle);
10537 
10538  /*--- Apply toe angle to the plane ---*/
10539 
10540  su2double Toe_Angle = config->GetNacelleLocation(4)*PI_NUMBER/180;
10541  su2double Plane_NormalX_Tilt_Toe = Plane_NormalX_Tilt*cos(Toe_Angle) - Plane_NormalY_Tilt*sin(Toe_Angle);
10542  su2double Plane_NormalY_Tilt_Toe = Plane_NormalX_Tilt*sin(Toe_Angle) + Plane_NormalY_Tilt*cos(Toe_Angle);
10543  su2double Plane_NormalZ_Tilt_Toe = Plane_NormalZ_Tilt;
10544 
10545  /*--- Update normal vector ---*/
10546 
10547  Plane_Normal[iPlane][0] = Plane_NormalX_Tilt_Toe;
10548  Plane_Normal[iPlane][1] = Plane_NormalY_Tilt_Toe;
10549  Plane_Normal[iPlane][2] = Plane_NormalZ_Tilt_Toe;
10550 
10551  /*--- Point in the plane ---*/
10552 
10553  Plane_P0[iPlane][0] = config->GetNacelleLocation(0);
10554  Plane_P0[iPlane][1] = config->GetNacelleLocation(1);
10555  Plane_P0[iPlane][2] = config->GetNacelleLocation(2);
10556 
10557  }
10558 
10559  /*--- Allocate some vectors for storing airfoil coordinates ---*/
10560 
10561  Xcoord_Airfoil = new vector<su2double>[nPlane];
10562  Ycoord_Airfoil = new vector<su2double>[nPlane];
10563  Zcoord_Airfoil = new vector<su2double>[nPlane];
10564  Variable_Airfoil = new vector<su2double>[nPlane];
10565 
10566  /*--- Create the section slices through the geometry ---*/
10567 
10568  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
10569 
10570  ComputeAirfoil_Section(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane],
10571  -1E6, 1E6, -1E6, 1E6, -1E6, 1E6, nullptr, Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane],
10572  Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane],
10573  Variable_Airfoil[iPlane], original_surface, config);
10574 
10575  }
10576 
10577  /*--- Compute airfoil characteristic only in the master node ---*/
10578 
10579  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
10580 
10581  /*--- Write an output file---*/
10582 
10583  if (config->GetTabular_FileFormat() == TAB_OUTPUT::TAB_CSV) {
10584  Nacelle_File.open("nacelle_description.csv", ios::out);
10585  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US)
10586  Nacelle_File << "\"Theta (deg)\",\"Area (in^2)\",\"Max. Thickness (in)\",\"Chord (in)\",\"Leading Edge Radius (1/in)\",\"Max. Thickness/Chord\",\"Twist (deg)\",\"Leading Edge XLoc\",\"Leading Edge ZLoc\",\"Trailing Edge XLoc\",\"Trailing Edge ZLoc\"" << endl;
10587  else
10588  Nacelle_File << "\"Theta (deg)\",\"Area (m^2)\",\"Max. Thickness (m)\",\"Chord (m)\",\"Leading Edge Radius (1/m)\",\"Max. Thickness/Chord\",\"Twist (deg)\",\"Curvature (1/in)\",\"Dihedral (deg)\",\"Leading Edge XLoc\",\"Leading Edge ZLoc\",\"Trailing Edge XLoc\",\"Trailing Edge ZLoc\"" << endl;
10589  }
10590  else {
10591  Nacelle_File.open("nacelle_description.dat", ios::out);
10592  Nacelle_File << "TITLE = \"Nacelle description\"" << endl;
10593  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US)
10594  Nacelle_File << "VARIABLES = \"<greek>q</greek> (deg)\",\"Area (in<sup>2</sup>)\",\"Max. Thickness (in)\",\"Chord (in)\",\"Leading Edge Radius (1/in)\",\"Max. Thickness/Chord\",\"Twist (deg)\",\"Leading Edge XLoc\",\"Leading Edge ZLoc\",\"Trailing Edge XLoc\",\"Trailing Edge ZLoc\"" << endl;
10595  else
10596  Nacelle_File << "VARIABLES = \"<greek>q</greek> (deg)\",\"Area (m<sup>2</sup>)\",\"Max. Thickness (m)\",\"Chord (m)\",\"Leading Edge Radius (1/m)\",\"Max. Thickness/Chord\",\"Twist (deg)\",\"Leading Edge XLoc\",\"Leading Edge ZLoc\",\"Trailing Edge XLoc\",\"Trailing Edge ZLoc\"" << endl;
10597  Nacelle_File << "ZONE T= \"Baseline nacelle\"" << endl;
10598  }
10599 
10600 
10601  /*--- Evaluate geometrical quatities that do not require any kind of filter, local to each point ---*/
10602 
10603  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
10604 
10605  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
10606  LeadingEdge[iPlane][iDim] = 0.0;
10607  TrailingEdge[iPlane][iDim] = 0.0;
10608  }
10609 
10610  Area[iPlane] = 0.0;
10611  MaxThickness[iPlane] = 0.0;
10612  Chord[iPlane] = 0.0;
10613  LERadius[iPlane] = 0.0;
10614  ToC[iPlane] = 0.0;
10615  Twist[iPlane] = 0.0;
10616 
10617  if (Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() > 1) {
10618 
10619  Compute_Wing_LeadingTrailing(LeadingEdge[iPlane], TrailingEdge[iPlane], Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
10620 
10621  Area[iPlane] = Compute_Area(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], config, Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
10622 
10623  MaxThickness[iPlane] = Compute_MaxThickness(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], config, Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
10624 
10625  Chord[iPlane] = Compute_Chord(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
10626 
10627  Twist[iPlane] = Compute_Twist(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
10628 
10629  LERadius[iPlane] = Compute_LERadius(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
10630 
10631  ToC[iPlane] = MaxThickness[iPlane] / Chord[iPlane];
10632 
10633 
10634  }
10635 
10636  }
10637 
10638  /*--- Plot the geometrical quatities ---*/
10639 
10640  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
10641 
10642  su2double theta_deg = atan2(Plane_Normal[iPlane][1], -Plane_Normal[iPlane][2])/PI_NUMBER*180 + 180;
10643 
10644  if (Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() > 1) {
10645  if (config->GetTabular_FileFormat() == TAB_OUTPUT::TAB_CSV) {
10646  Nacelle_File << theta_deg <<", "<< Area[iPlane] <<", "<< MaxThickness[iPlane] <<", "<< Chord[iPlane] <<", "<< LERadius[iPlane] <<", "<< ToC[iPlane]
10647  <<", "<< Twist[iPlane] <<", "<< LeadingEdge[iPlane][0] <<", "<< LeadingEdge[iPlane][2]
10648  <<", "<< TrailingEdge[iPlane][0] <<", "<< TrailingEdge[iPlane][2] << endl;
10649  }
10650  else {
10651  Nacelle_File << theta_deg <<" "<< Area[iPlane] <<" "<< MaxThickness[iPlane] <<" "<< Chord[iPlane] <<" "<< LERadius[iPlane] <<" "<< ToC[iPlane]
10652  <<" "<< Twist[iPlane] <<" "<< LeadingEdge[iPlane][0] <<" "<< LeadingEdge[iPlane][2]
10653  <<" "<< TrailingEdge[iPlane][0] <<" "<< TrailingEdge[iPlane][2] << endl;
10654 
10655  }
10656  }
10657 
10658  }
10659 
10660  Nacelle_File.close();
10661 
10662  Section_File.open("nacelle_slices.dat", ios::out);
10663 
10664  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
10665 
10666  if (iPlane == 0) {
10667  Section_File << "TITLE = \"Nacelle Slices\"" << endl;
10668  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US)
10669  Section_File << "VARIABLES = \"x (in)\", \"y (in)\", \"z (in)\", \"x<sub>2D</sub>/c\", \"y<sub>2D</sub>/c\"" << endl;
10670  else Section_File << "VARIABLES = \"x (m)\", \"y (m)\", \"z (m)\", \"x<sub>2D</sub>/c\", \"y<sub>2D</sub>/c\"" << endl;
10671  }
10672 
10673  if (Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() > 1) {
10674 
10675  su2double theta_deg = atan2(Plane_Normal[iPlane][1], -Plane_Normal[iPlane][2])/PI_NUMBER*180 + 180;
10676  su2double Angle = theta_deg*PI_NUMBER/180 - 0.5*PI_NUMBER;
10677 
10678  Section_File << "ZONE T=\"<greek>q</greek> = " << theta_deg << " deg\", I= " << Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() << ", F=POINT" << endl;
10679 
10680  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size(); iVertex++) {
10681 
10682  /*--- Move to the origin ---*/
10683 
10684  su2double XValue_ = Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex] - LeadingEdge[iPlane][0];
10685  su2double ZValue_ = Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex] - LeadingEdge[iPlane][2];
10686 
10687  /*--- Rotate the airfoil and divide by the chord ---*/
10688 
10689  su2double ValCos = cos(Twist[iPlane]*PI_NUMBER/180.0);
10690  su2double ValSin = sin(Twist[iPlane]*PI_NUMBER/180.0);
10691 
10692  su2double XValue = (XValue_*ValCos - ZValue_*ValSin) / Chord[iPlane];
10693  su2double ZValue = (ZValue_*ValCos + XValue_*ValSin) / Chord[iPlane];
10694 
10695  su2double XCoord = Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex] + config->GetNacelleLocation(0);
10696  su2double YCoord = (Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex]*cos(Angle) - Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex]*sin(Angle)) + config->GetNacelleLocation(1);
10697  su2double ZCoord = (Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex]*cos(Angle) + Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex]*sin(Angle)) + config->GetNacelleLocation(2);
10698 
10699  /*--- Write the file ---*/
10700 
10701  Section_File << XCoord << " " << YCoord << " " << ZCoord << " " << XValue << " " << ZValue << endl;
10702  }
10703  }
10704 
10705  }
10706 
10707  Section_File.close();
10708 
10709 
10710  /*--- Compute the wing volume using a composite Simpson's rule ---*/
10711 
10712  Nacelle_Volume = 0.0;
10713  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane-2; iPlane+=2) {
10714  if (Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() > 1) {
10715  Nacelle_Volume += (1.0/3.0)*dAngle*(Area[iPlane] + 4.0*Area[iPlane+1] + Area[iPlane+2]);
10716  }
10717  }
10718 
10719  /*--- Evaluate Max and Min quantities ---*/
10720 
10721  Nacelle_MaxMaxThickness = -1E6; Nacelle_MinMaxThickness = 1E6; Nacelle_MinChord = 1E6; Nacelle_MaxChord = -1E6;
10722  Nacelle_MinLERadius = 1E6; Nacelle_MaxLERadius = -1E6; Nacelle_MinToC = 1E6; Nacelle_MaxToC = -1E6;
10723  Nacelle_MaxTwist = -1E6;
10724 
10725  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
10726  if (MaxThickness[iPlane] != 0.0) Nacelle_MinMaxThickness = min(Nacelle_MinMaxThickness, MaxThickness[iPlane]);
10727  Nacelle_MaxMaxThickness = max(Nacelle_MaxMaxThickness, MaxThickness[iPlane]);
10728  if (Chord[iPlane] != 0.0) Nacelle_MinChord = min(Nacelle_MinChord, Chord[iPlane]);
10729  Nacelle_MaxChord = max(Nacelle_MaxChord, Chord[iPlane]);
10730  if (LERadius[iPlane] != 0.0) Nacelle_MinLERadius = min(Nacelle_MinLERadius, LERadius[iPlane]);
10731  Nacelle_MaxLERadius = max(Nacelle_MaxLERadius, LERadius[iPlane]);
10732  if (ToC[iPlane] != 0.0) Nacelle_MinToC = min(Nacelle_MinToC, ToC[iPlane]);
10733  Nacelle_MaxToC = max(Nacelle_MaxToC, ToC[iPlane]);
10734  Nacelle_ObjFun_MinToC = sqrt((Nacelle_MinToC - 0.07)*(Nacelle_MinToC - 0.07));
10735  Nacelle_MaxTwist = max(Nacelle_MaxTwist, fabs(Twist[iPlane]));
10736  }
10737 
10738  }
10739 
10740  /*--- Free memory for the section cuts ---*/
10741 
10742  delete [] Xcoord_Airfoil;
10743  delete [] Ycoord_Airfoil;
10744  delete [] Zcoord_Airfoil;
10745  delete [] Variable_Airfoil;
10746 
10747  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++)
10748  delete [] LeadingEdge[iPlane];
10749  delete [] LeadingEdge;
10750 
10751  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++)
10752  delete [] TrailingEdge[iPlane];
10753  delete [] TrailingEdge;
10754 
10755  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++)
10756  delete [] Plane_P0[iPlane];
10757  delete [] Plane_P0;
10758 
10759  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++)
10760  delete [] Plane_Normal[iPlane];
10761  delete [] Plane_Normal;
10762 
10763  delete [] Area;
10764  delete [] MaxThickness;
10765  delete [] Chord;
10766  delete [] LERadius;
10767  delete [] ToC;
10768  delete [] Twist;
10769 
10770 }
10771 
10772 std::unique_ptr<CADTElemClass> CPhysicalGeometry::ComputeViscousWallADT(const CConfig *config) const{
10773 
10774  /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
10775  /*--- Step 1: Create the coordinates and connectivity of the linear ---*/
10776  /*--- subelements of the local boundaries that must be taken ---*/
10777  /*--- into account in the wall distance computation. ---*/
10778  /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
10779 
10780  /* Initialize an array for the mesh points, which eventually contains the
10781  mapping from the local nodes to the number used in the connectivity of the
10782  local boundary faces. However, in a first pass it is an indicator whether
10783  or not a mesh point is on a local wall boundary. */
10784  vector<unsigned long> meshToSurface(nPoint, 0);
10785 
10786  /* Define the vectors for the connectivity of the local linear subelements,
10787  the element ID's, the element type and marker ID's. */
10788  vector<unsigned long> surfaceConn;
10789  vector<unsigned long> elemIDs;
10790  vector<unsigned short> VTK_TypeElem;
10791  vector<unsigned short> markerIDs;
10792 
10793  /* Loop over the boundary markers. */
10794 
10795  for(unsigned short iMarker=0; iMarker<config->GetnMarker_All(); ++iMarker) {
10796 
10797 
10798  /* Check for a viscous wall. */
10799  if( config->GetViscous_Wall(iMarker)) {
10800 
10801  /* Loop over the surface elements of this marker. */
10802  for(unsigned long iElem=0; iElem < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem++) {
10803 
10804  /* Set the flag of the mesh points on this surface to true. */
10805  for (unsigned short iNode = 0; iNode < bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetnNodes(); iNode++) {
10806  unsigned long iPoint = bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
10807  meshToSurface[iPoint] = 1;
10808  }
10809  /* Determine the necessary data from the corresponding standard face,
10810  such as the number of linear subfaces, the number of DOFs per
10811  linear subface and the corresponding local connectivity. */
10812  const unsigned short VTK_Type = bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetVTK_Type();
10813  const unsigned short nDOFsPerElem = bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetnNodes();
10814 
10815  /* Loop over the nodes of element and store the required data. */
10816 
10817  markerIDs.push_back(iMarker);
10818  VTK_TypeElem.push_back(VTK_Type);
10819  elemIDs.push_back(iElem);
10820  for (unsigned short iNode = 0; iNode < nDOFsPerElem; iNode++)
10821  surfaceConn.push_back(bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetNode(iNode));
10822  }
10823  }
10824  }
10825 
10826  /*--- Create the coordinates of the local points on the viscous surfaces and
10827  create the final version of the mapping from all volume points to the
10828  points on the viscous surfaces. ---*/
10829  vector<su2double> surfaceCoor;
10830  unsigned long nVertex_SolidWall = 0;
10831 
10832  for(unsigned long i=0; i<nPoint; ++i) {
10833  if( meshToSurface[i] ) {
10834  meshToSurface[i] = nVertex_SolidWall++;
10835 
10836  for(unsigned short k=0; k<nDim; ++k)
10837  surfaceCoor.push_back(nodes->GetCoord(i, k));
10838  }
10839  }
10840 
10841  /*--- Change the surface connectivity, such that it corresponds to
10842  the entries in surfaceCoor rather than in meshPoints. ---*/
10843  for(unsigned long i=0; i<surfaceConn.size(); ++i)
10844  surfaceConn[i] = meshToSurface[surfaceConn[i]];
10845 
10846  /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
10847  /*--- Step 2: Build the ADT, which is an ADT of bounding boxes of the ---*/
10848  /*--- surface elements. A nearest point search does not give ---*/
10849  /*--- accurate results, especially not for the integration ---*/
10850  /*--- points of the elements close to a wall boundary. ---*/
10851  /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
10852 
10853  std::unique_ptr<CADTElemClass> WallADT(new CADTElemClass(nDim, surfaceCoor, surfaceConn, VTK_TypeElem,
10854  markerIDs, elemIDs, true));
10855 
10856  return WallADT;
10857 
10858 }
10859 
10860 void CPhysicalGeometry::SetWallDistance(CADTElemClass* WallADT, const CConfig* config, unsigned short iZone) {
10861 
10862  /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
10863  /*--- Step 3: Loop over all interior mesh nodes and compute minimum ---*/
10864  /*--- distance to a solid wall element ---*/
10865  /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
10866 
10867  SU2_OMP_PARALLEL
10868  if (!WallADT->IsEmpty()) {
10869  /*--- Solid wall boundary nodes are present. Compute the wall
10870  distance for all nodes. ---*/
10871 
10872  SU2_OMP_FOR_DYN(roundUpDiv(nPoint,2*omp_get_max_threads()))
10873  for (unsigned long iPoint=0; iPoint<GetnPoint(); ++iPoint) {
10874  unsigned short markerID;
10875  unsigned long elemID;
10876  int rankID;
10877  su2double dist;
10878 
10879  WallADT->DetermineNearestElement(nodes->GetCoord(iPoint), dist, markerID, elemID, rankID);
10880 
10881  if(dist < nodes->GetWall_Distance(iPoint)){
10882  nodes->SetWall_Distance(iPoint, dist, rankID, iZone, markerID, elemID);
10883  }
10884  }
10885  END_SU2_OMP_FOR
10886  }
10887  END_SU2_OMP_PARALLEL
10888 }
10889 
10890 void CPhysicalGeometry::ReadPorosity(const CConfig *config) {
10891 
10892  /*--- This routine allows SU2 to read in the porosities for fluid
10893  topology optimization from a simple ASCII file in the following
10894  format:
10895 
10896  x0, y0, z0, p0
10897  x1, y1, z1, p1
10898  ...
10899  xN, yN, zN, pN
10900 
10901  where x, y, z, are the coordinates of the grid nodes, and p is the
10902  porosity value at that node, and N being the number of grid points.
10903  Note that the nodes can be in any order in the file. ---*/
10904 
10905  unsigned short iDim;
10906  unsigned long iPoint, pointID;
10907  unsigned long unmatched = 0, iPoint_Found = 0, iPoint_Ext = 0;
10908 
10909  su2double Coor_External[3] = {0.0,0.0,0.0}, Porosity_External;
10910  su2double dist;
10911  int rankID;
10912 
10913  string filename, text_line;
10914  ifstream external_file;
10915  ofstream sens_file;
10916 
10917  if (rank == MASTER_NODE)
10918  cout << "Reading nodal porosity values from file."<< endl;
10919 
10920  /*--- Get the filename for the porosity file input. ---*/
10921 
10922  filename = config->GetTopology_Optim_Porosity_FileName();
10923  external_file.open(filename.data(), ios::in);
10924  if (external_file.fail()) {
10925  SU2_MPI::Error(string("There is no porosity file ") +
10926  filename, CURRENT_FUNCTION);
10927  }
10928 
10929  /*--- Allocate the vectors to hold node coordinates and its local ID. ---*/
10930 
10931  vector<su2double> Coords(nDim*nPointDomain);
10932  vector<unsigned long> PointIDs(nPointDomain);
10933 
10934  /*--- Retrieve and store the coordinates of owned interior nodes
10935  and their local point IDs. ---*/
10936 
10937  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++) {
10938  PointIDs[iPoint] = iPoint;
10939  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
10940  Coords[iPoint*nDim + iDim] = nodes->GetCoord(iPoint, iDim);
10941  }
10942 
10943  /*--- Build the ADT of all interior nodes. ---*/
10944 
10945  CADTPointsOnlyClass VertexADT(nDim, nPointDomain,
10946  Coords.data(), PointIDs.data(), true);
10947 
10948  /*--- Loop over all interior mesh nodes owned by this rank and find the
10949  matching point with minimum distance. Once we have the match, store the
10950  porosity from the file for that node. ---*/
10951 
10952  if (VertexADT.IsEmpty()) {
10953 
10954  SU2_MPI::Error("No external points given to ADT.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
10955 
10956  } else {
10957 
10958  /*--- Read the input sensitivity file and locate the point matches
10959  using the ADT search, on a line-by-line basis. ---*/
10960 
10961  iPoint_Found = 0; iPoint_Ext = 0;
10962  while (getline (external_file, text_line)) {
10963 
10964  /*--- First, check that the line has nDim + 1 entries (the coords and
10965  the porosity values), otherwise throw out. ---*/
10966 
10967  istringstream point_line(text_line);
10968  vector<string> tokens((istream_iterator<string>(point_line)),
10969  istream_iterator<string>());
10970 
10971  if (tokens.size() == (nDim + 1)) {
10972 
10973  istringstream point_line(text_line);
10974 
10975  /*--- Get the coordinates and porosity for this line. ---*/
10976 
10977  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) point_line >> Coor_External[iDim];
10978 
10979  point_line >> Porosity_External;
10980 
10981  /*--- Locate the nearest node to this external point. If it is on
10982  our rank, then store the sensitivity value. ---*/
10983 
10984  VertexADT.DetermineNearestNode(&Coor_External[0], dist,
10985  pointID, rankID);
10986 
10987  if (rankID == rank) {
10988 
10989  /*--- Store porosity at the matched local node. ---*/
10990 
10991  nodes->SetAuxVar(pointID, Porosity_External);
10992 
10993  /*--- Keep track of how many points we match. ---*/
10994 
10995  iPoint_Found++;
10996 
10997  /*--- Keep track of points with poor matches for reporting. ---*/
10998 
10999  if (dist > 1e-10) unmatched++;
11000 
11001  }
11002 
11003  /*--- Increment counter for total points in the external file. ---*/
11004 
11005  iPoint_Ext++;
11006 
11007  }
11008  }
11009 
11010  /*--- Close the external file. ---*/
11011 
11012  external_file.close();
11013 
11014  /*--- We have not received all nodes in the input file. Throw an error. ---*/
11015 
11016  if ((iPoint_Ext < GetGlobal_nPointDomain()) && (rank == MASTER_NODE)) {
11017  SU2_MPI::Error("Not enough points in the porosity file.",
11018  CURRENT_FUNCTION);
11019  }
11020 
11021  /*--- Check for points with a poor match and report the count. ---*/
11022 
11023  unsigned long myUnmatched = unmatched; unmatched = 0;
11024  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&myUnmatched, &unmatched, 1,
11025  MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
11026  if ((unmatched > 0) && (rank == MASTER_NODE)) {
11027  cout << " Warning: there are " << unmatched;
11028  cout << " points with a match distance > 1e-10." << endl;
11029  }
11030 
11031  }
11032 
11033 }
